1129204021021032--.name: We've got a lot to cover, so let's skip straight to the good part!

1129204021021033--.name: I've got a juicy report from the $map:02000043$. If you ask real, real nice, maybe I'll share it with you...

1129204021021036--.name: I love the desperation in your voice. All right, listen up.

1129204021021038--.name: You can't fool me, $MyPCName$. You want a piece of this. And by this, I mean this mission.

1129204021021040--.name: Someone's been getting in the way of the trade caravans through the $map:02000043$.

1129204021021041--.name: This guy wanders around aimlessly, bumping into things and knocking carts over. So... what do you think?

1129204021021044--.name: Tsk, tsk. You'll never make a decent spy at this rate.

1129204021021045--.name: So what do you think it is?

1129204021021046--.name: I think our old friend $npcName:11000492[gender:0]$ has been raised from the dead. We never did find his body, did we? I think he's the spook that's haunting the $map:52000037$.

1129204021021048--.name: I've got an agent watching the situation. Head to the $map:02000043$ and see if they have any updates for me.

1129204021021049--.name: What's the matter? Can't tear yourself away from my side?

1129204021021051--.name: Go on. Give me all the juicy details.

1129204021021052--.name: <font color="#909090">(You tell her everything you learned.)</font>

1129204021021053--.name: That's a shame. It looks like we still don't have any useful information. Oh well.

1129204021021054--.name: So I went all that way for nothing?

1129204021021055--.name: Cheer up, $MyPCName$. You get an A for effort!

1129204021021057--.name: You haven't been by the $map:02000146$ recently, have you? My agents have picked up a strange energy pattern in the area.

1129204021021058--.name: The wavelength, the frequency—everything about it is totally new to us. You up for a one-on-one analsys sesh with me while we figure this out?

1129204021021061--.name: That'd be great, right? Anyway, that's not our job. So... too bad!

1129204021021062--.name: What do I have to do?

1129204021021063--.name: Spoilsport. In that case, I've got another job for you.

1129204021021064--.name: What do I have to do?

1129204021021065--.name: Meet my agent at the $map:02000146$ and get an update. Then bring it back to me. Simple, no?

1129204021021066--.name: All this scientific mumbo-jumbo is beyond me, honestly. Give me a mark to tail and a back to stab any day of the week.

1129204021021068--.name: Go on. Give me all the juicy details.

1129204021021069--.name: <font color="#909090">(You tell her everything you learned.)</font>

1129204021021070--.name: So we still don't know where the signal is coming from, or who's sending it. We'll just have to keep working the problem, I guess.

1129204021021071--.name: I wish I knew what all this code meant...

1129204021021072--.name: Don't you mind that, $MyPCName$. Here's your reward.

1129204021021073--.name: You ready to get to work? Here's the plan.

1129204021021074--.name: My agents have been tracking a terrorist organization that calls itself the Resistance. They have this whole anti-magic shtick, and they aren't afraid to bust some heads to make a point.

1129204021021075--.name: Those guys are always up to trouble.

1129204021021077--.name: It seems they've come to $map:02000270$ in search of new technology. We thought this'd be a good opportunity to nab their leaders, but it's tough to tell an undercover Resistance agent from your average scientific egg-head.

1129204021021079--.name: Oh, you have the most important job of all! Meet my agents in $map:02000270$ and see if they have any messages for me.

1129204021021080--.name: My agents are patient, but it's rude to make them wait.

1129204021021082--.name: Go on. Give me all the juicy details.

1129204021021083--.name: <font color="#909090">(You tell her everything you learned.)</font>

1129204021021084--.name: I knew this wouldn't be easy...

1129204021021085--.name: Neither of the messages had anything useful?

1129204021021086--.name: Nothing I was looking for. But Dark Wind doesn't give up so easily. Sooner or later, we'll get these Resistance goons!

1129204021021087--.name: By the way... What was with the robot?

1129204021021088--.name: Only the best tech for the best intelligence agency!

1129204021021090--.name: Oh, I'm just getting started, $MyPCName$. Anyway, here. You earned this.

1129204021021092--.name: It's no secret that $npcName:11000251[gender:0]$ is the boss of Blackstar. What most people don't know, however, is that Blackstar has a genius advisor who's secretly behind their success.

1129204021021093--.name: Ever since we learned of this advisor's existence, we've chased him tirelessly. If we put him behind bars, it could spell the end for the mob.

1129204021021095--.name: All we have is a name: $npcName:11003182[gender:0]$. Blackstar is careful not to leak anything about their great tactician.

1129204021021096--.name: But you managed to track him down anyway, right?

1129204021021097--.name: You know it! That's where things got weird, though. Lean in close, and I'll tell you something that'll blow your mind...

1129204021021099--.name: Uh... That'll be a no from me.

1129204021021100--.name: After reaching $map:02000131$, he just... stopped. I think he realized he was being followed. He just stands around and stares at enemies all day.

1129204021021102--.name: You don't want the mission, then? I thought you were a team player!

1129204021021104--.name: I've got an agent at $map:02000131$. Find her and ask if she has any new intel for me.

1129204021021105--.name: Listen, I'd love to blow off work, too, but this is too important. We can spend time together later, okay?

1129204021021107--.name: Go on. Give me all the juicy details.

1129204021021108--.name: <font color="#909090">(You tell her everything you learned.)</font>

1129204021021110--.name: Which part didn't you get? "Apple" or "snake"?

1129204021021111--.name: Ah, I forgot that you don't know our code. According to my agent, he doesn't do anything special but point at the enemies from time to time.

1129204021021113--.name: I don't have enough information to even try to guess. We'll just have to keep watching him for now.

1129204021021115--.name: We've got a lot to cover, so let's skip straight to the good part!

1129204021021116--.name: You know that Dark Wind is keeping a close eye on Blackstar, right?

1129204021021119--.name: Right, right. Anyway, we may have a breakthrough in our investigation of Blackstar.

1129204021021121--.name: You know that hot-shot alchemist $npcName:11000264[gender:0]$, right?

1129204021021124--.name: He's known for being totally obsessed with his work. So... why do you think he's been making so many visits to $map:02010020$ lately?

1129204021021128--.name: An egghead like $npcName:11000264[gender:0]$ wouldn't be into the MMA scene. Trust me. Anyway, one of my agents is convinced there's something strange going on with him.

1129204021021129--.name: I've already got boots on the ground at $map:02010020$. Meet up with my agent and see what you can learn.

1129204021021130--.name: What's the matter? Can't tear yourself away from my side?

1129204021021132--.name: Go on. Give me all the juicy details.

1129204021021133--.name: <font color="#909090">(You tell her everything you learned.)</font>

1129204021021134--.name: I see. So, as soon as he gets to $map:02010020$, he goes straight to the $map:52010010$...

1129204021021135--.name: So that's what it all meant...

1129204021021136--.name: I don't know what to think. Well, we'll just have to keep a closer eye on $map:02010020$.

1129204021021138--.name: A beautiful day like today ought to be spent enjoying yourself with someone lithe and spirited, hm? Too bad we've got so much work to do...

1129204021021139--.name: What do you know about those assassins we fought earlier?

1129204021021141--.name: Yes. Their techniques were advanced, to say the least. And they're clearly very, very well informed.

1129204021021142--.name: I did some digging, and I found... absolutely nothing. I've never seen anything like it! The only thing we know for sure about them is that they call themselves the Rooks.

1129204021021143--.name: How could they vanish without a trace?

1129204021021145--.name: Beats me. Even my agents would be hard-pressed to pull that off...

1129204021021146--.name: Maybe you should let this one go.

1129204021021147--.name: Huh? Do you know something about them?

1129204021021149--.name: Relax! No need to be so serious.

1129204021021151--.name: They slipped my grasp this time... But I'm the great $npcName:11003535[gender:1]$! I found them before, and I'll do it again.

1129204021021152--.name: What are you standing around here for? My agents are already in $map:02000083$, tracking down leads. Head down there and see what they've found out.

1129204021021153--.name: While you're wasting time here, our enemies could be making their escape!

1129204021021155--.name: Go on. Give me all the juicy details.

1129204021021156--.name: <font color="#909090">(You tell her everything you learned.)</font>

1129204021021157--.name: Oh, these guys are pros, all right...

1129204021021158--.name: So we still don't know anything?

1129204021021159--.name: Yeah. This whole "failure" thing is new to me. I don't like it.

1129204021021160--.name: Keep at it. I believe in you.

1129204021021161--.name: Look at you, trying to cheer me up! Here, cutie. This is for you.

1129204021021162--.name: I had a dream about you last night, you know. It felt almost... prophetic.

1129204021021163--.name: It's clear to me now. We're destined to be together.

1129204021021165--.name: You're cute when you blush, you know that? Anyway, settle down. I've got a mission for you.

1129204021021166--.name: BeyondLink has a lab in the Land of Darkness. That's shady enough as it is, but it seems they've been doing experiments on humans, trying to make the perfect soldier. These experiments... Well, they aren't pretty.

1129204021021168--.name: Right? Just when you think you've seen the worst of the worst, some crazies in the Land of Darkness have to go and outdo themselves.

1129204021021169--.name: Don't worry. I'll put a stop to this.

1129204021021170--.name: Hold your horses, hotshot. While I'd love to charge in and stab some backs, we need to find out exactly what we'd be getting into. Intelligence is kind of my thing, after all.

1129204021021172--.name: You're awfully enthusiastic today, $MyPCName$! I like my $male:men,female:women$ enthusiastic.

1129204021021173--.name: I've already got agents at the $map:03000145$. They should have new reports for me by now.

1129204021021174--.name: Hey, what happened to all that enthusiasm you had a moment ago?

1129204021021176--.name: Go on. Give me all the juicy details.

1129204021021177--.name: <font color="#909090">(You tell her everything you learned.)</font>

1129204021021178--.name: I see... So that's how it is.

1129204021021180--.name: Nothing concrete. We couldn't find any evidence of their experiments.

1129204021021182--.name: I agree. We'll unmask these monsters soon enough.

1129204021021184--.name: I've got a sweet little mission for you.

1129204021021185--.name: You ready to work up a sweat?

1129204021021187--.name: But I need you, $MyPCName$. You're the only one I trust to go on this mission to $map:02000001$.

1129204021021189--.name: $map:02000001$? Who said anything about $map:02000001$? You're hearing things, Gramps.

1129204021021190--.name:
Who're you calling gramps? You kids got no respect for your superiors, you know that?
<FONT color='#909090'>(He wanders off and grumbles to himself.)</FONT>

1129204021021191--.name: Okay, looks like he's gone. That was a close one.

1129204021021192--.name: Why can't you tell $npcName:11003534[gender:0]$ about this mission?

1129204021021193--.name: I can't just go around spilling top secrets! If you disagree, I could always... revoke your security clearance...

1129204021021195--.name: I've already got my agent stationed at $map:02000001$. Just make the rendezvous and get the coded message back to me.

1129204021021196--.name: These are choice secrets I'm offering you here! Aren't you at least a little curious?

1129204021021197--.name: It's not nice to keep a girl waiting, you know.

1129204021021198--.name: So? Did you get the message?

1129204021021199--.name: "The square looks at the flower twice."

1129204021021200--.name: Oh-ho! So $npcName:11000119[gender:0]$ really is hitting it off with $npcName:11000601[gender:1]$...

1129204021021202--.name: Oh, you big, beautiful ignoramus! This intel is as important as it gets.

1129204021021205--.name: What are you two chatting about? Can I join in?

1129204021021206--.name: I don't know, kid. This is top secret business. But maybe you could find a way to... persuade me.

1129204021021208--.name: You did great, $MyPCName$. Take this as a token of my thanks. And remember—this is our little secret.

1129204021021209--.name: I've got work for you, kitten.

1129204021021210--.name: I'm getting new reports about a dragon-man on Karkar Island.

1129204021021213--.name: It also sounds like he's badly hurt. For him to do so much damage in such a state... We have to be careful with this one.

1129204021021214--.name: And anytime anyone tries to get close, he vanishes. He's not taking any chances, either.

1129204021021215--.name: It won't be easy to track him down.

1129204021021217--.name: Whatever the case, I've got my agents working on tightening the net.

1129204021021218--.name: And you want me to check in with them.

1129204021021219--.name: I knew you were a clever one, kitty-cat!

1129204021021221--.name: I've already got boots on the ground at the $map:02010029$. Head out that way and see if my agents have learned anything new.

1129204021021222--.name: What, is this mission too scary for your delicate kitty-cat sensibilities?

1129204021021224--.name: Go on. Give me all the juicy details.

1129204021021225--.name: <font color="#909090">(You tell her everything you learned.)</font>

1129204021021226--.name: Motives unknown... Well, it's a start.

1129204021021227--.name: So the messages were no use?

1129204021021228--.name: Don't you worry about that, peach. Even if you weren't helpful, something will turn up sooner or later.

1129204021021230--.name: You ready to get your hands dirty?

1129204021021231--.name: I've got a little problem with some smugglers. Seems they're trying to bring $item:30000986$ into Maple World.

1129204021021233--.name: To the naked eye, $item:30000986$ looks just like $item:20000046$. But take a pinch of it, and hoo boy, you'll get a stomach ache like you won't believe.

1129204021021234--.name: I can't let the citizens of the empire get stomach aches, can I?

1129204021021236--.name: They've stuffed crates all over $map:02000139$ with the stuff. Head over there and bring back all of the $item:30000986$ you can find.

1129204021021239--.name: You don't want the smugglers to get there first, do you?

1129204021021241--.name: This is it? I thought there'd be more.

1129204021021242--.name: I didn't miss a single box. Trust me.

1129204021021244--.name: That's what I like to hear!

1129204021021246--.name: You think? You may have a pretty face, but I will not accept this kind of sloppiness from my operatives!

1129204021021247--.name: It's... it's a joke! I am joking!

1129204021021248--.name: Good. For a second there, I thought I was gonna have to discipline you.

1129204021021249--.name: I got all of the stuff. Don't worry.

1129204021021250--.name: We got a lot of their merchandise off the streets, but this isn't over. Scum like this never learns.

1129204021021251--.name: Anyway, that's it for now. Here's your reward. Swing by later if you want something more.

1129204021021252--.name: You ready to get your hands dirty?

1129204021021253--.name: Hey, have you ever had $item:20000015$ before?

1129204021021254--.name: I've eaten a gummy or two in my time.

1129204021021255--.name: I don't have a taste for that stuff.

1129204021021256--.name: In that case, you know how sticky $item:20000015$ can be. Once, one got in my hair, and—that's not important. The important thing is that some very bad men have a very bad plan involving our favorite gummies.

1129204021021257--.name: I won't stand for such badness!

1129204021021258--.name: Really? They're so good, though! Of course, they're also really sticky. Once, one got in my hair, and—that's not important. The important thing is that some very bad men have a very bad plan involving my favorite gummies.

1129204021021259--.name: And you want me to stop them.

1129204021021260--.name: I knew I could count on you! I've traced these "$item:30000987$" to $map:02000138$. They're being sold to the general population.

1129204021021262--.name: Don't leave any $item:30000987$ behind. And break a kneecap or two while you're at it! These guys deserve nothing less.

1129204021021263--.name: What's the matter? Can't tear yourself away from my side?

1129204021021265--.name: You're so fast, $MyPCName$. And I mean that in the good way.

1129204021021270--.name: That's a shame. I guess I'll just test them out on one of my agents.

1129204021021272--.name: All right! Get ready, 'cause I'm gonna throw it!

1129204021021274--.name: Chickened out on me, eh? That's okay. I'll just test these $item:30000987$ on one of my agents, instead.

1129204021021277--.name: Look at you, all bright eyed and bushy tailed. Let's get to it, then.

1129204021021278--.name: I'm not much of a scientist, but there's a certain beauty to chemistry. Take a healing potion, change one ingredient, and pow—you get an acid that causes unbelievable pain without doing any permanent damage.

1129204021021279--.name: Uh... What are you getting at?

1129204021021280--.name: It seems someone at $map:02000134$ accidentally spilled some $itemPlural:20000055$ into an experimental potion. It released such a bad smell that everyone in the room was literally paralyzed.

1129204021021281--.name: And now the stuff is showing up on the streets. I'm guessing one of the researchers thought he could make a quick buck selling it as a weapon. We can't have that, can we?

1129204021021283--.name: We're on the same page. Head to $map:02000134$ and round up all the $itemPlural:30000988$ you can find. And whatever you do, make sure you don't have any $itemPlural:20000055$ on you when you get there!

1129204021021284--.name: Clear the streets of $map:02000134$ of all the $itemPlural:30000988$ you can find.

1129204021021285--.name: You'd better have something for me.

1129204021021286--.name: Hold on. What am I smelling?

1129204021021288--.name: I might have stepped in some $itemPlural:20000055$...

1129204021021289--.name: Is that so? If I didn't know any better, I'd say you were trying to impress me, hot stuff.

1129204021021291--.name: G-get out of here! I am not getting knocked out by stink gas!

1129204021021292--.name: I didn't really step in any! I think!

1129204021021293--.name: Well, maybe I like it. Keep it up and I'll have to take you in for one of my special interrogations.

1129204021021295--.name: If you say so. Maybe you should wash up before you go anyway. You smell like chemical warfare.

1129204021021298--.name: I hope you're ready to work.

1129204021021299--.name: These are crazy times, and all the little people are getting scared. Scared enough to go out and buy the first sword they can find, even if they don't know how to use it.

1129204021021301--.name: Sure, but what good is self-defense if your weapon is made with the shoddiest second-hand material in all the land?

1129204021021302--.name: Their weapons can't be that bad, can they?

1129204021021303--.name: I'm just saying that these swords are more likely to shatter than they are to parry an attack. Innocent people could get hurt!

1129204021021304--.name: My agents tell me that the lizardfolk of $map:02000011$ have been selling $item:30000989$ to just such innocent people. So, what should we do about it?

1129204021021309--.name: Hey, now. This isn't the $MyPCName$ that I've come to know and adore. Now, what are you going to do?

1129204021021311--.name: Go to $map:02000011$, defeat the $npcNamePlural:21090172$, $npcNamePlural:21090173$, and $npcNamePlural:21090174$, and get those $itemPlural:30000989$!

1129204021021312--.name: Go to $map:02000011$, defeat the $npcNamePlural:21090172$, $npcNamePlural:21090173$, and $npcNamePlural:21090174$, and get those $itemPlural:30000989$!

1129204021021316--.name: Great. Now I just need to figure out what to do with all these blades...

1129204021021317--.name: $npcName:11003535[gender:1]$, why don't you donate those swords to the Royal Guard?

1129204021021318--.name: On the one hand, it would be hilarious to see your men fumble around with these crummy blades. On the other, are you sure you want to do that to them?

1129204021021319--.name: Our resources are strapped thin as it is, and beggars can't be choosers, as they say. Besides, back in my day, you were lucky to have more than one sword to every two men, and at least half of our blades were made of tin foil!

1129204021021321--.name: Well... At least the Royal Guard has proper military training. I guess we'll just have to see what happens.

1129204021021322--.name: Anyway, good work out there. A girl could get used to working so closely with you, if you know what I mean.

1129204021021323--.name: Are you ready to get to work?

1129204021021324--.name: I assume you're up to date on the $item:20000046$ smuggling situation.

1129204021021325--.name: Oh, yeah. I know all about that.

1129204021021326--.name: Um... Am I supposed to know about that?

1129204021021327--.name: Let me bring you up to speed. There are some bad dudes trying to smuggle $item:20000046$ into the empire from the Land of Darkness. And now you're up to speed.

1129204021021329--.name: My agents have been giving the smugglers a hard time, so they've decided to try making their own $item:20000046$ over here on our side of the Shadow Gate.

1129204021021330--.name: Apparently, the whole mess involves growing their own $itemPlural:20000102$ and fermenting the stuff in crates.

1129204021021331--.name: I want to get the $item:30000990$ before they do.

1129204021021332--.name: Head to $map:02000129$ and search the crates there for $item:30000990$. I'm counting on you.

1129204021021333--.name: Head to $map:02000129$ and search the crates there for $item:30000990$. I'm counting on you.

1129204021021334--.name: You've got the afterglow of a job well done.

1129204021021337--.name: Oh, I wish I could see the look on the smugglers' faces when they find their crates smashed and their product gone!

1129204021021338--.name: Nothing beats seeing bad guys lose and good guys win. You know what I'm saying?

1129204021021340--.name: Hm. If I give this $item:30000990$ to $npcName:11003536[gender:0]$ for analysis, maybe I can convince her to thank me... personally. This really is my day.

1129204021021343--.name: I'm sure you've heard the rumors about Blackstar's ties to the criminal underbelly of the Land of Darkness.

1129204021021344--.name: It's not exactly a well-kept secret.

1129204021021346--.name: No, it isn't. Anyway, my people have been keeping a close eye on them.

1129204021021348--.name: Well, now you have. Anyway, my people have been keeping a close eye on them.

1129204021021350--.name: Let's just say I've been following the money, and the money's all being funneled through Blackstar. They're stashing their cash away until they can launder it all.

1129204021021351--.name: Where can they hide all that money?

1129204021021352--.name: They've stuffed the cash into $npcNamePlural:21000714$, $npcNamePlural:21000720$, and $npcNamePlural:21000726$. Someone in their cartel must be a gamer.

1129204021021353--.name: Since they packaged up all that money so prettily for us, I say we should put it to good use. Mind heading to $map:02010010$ and confiscating their $itemPlural:30000991$?

1129204021021355--.name: I hope you had a nice visit to the mall.

1129204021021356--.name: Wow. Now this is a tidy sum of cash!

1129204021021357--.name: How do you plan to use all this?

1129204021021358--.name: Weapons and gear for field agents, to start with. With all the leftovers, maybe a little extra something for a few special someones...

1129204021021359--.name: I never took you for a dirty cop.

1129204021021360--.name: I mean, this'll go straight to the $map:02000001$ Veterans' Fund!

1129204021021363--.name: You ready to get your hands dirty?

1129204021021364--.name: My agents are everywhere. Well, almost everywhere. I hate to admit this, but we're a little shorthanded ever since the battle of $map:02000001$.

1129204021021365--.name: That's why I've turned to technology. Security cameras, to be specific. It's not as good as having my people lurking in every shadow, but it's better than nothing.

1129204021021366--.name: Of course, it's not a perfect system. We need someone to download their data from time to time. By someone, I mean you.

1129204021021367--.name: What do you need me to do?

1129204021021368--.name: Go to the $map:02000277$ and hack into their security system to get the $itemPlural:30000992$ there.

1129204021021370--.name: You didn't think they were our cameras, did you? Do you have any idea how those things are to set up? Anyway, try not to get caught!

1129204021021373--.name: Go to the $map:02000277$ and hack into their security system to get the $itemPlural:30000992$ there.

1129204021021374--.name: Let's see what you got for me.

1129204021021375--.name: Looks like you got all of the footage. Good job!

1129204021021376--.name: Just set up your own cameras next time...

1129204021021377--.name: And miss out on sending you on these fun missions? Nah.

1129204021021378--.name: Really, it's okay. Give me boring missions.

1129204021021379--.name: You'll miss the fun missions when they're gone, you know.

1129204021021380--.name: Anyway, thanks for the footage. Let's do this again real soon.

1129204021021382--.name: Blackstar. Those guys, right? The whole lot of 'em should be behind bars!

1129204021021384--.name: Everyone knows they're up to no good, but they're careful to never leave even a shred of physical evidence. The empire has a little thing called "due process" that stops us from just tossing them in Alikar and throwing away the key.

1129204021021385--.name: If only we could link them to their criminal accounts...

1129204021021387--.name: You sure about that, $MyPCName$? This kind of job requires subtlety...

1129204021021388--.name: Well, what have I got to lose? Surely one of the $npcNamePlural:11000505[gender:0]$ at $map:02010016$ knows something. Good luck!

1129204021021389--.name: You aren't coming back empty-handed already, are you?

1129204021021390--.name: Finally, we get to have a nice, intimate chat.

1129204021021391--.name: So, how'd it go? Uncover any juicy secrets?

1129204021021395--.name: No! These ledgers tell me nothing. But thanks for trying.

1129204021021396--.name: Dang. I thought I had them dead to rights.

1129204021021397--.name: We'll get 'em next time. Anyway, I'm touched that I didn't even have to ask you to do the mission this time. You must really like me!

1129204021021398--.name: Maybe next time, I'll go with you. Show you the real fun of field work.

1129204021021399--.name: Hey there, sweet stuff. I've got work for you.

1129204021021400--.name: You remember $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$, don't you? You know, the traitor to Dark Wind that you and $npcName:11000064[gender:0]$ kicked to the curb.

1129204021021402--.name: Well, we aren't done with him yet. That rat still has agents in the empire.

1129204021021403--.name: But I already took out $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$'s lackeys!

1129204021021404--.name: A few slipped our grasp. Ex-Dark Wind operatives. They know all our tricks and secrets, so tracking them down has been... frustrating.

1129204021021406--.name: There's a chance $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$ is with them. We can't let him escape again!

1129204021021407--.name: So, what's the plan? Sending a team of your best agents?

1129204021021679--.name: Thanks. The fate of the world will be decided at $map:02000086$!

1129204021021680--.name: I'm counting on you. Now get to $map:02000086$!

1129204021021681--.name: I've been waiting with baited breath.

1129204021021684--.name: I wish I could've been there to see it. There's nothing better than a $male:handsome guy,female:beautiful lady$ working up a sweat...

1129204021021686--.name: I'm not doing this for fun, you know.

1129204021021687--.name: Well, then! I'll have to see if I can drag myself away from the bridge next time!

1129204021021690--.name: You should take this more seriously...

1129204021021691--.name: Anyway, here's your reward. You know there's more where that came from!

1129204021021692--.name: You know, I've been thinking about you today.

1129204021021693--.name: Maybe you and I should find somewhere private to discuss these thoughts...

1129204021021694--.name: So, do you have a mission for me, or what?

1129204021021695--.name: Remember the guys who saw us off on our maiden voyage?

1129204021021697--.name: In their efforts to destroy Maple World, they've set their eyes on $map:02000412$.

1129204021021698--.name: The research performed at $map:02000412$ is top secret. Trust me, we do not want the Rooks to get their hands on it.

1129204021021699--.name: Can't you give me a little hint?

1129204021021700--.name: I love whispering little secrets into your ear, but this one is strictly confidential. Please just take care of this for me.

1129204021021702--.name: Thanks for understanding. Now get to $map:02000412$ and save Maple World!

1129204021021703--.name: I'm counting on you. Now get to $map:02000412$!

1129204021021704--.name: I'm ready for your report, $male:Prince Charming,female:princess$.

1129204021021707--.name: I wish I could've been there to see it. There's nothing better than a $male:handsome guy,female:beautiful lady$ working up a sweat...

1129204021021709--.name: I'm not doing this for fun, you know.

1129204021021710--.name: Well, then! I'll have to see if I can drag myself away from the bridge next time!

1129204021021713--.name: You should take this more seriously...

1129204021021714--.name: Anyway, here's your reward. You know there's more where that came from!

1129204021021912--.name: You, uh, want something from me?

1129204021021913--.name: You have your mission. Get to work.

1129204021021914--.name: But you haven't actually said anything...

1129204021021915--.name: I suppose it was too much to hope that my telepathic briefing would get through your thick skull.

1129204021021917--.name: The Lumiknights are spearheading an investigation into the Land of Darkness. In your travels, have you ever encountered the $npcNamePlural:40000018$ of $map:03000146$?

1129204021021920--.name: No offense, but I'd feel better if I explained everything to you anyway.

1129204021021922--.name: That's fine. I wasn't expecting you to know much of anything to begin with.

1129204021021924--.name: $npcNamePlural:40000018$ are never found without their green lanterns. For these lanterns to emit light through the intense miasma of the Land of Darkness... They must possess tremendous energy, you see.

1129204021021925--.name: The Lumiknights wish to analyze this energy. I trust you can collect this $item:30000994$ for me.

1129204021021926--.name: I trust you can collect this $item:30000994$ for me.

1129204021021927--.name: I have dreamed of this moment.

1129204021021930--.name: Interesting. In the hands of the $npcNamePlural:40000018$, these lanterns are brilliantly luminescent. But this oil seems as if it could hardly light a normal lamp. Is it... out of battery?

1129204021021931--.name: Maybe they have a psychic connection to the spirits.

1129204021021932--.name: You may leave the analysis to the Lumiknights. Anyway, here is your payment, as is custom.

1129204021021933--.name: I've a new task for you, if you would heed the call.

1129204021021934--.name: The Lumiknights are spearheading a full investigation of the Land of Darkness. I've recently taken an interest in the $npcNamePlural:40000136$ that wander the $map:03000130$.

1129204021021935--.name: I didn't know you like to play with dolls.

1129204021021936--.name: My interest or disinterest in dolls is none of your business. Please keep such foolish jokes to yourself.

1129204021021938--.name: How can I explain this so that you would understand? I believe that the $npcNamePlural:40000136$ are filled with rage because they are made from $itemPlural:30000995$, which are infused with shadow magic.

1129204021021939--.name: But how did they get filled with darkness in the first place?

1129204021021940--.name: That is a surprisingly adept query. I wish you to go to the $map:03000130$, vanquish the $npcNamePlural:40000136$, and return with their $itemPlural:30000995$. Then we will see about answering this question of yours.

1129204021021941--.name: I wish you to go to the $map:03000130$, vanquish the $npcNamePlural:40000136$, and return with their $itemPlural:30000995$.

1129204021021943--.name: No, they cling to the $itemPlural:30000995$ in your pack. I was very close to exorcising you with my blade...

1129204021021944--.name: Anyway, I did what you asked.

1129204021021945--.name: Yes. Most fascinating. To think that simple botanical matter could prove so efficacious at channeling dark magic...

1129204021021946--.name: You may leave the analysis to the Lumiknights. Anyway, here is your payment, as is custom.

1129204021021948--.name: I'm transmitting images directly into your mind!

1129204021021950--.name: Nothing? Let's try this again. Open your minds eye... Can you see my message?

1129204021021952--.name: Fine, I'll resort to inefficient verbal communication. My organization is presently researching the $npcNamePlural:40000055$ who reside within the Land of Darkness.

1129204021021953--.name: These dull creatures spend their days listlessly wandering about with a vacant expression upon their faces. Much like the one upon your face now, in fact.

1129204021021955--.name: I suspect the source of their witlessness to be the dark staves they carry. They've no choice in the matter, of course—once possessed, these staves are cursed to fuse to the poor creatures' hands.

1129204021021956--.name: You're just gonna ignore me, huh?

1129204021021957--.name: Go to $map:03000003$, defeat the cursed $npcNamePlural:40000055$, and retrieve the crystal balls from their staves.

1129204021021958--.name: Go to $map:03000003$, defeat the cursed $npcNamePlural:40000055$, and retrieve the crystal balls from their staves.

1129204021021959--.name: The wind foretold of your success.

1129204021021960--.name: And yet... these are not the crystals I requested.

1129204021021961--.name: I tried to get them to you in one piece, but I could only get these $itemPlural:30000996$.

1129204021021962--.name: What am I supposed to do with these? Was I not explicitly clear that I needed the intact crystal balls?

1129204021021963--.name: You could try gluing them back together.

1129204021021964--.name: These are no mere trinkets that you can simply "glue" together!

1129204021021965--.name: So what, you're giving up without even trying? Hmph! Back in my day, we weren't afraid of a little glue!

1129204021021966--.name: I believe that is my cue to wrap this up. Thank you for your... efforts, $MyPCName$.

1129204021021967--.name: You are compelled to aid me. Do not deny it.

1129204021021968--.name: The Lumiknights are continuing their research into the Land of Darkness. I need you to venture into that den of seething evil and retrieve $itemPlural:30000997$.

1129204021021969--.name: And why am I doing this?

1129204021021970--.name: Allow me to explain in terms simple enough for you to understand.

1129204021021972--.name: The $npcNamePlural:40000071$ have always been savage. However, since arriving at $map:03000143$, their savagery has grown a thousandfold.

1129204021021973--.name: I believe it is something in the water.

1129204021021974--.name: Go to $map:03000143$, defeat the $npcNamePlural:40000071$, and return with the $itemPlural:30000997$.

1129204021021975--.name: Go to $map:03000143$, defeat the $npcNamePlural:40000071$, and return with the $itemPlural:30000997$.

1129204021021976--.name: I have dreamed of this moment.

1129204021021979--.name: I sense no darkness within this water. I shall have to investigate further...

1129204021021980--.name: Maybe it wasn't the water that turned them savage. Maybe it was seeing your face.

1129204021021981--.name: Once again, your humor is lacking. Nonetheless, I appreciate your feeble attempt at nurturing camaraderie between us.

1129204021021983--.name: You may leave the analysis to the Lumiknights. Anyway, here is your payment, as is custom.

1129204021021986--.name: You, uh, want something from me?

1129204021021987--.name: You have your mission. Get to work.

1129204021021988--.name: But you haven't actually said anything...

1129204021021989--.name: I suppose it was too much to hope that my telepathic briefing would get through your thick skull. In short, I require $item:30000998$ samples.

1129204021021990--.name: The $npcNamePlural:40000134$ receive a constant IV drip of potent medicine, and yet they're constantly ill.

1129204021021991--.name: I suspect that this is due to the $itemPlural:30000998$. I believe that, once ingested, one can never recover from its poison.

1129204021021992--.name: I don't think I need telepathy for you to understand what I'm going to say next.

1129204021021994--.name: Go to $map:03000057$, defeat the $npcNamePlural:40000134$, and return with the $itemPlural:30000998$.

1129204021021995--.name: Go to $map:03000057$, defeat the $npcNamePlural:40000134$, and return with the $itemPlural:30000998$.

1129204021021997--.name: No, they cling to the $itemPlural:30000998$ in your pack. I was very close to exorcising you with my blade...

1129204021021998--.name: Anyway, I did what you asked.

1129204021021999--.name: Now, let us begin our experiment. Would you like to take the first bite of $item:30000998$, or shall I?

1129204021022000--.name: I-I just remembered, I have to be... not here.

1129204021022001--.name: More $itemPlural:30000998$ for me, I suppose. Before you go, here is your reward.

1129204021022002--.name: I've a new task for you, if you would heed the call.

1129204021022003--.name: The Lumiknights are spearheading a full investigation of the Land of Darkness. I've recently taken an interest in the $npcNamePlural:40000080$ that wander $map:03000165$.

1129204021022004--.name: So you like a big, strong woman who knows how to keeps things clean, do you?

1129204021022005--.name: What a small, dim perspective you must have, $MyPCName$. My interest in $npcNamePlural:40000080$ is purely intellectual. As a species, they've undergone a sudden transformation.

1129204021022007--.name: As you might have guessed from the name, the $npcName:40000080$ is a tidy creature by nature. But, quite suddenly, they've become obsessed with rolling in the dirt.

1129204021022008--.name: We suspect that the source of this change lies in the $item:30000999$ that fills their environment.

1129204021022009--.name: Go to $map:03000165$, defeat the cursed $npcNamePlural:40000080$, and return with the $item:30000999$.

1129204021022011--.name: You don't need to say anything.

1129204021022013--.name: And indeed, I sense dark magic within this $item:30000999$.

1129204021022014--.name: For such a transformation to be triggered by mere contact, without ingestion... Very interesting.

1129204021022015--.name: The Lumiknights will investigate this matter closely. Thank you.

1129204021022019--.name: So impatient! If you'd wait but a minute, I could explain everything in minute detail.

1129204021022020--.name: No need for details. Just tell me where to find them.

1129204021022021--.name: As I'm sure you're aware, $npcNamePlural:40000122$ are consummate... well, thieves. Even so, historically they've been mostly harmless. It wasn't until they stole a collection of $itemPlural:30001000$ from an abandoned lab that they became violent.

1129204021022022--.name: I really don't need the whole history lesson...

1129204021022023--.name: These $itemPlural:30001000$ are focal points for dark magic. I'd like to examine their properties personally.

1129204021022027--.name: These must be the $itemPlural:30001000$ that I requested.

1129204021022029--.name: Such potent darkness... I look forward to discovering how these were made.

1129204021022032--.name: I need you to venture into that den of seething evil and retrieve $itemPlural:30001001$. In the name of research, of course.

1129204021022049--.name: The Lumiknights believe that her remains fuel the shadow magic that fills the Land of Darkness.

1129204021022050--.name: Wherever any piece of this goddess is buried, the land becomes corrupted. Evil.

1129204021022188--.name: Among the Lumiknights' many responsibilities, safeguarding the World Stones is one of our most important.

1129204021022189--.name: These stones repulse dark magic, helping to keep the Land of Darkness at bay.

1129204021022191--.name: Recently, however, the darkness has grown too intense. One of our World Stones has fractured.

1129204021022192--.name: I've got a bad feeling about this...

1129204021022193--.name: Even though you're not a Lumiknight, I'd like your assistance in this matter.

1129204021022195--.name: Go to the $map:02000146$ and repair the World Stone.

1129204021022196--.name: Go to the $map:02000146$ and repair the World Stone.

1129204021022197--.name: I can sense that the darkness has lessened.

1129204021022198--.name: You've repaired the World Stone, then.

1129204021022201--.name: All the same, you've shown that you have potential. Thank you.

1129204021022202--.name: Among the Lumiknights' many responsibilities, safeguarding the World Stones is one of our most important.

1129204021022203--.name: These stones repulse dark magic, helping to keep the Land of Darkness at bay.

1129204021022205--.name: Unfortunately, we've had trouble with our World Stone in the $map:02000192$. It seems that a $npcName:21091023$ mistook it for a precious gem and struck it with his pickaxe.

1129204021022206--.name: I've got a bad feeling about this...

1129204021022207--.name: Even though you're not a Lumiknight, I'd like your assistance in this matter.

1129204021022209--.name: Go to the $map:02000192$ and repair the World Stone.

1129204021022210--.name: Go to the $map:02000192$ and repair the World Stone.

1129204021022211--.name: I can sense that the darkness has lessened.

1129204021022212--.name: You've repaired the World Stone, then.

1129204021022215--.name: All the same, you've shown that you have potential. Thank you.

1129204021022216--.name: Among the Lumiknights' many responsibilities, safeguarding the World Stones is one of our most important.

1129204021022217--.name: These stones repulse dark magic, helping to keep the Land of Darkness at bay.

1129204021022219--.name: Recently, however, the darkness has grown too intense. One of our World Stones has fractured.

1129204021022220--.name: I've got a bad feeling about this...

1129204021022221--.name: Even though you're not a Lumiknight, I'd like your assistance in this matter.

1129204021022223--.name: Go to the $map:02000180$ and repair the World Stone.

1129204021022224--.name: Go to the $map:02000180$ and repair the World Stone.

1129204021022225--.name: I can sense that the darkness has lessened.

1129204021022226--.name: You've repaired the World Stone, then.

1129204021022229--.name: All the same, you've shown that you have potential. Thank you.

1129204021022230--.name: The Green Hoods have been thoroughly analyzing different items in Maple World in search of new ways these everyday items can be utilized.

1129204021022231--.name: Our current subject is $item:30000231$, which has rejuvenating effects.

1129204021022232--.name: It's used in energy tonics and tinctures as a gimmick. I want to see if it actually has rejuvenating effects!

1129204021022233--.name: I just need a few samples to get started.

1129204021022234--.name: That's all from me! I leave it to you!

1129204021022235--.name: I need you to collect some $item:30000231$ samples for analysis.

1129204021022236--.name: Excellent! I'll send these straight to the lab.

1129204021022237--.name: We're always looking for more samples for our research. I'll be in touch soon!

1129204021022238--.name: I need you to collect some $item:30000233$ samples for analysis.

1129204021022239--.name: In small doses, $itemPlural:30000233$ is an important ingredient for a wide variety of potions. However, it thrives in dark places, so we're worried it might be dangerous in larger portions.

1129204021022241--.name: I need you to collect some $item:30000233$ samples for analysis.

1129204021022242--.name: Excellent! I'll send these straight to the lab.

1129204021022243--.name: We're always looking for more samples for our research. I'll be in touch soon!

1129204021022244--.name: I need you to gather $itemPlural:30000232$ for my research.

1129204021022245--.name: For some reason, $itemPlural:30000232$ are extremely popular amongst the young men and women of Maple World. I've tried to figure out why for ages. I even asked Condor, but he wouldn't tell me.

1129204021022246--.name: I know why. If you want, sweet Nainai, I can show you in person...

1129204021022248--.name: While you're at it, pick some up for me. I'm fresh out.

1129204021022249--.name: I need these $itemPlural:30000232$ for research, not for eating... or whatever it is you do with them!

1129204021022251--.name: Not you, too! Ugh! You guys are skeeving me out!

1129204021022252--.name: It's clear I need to run a detailed analysis on this. I'll need a lot of samples, please, $MyPCName$.

1129204021022253--.name: I need you to gather $itemPlural:30000232$ for my research.

1129204021022254--.name: Excellent! I'll send these straight to the lab.

1129204021022255--.name: We're always looking for more samples for our research. I'll be in touch soon!

1129204021022256--.name: I'd like you to gather some $item:30000230$ samples.

1129204021022257--.name: At a glance, $item:30000230$ looks like common water. But use it to mix your potions, and you'll see a huge difference in effectiveness.

1129204021022258--.name: I think we've only scratched the surface of what this stuff to do! Of course, I'll need a lot of it for analysis if I'm going to prove my theory.

1129204021022259--.name: I'd like you to gather some $item:30000230$ samples.

1129204021022260--.name: Excellent! I'll send these straight to the lab.

1129204021022261--.name: We're always looking for more samples for our research. I'll be in touch soon!

1129204021022262--.name: I'd like you to gather some $item:30000242$ samples. It's a pretty common cooking ingredient.

1129204021022263--.name: The problem is, nobody knows what $item:30000242$ is or even where it comes from. For all we know, it could be slowly poisoning everyone who eats it!

1129204021022264--.name: We've got the equipment to analyze it here, so that's what I want to do. Bring back as many samples as you can.

1129204021022265--.name: I'd like you to gather some $item:30000242$ samples. It's a pretty common cooking ingredient.

1129204021022266--.name: Excellent! I'll send these straight to the lab.

1129204021022267--.name: We're always looking for more samples for our research. I'll be in touch soon!

1129204021022268--.name: I'd like you to gather some $item:30000240$ samples. It's a pretty common cooking ingredient.

1129204021022269--.name: It's actually a popular ingredient at restaurants all over Victoria Island. A little scary, considering we don't know what it even is...

1129204021022270--.name: And the only way we'll find out is if we get it under a microscope. Please collect as many samples as you can.

1129204021022271--.name: I'd like you to gather some $item:30000240$ samples. It's a pretty common cooking ingredient.

1129204021022272--.name: Excellent! I'll send these straight to the lab.

1129204021022273--.name: We're always looking for more samples for our research. I'll be in touch soon!

1129204021022274--.name: I'd like you to gather some $item:30000241$ samples. It's a pretty common cooking ingredient.

1129204021022275--.name: I honestly don't know what to make of it. No matter what dish it's used in, the dish always retains its original flavor. So why is this seasoning so popular? And how can we put it to good use?

1129204021022276--.name: We really need to study it from all angles, so I'm going to need a lot of the stuff.

1129204021022277--.name: I'd like you to gather some $item:30000241$ samples. It's a pretty common cooking ingredient.

1129204021022278--.name: Excellent! I'll send these straight to the lab.

1129204021022279--.name: We're always looking for more samples for our research. I'll be in touch soon!

1129204021022280--.name: We're trying to keep our forces in fighting shape, but we didn't exactly have time to fully stock our armory.

1129204021022281--.name: Our troops barely have enough weapons to share between them. That's why I'm collecting used weapons and gear. Hey, everything helps, right?

1129204021022282--.name: If you have any weapons or gear that you no longer use, consider donating them to the Alliance.

1129204021022283--.name: If you have any weapons or gear that you no longer use, consider donating them to the Alliance.

1129204021022284--.name: Thank you! This gear will help arm the Alliance's soldiers!

1129204021022285--.name: The Alliance grows stronger with your contribution, $MyPCName$!

1129204021022286--.name: We're trying to keep our forces in fighting shape, but we didn't exactly have time to fully stock our armory.

1129204021022287--.name: Our troops barely have enough weapons to share between them. That's why I'm collecting used weapons and gear. Hey, everything helps, right?

1129204021022288--.name: If you have any weapons or gear that you no longer use, consider donating them to the Alliance.

1129204021022289--.name: If you have any weapons or gear that you no longer use, consider donating them to the Alliance.

1129204021022290--.name: Thank you! This gear will help arm the Alliance's soldiers!

1129204021022291--.name: The Alliance grows stronger with your contribution, $MyPCName$!

1129204021022292--.name: Sky Fortress wasn't cheap to fix up. In fact, we've barely got enough money left over to feed our troops!

1129204021022293--.name: We need a wealthy donor to help top of our coffers. Someone like you. So, what do you say?

1129204021022294--.name: We need a wealthy donor to help top of our coffers. Someone like you. So, what do you say?

1129204021022296--.name: This is enough to fund an entire regiment! Thank you so much!

1129204021022297--.name: The Royal Guard is busy rebuilding Tria, the greatest city in Maple World!

1129204021022298--.name: I'd be there working right alongside them if I could. But I've gotta stay up here, so I'm sending you, instead.

1129204021022299--.name: It's no problem, $npcName:11003534[gender:0]$. I'd be happy to—

1129204021022300--.name: Not talking to you, pretty boy.

1129204021022301--.name: Anyway, as I was saying, the city needs $itemPlural:33000063$! Do your civic duty and get some to help reconstruct Tria!

1129204021022303--.name: Are you yanking my chain, cadet?! Mine the ore and smith the ingots yourself! Honestly, you kids want everything handed to them.

1129204021022304--.name: You're still here? Do your civic duty and collect some $itemPlural:33000063$ to help reconstruct Tria!

1129204021022305--.name: You worked up one heck of a sweat, cadet! Looks like my lessons are finally starting to rub off on you!

1129204021022306--.name: The news is dire, cadet. We block Madria on one front, and she attacks again from another. The damage she's causing is massive.

1129204021022307--.name: The sheer amount of resources we've been pouring into reconstructing the areas she's destroyed makes me shake my darn head. It's gotten so bad, we even need to enlist your help, when you're about as useful as a baby cat.

1129204021022310--.name: Never mind that... Listen close, because I don't like repeating myself. Right now, the city needs $itemPlural:33000064$. Got that?

1129204021022311--.name: I suggest you use your skills as a miner and smith to craft the $itemPlural:33000064$.

1129204021022312--.name: Carry out $npcName:11003534[gender:0]$'s mission, as directed. And if you happen to see any kittens... capture them and bring them to me for interrogation!

1129204021022313--.name: You haven't left yet? The $itemPlural:33000064$ aren't going to collect themselves. Get a move on, cadet!

1129204021022314--.name: This'll do. I grudgingly admit you're kind of useful to have around.

1129204021022316--.name: Yes, there you are. I need you to—

1129204021022317--.name: Excuse me! I'm giving $MyPCName$ a mission right now! Cadet, I'm sending out to collect $itemPlural:33000065$.

1129204021022318--.name: Remember, you can get them with your mining and smithing skills. Now, go!

1129204021022320--.name: Hmph. I'm sure it was my turn to borrow $MyPCName$...

1129204021022321--.name: What are you doing, cadet?! Co collect $itemPlural:33000065$ for the city! Remember, you can get them with your mining and smithing skills.

1129204021022322--.name: This will work for now. Thanks.

1129204021022323--.name: After Madria's invasion, the city is facing a food shortage. The ranching infrastructure just isn't being fixed quickly enough to meet demand.

1129204021022324--.name: I think some $itemPlural:20000352$ could help. They double ranching production.

1129204021022326--.name: I'm full of amazing facts. You should know this by now, cadet.

1129204021022327--.name: What're you just gaping at me for? Go get a pair of $item:20000352$ to help the city! You know you get them from mining and smithing, right?

1129204021022328--.name: What're you just gaping at me for? Go get a pair of $item:20000352$ to help the city! You know you get them from mining and smithing, right?

1129204021022329--.name: Nice job, cadet. This should make a big difference!

1129204021022330--.name: Do you see this two-thousand-page report I'm holding? It's an outline of all the damage Madria's invasion has caused the city!

1129204021022331--.name: Our banks are failing. The whole country's going broke! Don't just stand there, cadet. You can turn this around! Donate $itemPlural:33000066$ to give the economy a kick in the pants!

1129204021022332--.name: Dig up the earth and smelt the $itemPlural:33000066$ yourself if you have to. The future of the empire is riding on your sweaty, overworked back!

1129204021022333--.name: Dig up the earth and smelt the $itemPlural:33000066$ yourself if you have to. The future of the empire is riding on your sweaty, overworked back!

1129204021022334--.name: This should be enough to launch a brand new trade ship. You're making a difference, cadet!

1129204021022335--.name: We've got blacksmiths and other volunteers working to fix up the city, but it's still not enough! It doesn't help that the younger blacksmiths keep whining about their legally provided 10 minute break every 4 hours.

1129204021022336--.name: Back in my day, blacksmiths didn't take breaks! They got the work done, no matter what! I know a few blacksmiths who didn't sleep for a week, just to get their orders ready on time.

1129204021022337--.name: I shudder to think about the condition of the items they made.

1129204021022339--.name: Now, I'll let you in on a little secret. When I use a $item:20000358$, it increases my smithing production sixfold!

1129204021022340--.name: Get me a $item:20000358$ to give to the blacksmiths. That should ramp things up!

1129204021022341--.name: Get me a $item:20000358$ to give to the blacksmiths. That should ramp things up!

1129204021022342--.name: Not bad, kid. I bet you didn't take any ten-minute breaks while you completed his mission for me! BAHAHAHAHA!

1129204021022343--.name: Even with the Royal Guard providing its full support, our ranchers aren't pulling their weight.

1129204021022344--.name: In ranching, you need experienced, knowledgeable workers to get the most out of your animals and crops, but a lot of those people were badly injured in the invasion. The people they've sent as temporarily replacements are about as efficient as... as... as baby chicks!

1129204021022345--.name: You laugh, but baby chicks are quite effective when used as a casting medium for the obscure art of ornimancy.

1129204021022346--.name: I can never tell if he's joking.

1129204021022347--.name: Anyway, what we need now is mastery! Knowledge! Experience! And I know just the thing!

1129204021022349--.name: Oh, right. You! We need you!

1129204021022351--.name: Get me a pair of $item:20000353$, and I'll show those ranchers how they can double their production. Mine up the ore and smith it yourself if you have to!

1129204021022353--.name: Not bad, cadet. Not bad at all.

1129204021022354--.name: That Madria's a crafty one. On their way out, her army razed whole swaths of farmland.

1129204021022355--.name: We're facing food shortages all over the empire. Trust me, starvation is a cruel way to go.

1129204021022356--.name: You kids don't know hunger like my generation. I reckon we don't have long before you all give up...

1129204021022357--.name: If I may! The entire crew—including us "kids"—have agreed to cut our rations in half to help keep the civilian population fed.

1129204021022358--.name: W-what? Really? I mean, that's right! I spear-headed that measure myself, for the good of Maple World!

1129204021022359--.name: Anyhow, there's no life without food...

1129204021022360--.name: And $item:33000147$ is nutritious and cheap. If you're any good at farming or cooking, you can help scrounge some up for the hungry.

1129204021022361--.name: Well? What are you waiting for? Get to farming, cadet!

1129204021022362--.name: Use your farming and cooking skills to make $item:33000147$!

1129204021022363--.name: This will feed a ton of people. Thanks!

1129204021022364--.name: I've gotten reports that some folks who fled their homes because of Madria's attacks are suffering from food shortages and a lack of warm clothing. This is not good, cadet!

1129204021022365--.name: We need these folks to survive! Otherwise, what are we even fighting for?

1129204021022366--.name: I can withstand the harsh winter winds, thanks to my muscular frame and lush facial hair, but you can't expect that from your average civilian.

1129204021022367--.name: Weren't you just complaining this morning that the upper deck was too windy?

1129204021022368--.name: Anyway, when it comes to muscles, I prefer a build like $MyPCName$'s. Strong, but... flexible!

1129204021022369--.name: You don't know what you're talking about! The wind wasn't making me cold, it was ruining my coif. Do you know how much gel my single bang requires?!

1129204021022370--.name: Anyway, the best way to beat the cold is by eating hot food. So I thought of something simple, filling, and warm: $item:20000431$!

1129204021022371--.name: Make some $item:20000431$ for the hungry folks below!

1129204021022372--.name: You better use enough seasoning. I'll be taste-testing the $item:20000431$ myself.

1129204021022373--.name: You better use enough seasoning. I'll be taste-testing the $item:20000431$ myself.

1129204021022374--.name: Mmm, something smells delicious. You did good, cadet. Maybe you have "Condor's Personal Chef" written in your future after all of this is over.

1129204021022375--.name: There aren't enough cakes to go around, so some civilians have been eating $item:30000242$ by the jarful. No way that's good for you. Not that I can blame them, though. The stuff's delicious.

1129204021022376--.name: Wait just one moment here. Did you take food from those poor, starving people?

1129204021022377--.name: What?! No! It was all for the greater good! Anyway, it's obvious the people are craving sugar because they're coping with their stress...

1129204021022378--.name: I can't just stand idly by and let them eat poison! We should give them some nice, sweet fruit to tide them over.

1129204021022379--.name: Some apples should do the trick! A sweet, juicy, nutritious snack for everyone!

1129204021022380--.name: What're you waiting for? Make some $itemPlural:33000149$ for the hungry! You know how to farm and cook, don't you?

1129204021022381--.name: What're you waiting for? Make some $itemPlural:33000149$ for the hungry! You know how to farm and cook, don't you?

1129204021022382--.name: Hey, these look pretty tasty. Thanks!

1129204021022383--.name: Apparently our last shipment of apples spoiled before they even got to the refugees from our fight against the shadows. Who would've thought, right?

1129204021022384--.name: Such a waste. I knew I should've sampled more before I sent them off to be delivered. They ended up going to complete and utter waste. What do we do now?

1129204021022385--.name: Hey, you! Luminknight! You got any ideas? What're you munching on right now?

1129204021022386--.name: What? Me? These are chips. When I keep them sealed, they stay crisp for a long time. Want one?

1129204021022387--.name: This is not time to be munching on—

1129204021022388--.name: I just got the best idea! Chips! $itemPlural:20000420$! If we prepare some of those for the people, they'll stay fresh long enough to actually reach them!

1129204021022389--.name: Oooh, apple chips. You're a genius, Condor. I see you in a totally different light now.

1129204021022390--.name: Why are you still here, $MyPCName$? Shouldn't you be making $itemPlural:20000420$ with your farming and cooking skills right about now?

1129204021022391--.name: Hey, if you're making some anyway, why don't you whip up a couple extra batches for the crew and officers of Sky Fortress?

1129204021022392--.name: Why are you still here, $MyPCName$? Shouldn't you be making $itemPlural:20000420$ with your farming and cooking skills right about now? I refuse to let anyone starve!

1129204021022393--.name: Ah, that looks tasty! I sure hope it curbs my, er, the residents' sweet tooth!

1129204021022394--.name: We've got a new problem, cadet.

1129204021022395--.name: Times are tough. We've sent off most of our reserve food supplies to civilians in need. Rightly so, but it means the Royal Guards are looking rather scrawny.

1129204021022396--.name: It's not as if I can ease up on their training. The men have to be ready to fight at any moment, after all.

1129204021022397--.name: But they keep giving me these puppy dog looks, as if they're starving, or sick, or dying...

1129204021022398--.name: I could try slicing up some pine mushroom for your men. That's pretty nutritious.

1129204021022399--.name: Can't say no to that, I guess. Very well. Go make some $item:33000150$ for my men!

1129204021022400--.name: Go fetch some $itemPlural:33000150$ for my men!

1129204021022401--.name: My men will be grateful for this. If they're not, it'll be a thousand more push-ups.

1129204021022402--.name: It's not easy rebuilding Tria. Everyone's growing weary at the slow progress.

1129204021022403--.name: Can you blame them? Their quality of life has corroded. I wish I could put a smile on everyone's face again.

1129204021022404--.name: Oooh, I know! I always smile when I eat. Why don't you try giving them some delicious food?

1129204021022405--.name: How am I supposed to do that? Everyone's always complaining that the food from our reserve supplies are bland.

1129204021022406--.name: Actually, that gives me an idea! Why don't we add $item:20000426$ to the food? That'll make it burst with flavor!

1129204021022407--.name: Obviously, only someone familiar with farming and cooking could provide that ingredient.

1129204021022408--.name: Actually, that gives me an idea! Why don't we add $item:20000426$ to the food? That'll make it burst with flavor!

1129204021022411--.name: We're making steady progress on Tria's reconstruction, thanks to the effort of folks like me, but I'm seeing more and more people skipping meals.

1129204021022412--.name: Can't say I blame them. Who cares if you're a little hungry when you're busy rebuilding lives? Still, we can't have workers passing out on the job.

1129204021022413--.name: Why don't I make them a snack that they can eat while they work?

1129204021022414--.name: That's not a bad idea. If you've got the farming and cooking chops, why don't you slice up some oranges for the workers?

1129204021022415--.name: Support those who work tirelessly to rebuild by preparing some $itemPlural:33000151$!

1129204021022417--.name: Ah, the $itemPlural:33000151$! Perfect! It should be simple enough to preserve these, right?

1129204021022418--.name: I'll have some of my men get on it right away.

1129204021022419--.name: The invasion may be over, but the fight continues on...

1129204021022420--.name: It's a blasted embarrassment is what it is. We don't have enough medicine to go around.

1129204021022421--.name: Our tonics and potions go to the soldiers who were hurt the most. For everyone else... Well, they'll have to get by with $item:33000132$.

1129204021022422--.name: Use your harvesting and alchemy skills to make $item:33000132$ for the sick and injured.

1129204021022423--.name: Use your harvesting and alchemy skills to make $item:33000132$ for the sick and injured.

1129204021022424--.name: What took you so long? Lives are on the line here!

1129204021022425--.name: Hand over that $item:33000132$. The stuff is basically snake oil, but it's all we can scrounge up. Thanks.

1129204021022426--.name: My men still suffer from the wounds they received during the invasion...

1129204021022427--.name: They suffer in silence, but I know something that can help them: lavender. It's known for it's pain-relieving properties.

1129204021022428--.name: Now, you're supposed to give to them as an oil, but we don't have time for that. Instead, we'll light some $itemPlural:20000405$ in the bunks.

1129204021022429--.name: Will that really help them with their pain? Some of them are really hurt.

1129204021022430--.name: Of course it will! Now stop dallying and get some $itemPlural:20000405$!

1129204021022433--.name: Mmmm, that's the stuff. With this lavender and some grit, my bath will be fabulous to—I mean, there's nothing my men can't do!

1129204021022435--.name: I sent a squad to fight some bug monsters that were hounding a village in the boonies. Some of them were bitten, and now they itch like mad.

1129204021022436--.name: Worse, they can't seem to stop scratching. Say, how are your foraging and alchemy skills, kid?

1129204021022438--.name: Great! Then obtain some $item:33000134$ for my men. It should help with the itching.

1129204021022439--.name: Obtain some $item:33000134$ for my men. It should help with the itching.

1129204021022440--.name: Smells like you got what I asked for.

1129204021022441--.name: I'll get it to my men right away.

1129204021022443--.name: Shhh, no, don't look at me!

1129204021022445--.name: Secrecy? What? No! What're you— Never mind. You're skilled at foraging and alchemy, right? Have you heard of $item:20000408$?

1129204021022446--.name: I've been taking $itemPlural:20000408$, but it's hard to get enough rosemary for it on my own.

1129204021022447--.name: Yeah. I know that stuff! It's used to cure baldness, isn't it?

1129204021022448--.name: By the light, keep your voice down! Anyway, can you get me some?

1129204021022451--.name: Now go and make me some $itemPlural:20000408$!

1129204021022453--.name: Hey, this $item:20000408$ is not too shabby, not too shabby at all. Thanks, cadet. I owe you one.

1129204021022455--.name: Sorry for sneezing on you, but it just goes to show: nobody's immune to the common cold. Let my germs be a warning to you.

1129204021022456--.name: I bet some $item:33000135$ would perk you right up.

1129204021022457--.name: $item:33000135$? You some sort of alchemist? Sure, might as well give it a shot. I mean, look at me, I'm miserable.

1129204021022458--.name: I'll wait here for that $item:33000135$ you promised.

1129204021022460--.name: Thanks, kid. This should help my men as well.

1129204021022461--.name: Are you ready to do your duty for $map:02000001$?

1129204021022462--.name: Some of my men were battling toxic monsters, and a lot of them got poisoned. We need to obtain an antidote for them as quickly as we can!

1129204021022466--.name: Obtain some $itemPlural:20000414$ to detoxify my poisoned men.

1129204021022467--.name: Well? You got what I asked for?

1129204021022468--.name: I'll get this $item:20000414$ to my men right away.

1129204021022469--.name: Battle scars are a mark of honor!

1129204021022470--.name: But that doesn't mean I can let my men's wounds fester and become infected. I propose we make a cure-all tonic to treat their injuries.

1129204021022471--.name: Sure. Just tell me where to pick it up!

1129204021022472--.name: You don't already know? I figured you'd... Never mind. Of course I know. $item:33000136$ is used in plenty of potions and tonics, so I bet that stuff will do the trick.

1129204021022473--.name: Use your foraging and alchemy skills to bring me some $itemPlural:33000136$!

1129204021022475--.name: I'll get this straight to my medics. Good work.

1129204021022476--.name: When you look around, the devastation caused by Madria goes as far as the eye can see!

1129204021022477--.name: Major roads, blocked! Sea paths, in chaos! And none of it has been restored. Major you can't see it, $MyPCName$, but trust me, the effects are massive and far-reaching.

1129204021022478--.name: We've put up tents to help house those who've been displaced, but the fabric is starting to fray and tear. Can you use your ranching and handicraft skills to get some $item:33000076$ so we can fix up the tents?

1129204021022479--.name: Will you use your ranching and handicraft skills to obtain $item:33000076$ so we can repair the tents?

1129204021022481--.name: You've brought the $item:33000076$! Thank you. That should be enough to last for a while.

1129204021022482--.name: Look alive. We've got work to do.

1129204021022483--.name: I need $item:33000077$. It's a crucial ingredient for a lot of the everyday items you take for granted.

1129204021022484--.name: It used to be easy to get. Ever since the attack on the capital, however, we can't seem to get our hands on the stuff. Will you make some for the Royal Guard?

1129204021022485--.name: Will you obtain $item:33000077$ for the Royal Guard?

1129204021022486--.name: I see you got the supplies I asked for.

1129204021022487--.name: Perfect. My men will make good use of this. I'll let you know if we need more.

1129204021022489--.name: Lots of things are made from $item:33000078$, for example. But when's the last time you saw $item:33000078$ just lying around?

1129204021022490--.name: I almost never see $item:33000078$ lying around.

1129204021022491--.name: Let me fill you in on how we got to this sorry state of affairs. Civilians, driven from their homes by the forces of darkness, get so hungry they'll eat anything—even $item:33000078$. Nothing we can do about that, so we just have to make more.

1129204021022492--.name: Support the Royal Guards by obtaining $item:33000078$ for us.

1129204021022493--.name: I see you got the supplies I asked for.

1129204021022494--.name: Perfect. My men will make good use of this. I'll let you know if we need more.

1129204021022495--.name: I left my heart... in... beautiful $map:02000001$...

1129204021022496--.name: All of Maple World suffers when $map:02000001$ suffers, and $map:02000001$ is suffering right now, with its outer palace walls in complete disarray.

1129204021022497--.name: We're always short on materials and men, so it's slow going.

1129204021022498--.name: A nice $item:20000345$ would help speed things up. Why don't you make one for me?

1129204021022499--.name: Bring $itemPlural:20000345$ so we can fix $map:02000001$'s palace walls.

1129204021022500--.name: I see you got the supplies I asked for.

1129204021022501--.name: Perfect. My men will make good use of this. I'll let you know if we need more.

1129204021022503--.name: My men are weak and scrawny. I can barely stand to look at them. The only way for them to get stronger is... $item:33000079$! Mix it in their drinks, sprinkle it on their meals, shove it down their throats... Whatever it takes!

1129204021022505--.name: Why don't I just get you some milk?

1129204021022506--.name: I can't have guards drinking cups of milk like babies! No, $item:33000079$ is the way to go. You can mix it in their drinks, sprinkle it on their meals, shove it down their throats... Whatever it takes!

1129204021022507--.name: Stop the chit-chat and bring me the $item:33000079$!

1129204021022508--.name: I see you got the supplies I asked for.

1129204021022509--.name: Perfect. My men will make good use of this. I'll let you know if we need more.

1129204021022511--.name: We've directed most of our mining resources toward repairing the city's outer walls. You never know when the enemy will attack again.

1129204021022512--.name: But there's been immense damage to civilian homes, as well. This got me thinking, we really need a $item:20000364$.

1129204021022514--.name: You let me worry about that. Just get me one!

1129204021022515--.name: Stop dawdling and bring me my $item:20000364$!

1129204021022516--.name: I see you got the supplies I asked for.

1129204021022517--.name: Perfect. My men will make good use of this. I'll let you know if we need more.

1129204021022518--.name: I better take care of that...

1129204021022519--.name: Hey, cadet. You liking Sky Fortress?

1129204021022521--.name: We've got it good up here, but the same can't be said for some of my men.

1129204021022522--.name: They're down in the cold, working as hard as they can to help the people. Maybe you can help them out by getting some $item:33000080$ so they don't freeze to death.

1129204021022523--.name: Maybe you can help them out by getting some $item:33000080$ so they don't freeze to death.

1129204021022524--.name: I see you got the supplies I asked for.

1129204021022525--.name: Perfect. My men will make good use of this. I'll let you know if we need more.

1129204021022526--.name: I have a mission for you. $map:02000262$ is on red alert.

1129204021022527--.name: That means that there's some bad stuff going down. There are all kinds of alerts, like—

1129204021022528--.name: As I was saying, our radars are detecting an entity known as $npcName:22000045$. It seems that other monsters started inhabiting the area after it appeared.

1129204021022529--.name: I'm getting all kinds of spooky reports from $map:02000262$—living dolls and the like. Based on the timeline, I bet $npcName:22000045$ is behind this!

1129204021022530--.name: We will give these monsters no quarter. Go to $map:02000262$ and defeat $npcName:22000045$ and its minions!

1129204021022531--.name: <font size='20'>It's not like I was talking or anything...</font>

1129204021022532--.name: Go to $map:02000262$ and defeat $npcName:22000045$ and its minions!

1129204021022533--.name: $map:02000262$ is once again under our control. Competently executed. I'll have my analysts look into the effect $npcName:22000045$ had on its surroundings.

1129204021022534--.name: Don't let this go to your head. We have more work to do.

1129204021022535--.name: I have a mission for you. $map:02000175$ is on red alert.

1129204021022536--.name: $npcName:22000052$ has escaped from the Land of Darkness and is turning nearby monsters into savages.

1129204021022538--.name: After the $map:02000146$ opened, other secret passages and tunnels to our world opened along with it.

1129204021022539--.name: It's unfortunate that $npcName:11001813[gender:0]$ slipped our grasp at Henesys. If I'd been there to oversee things back then...

1129204021022540--.name: And what would you have done differently, exactly?

1129204021022541--.name: I suspect a fifth-level Faustian Binding in conjunction with a Ward of the Escutcheon's Aegis would have trapped him nicely. It certainly would have been more effective than fighting off his cronies while he made his escape.

1129204021022542--.name: Listen, you weren't there, man. It—

1129204021022543--.name: That's enough of that. Go to the $map:02000175$ and defeat $npcName:22000052$ and his minions!

1129204021022544--.name: Go to $map:02000146$ and defeat $npcName:22000052$ and its minions!

1129204021022545--.name: You've contained the threat for now, but the shadows are still clinging to the area. This is far from over.

1129204021022546--.name: I'll continue to monitor the situation. When you are needed, I'll call on you again. Dismissed.

1129204021022547--.name: This next mission is top priority. The $map:02000275$'s prototype war machine, $npcName:22090123$, is malfunctioning.

1129204021022548--.name: It was developed to combat evil spirits. However, it seems that it was exposed to dark magic during a performance test. It is now out of control.

1129204021022549--.name: $npcName:11000264[gender:0]$ has asked us to take care of this matter personally. I thought of you first when the request came in, naturally.

1129204021022550--.name: While you're there, I'd like you to eliminate the monsters who corrupted $npcName:22090123$ in the first place. This should also serve as a reminder that machines can't replace human soldiers and warriors.

1129204021022551--.name: I won't let them replace us, Ma'am!

1129204021022552--.name: Go to the $map:02000275$ and defeat $npcName:22090123$ and the other nearby monsters!

1129204021022553--.name: There you are. Don't bother filing a report...

1129204021022555--.name: $npcName:11000264[gender:0]$ has sent you his thanks for taking care of this.

1129204021022556--.name: You don't seem to happy about this.

1129204021022557--.name: Um... They plan to rebuild the $npcName:22090123$ and try again. It's only a matter of time before they're asking us for help again...

1129204021022558--.name: And when that time comes, we will come to their aid. Again. That is our duty. Dismissed.

1129204021022559--.name: $map:02000276$ is on red alert. $npcName:11003536[gender:1]$, brief $MyPCName$ on the situation.

1129204021022560--.name: What? Sorry, I was a little... Um, a horde of monsters have taken over the labs at $map:02000276$. We think that $npcName:22000023$ is their leader.

1129204021022561--.name: $npcName:22000023$ is a bear who powers herself by eating up electricity. At this rate, $map:02000276$ will be out of power in... wow, 24 hours! No power means no security systems, and no security systems mean... Well, bad stuff.

1129204021022562--.name: One of our agents was working undercover at the lab as a janitor, but we haven't heard from him in over eight hours...

1129204021022563--.name: That's enough. $MyPCName$, head to $map:02000276$ and dispose of $npcName:22000023$ and its minions.

1129204021022564--.name: Go to $map:02000276$ and defeat $npcName:22000023$ and its minions!
