1129204021022565--.name: My scouts say that $map:02000276$ has settled down. Do you have any news of our undercover agent?

1129204021022566--.name: Sorry. I didn't see any janitors while I was down there.

1129204021022567--.name: Oh no! What could have happened to him...?

1129204021022568--.name: I hope he survived, but we must prepare ourselves for the possibility that he's scrubbing toilets in heaven, $npcName:11003536[gender:1]$. $MyPCName$, good work.

1129204021022569--.name: I have a new mission for you. $map:02000018$ is on red alert. $npcName:11003534[gender:0]$ will fill you in on the details.

1129204021022570--.name: That's right. Listen up, because I won't repeat myself.

1129204021022571--.name: Boooring! You could listen to this wind bag jabber on all day... or you could spend some time with me!

1129204021022572--.name: Maybe I should find out what the mission is first...?

1129204021022573--.name: Get your harpy claws off $male:him,female:her$! $MyPCName$ and I have got serious business to discuss.

1129204021022575--.name: Good choice, cadet. You'll make a fine soldier someday. Maybe. Actually, now that I look at you, you are pretty scrawny...

1129204021022577--.name: Right, right, the mission. A red alert was issued at $map:02000018$. The place is falling to pieces. Literally.

1129204021022578--.name: There's a beast called $npcName:22000034$ that has a mean sweet tooth. Him and his lackeys are eating $map:02000018$ from the ground up. That old castle is an imperial heritage site, for light's sake!

1129204021022579--.name: There's no need to shout, $npcName:11003534[gender:0]$. $MyPCName$ knows what $male:he,female:she$ must do. I expect that $map:02000018$ will be free of this $npcName:22000034$ soon.

1129204021022580--.name: Go to $map:02000018$ and defeat $npcName:22000034$ and its minions!

1129204021022582--.name: And you couldn't have done it without me!

1129204021022584--.name: And don't you forget it! You keep this up, $MyPCName$, and I'll even consider taking you under my wing.

1129204021022586--.name: Don't get ahead of yourself, cadet. I said I'd consider it. But if that's going to be your attitude, maybe you don't have the right stuff, after all.

1129204021022588--.name: We have a situation at $map:02000279$. $npcName:11003535[gender:1]$ will bring you up to speed.

1129204021022589--.name: I'll get right to the point. A shipment of $npcName:11000264[gender:0]$'s robots was hit by some robbers not too long ago.

1129204021022590--.name: These robots are loaded with the latest Taliskar tech, and the robbers even managed to get their hands on a cutting-edge $npcName:22000042$. And now, those robots have shown up at $map:02000279$.

1129204021022591--.name: This has Blackstar's fingerprints all over it. Still, I can't quite figure out why they'd target $map:02000279$.

1129204021022592--.name: The stolen robots aren't responding to any known shut-down override codes. You'll need to dismantle them by hand.  Make your way to $map:02000279$ and defeat $npcName:22000042$ and the other machines.

1129204021022593--.name: Go to $map:02000279$ and defeat $npcName:22000042$ and its minions!

1129204021022594--.name: I believe Agent $npcName:11003535[gender:1]$ will be pleased with your success.

1129204021022595--.name: I can breathe easy now, thanks to you. I don't suppose you found any clues implicating Blackstar in this whole mess?

1129204021022597--.name: That's a shame. Maybe $npcName:11000264[gender:0]$'s team will come up with something when they analyze the scrap you left behind.

1129204021022598--.name: Anyway, you busy after this? I'd like to thank you... personally.

1129204021022600--.name: Ha! You should see your face right now!

1129204021022601--.name: I have a mission for you. $map:02000171$ is on red alert.

1129204021022602--.name: $npcName:22000053$ has long been an enemy to $map:02000051$. With the recent activities of the Inakimo Tribe, he may have been emboldened to act.

1129204021022603--.name: This report came from the owner of $map:02000178$ in $map:02000171$. The monsters are driving away all the tourists! And I was planning to visit there, too...

1129204021022604--.name: I already tried reaching out to the local experts, but they weren't available for this mission.

1129204021022605--.name: Local experts? Are they anyone I know?

1129204021022606--.name: It's not my job to keep track of who you do and do not know. But, if I have time, I'll introduce you to them later. For now, head to $map:02000171$ and defeat $npcName:22000053$, as well as any other monsters you encounter there.

1129204021022607--.name: Go to $map:02000171$ and defeat $npcName:22000053$ and its minions!

1129204021022608--.name: Good job. This should bolster the security of $map:02000051$ for now. One less thing for the war chief to worry about.

1129204021022609--.name: This wasn't anything $npcName:11000009[gender:0]$ couldn't handle himself.

1129204021022610--.name: Ah, perhaps I said too much. There are some things I need to tell you... later. For now, you're dismissed.

1129204021022611--.name: I have a mission for you. $map:02000132$ is on red alert.

1129204021022612--.name: A series of unexplained phenomena have struck the area. Many of our agents report monsters appearing from thin air.

1129204021022613--.name: I suspect that the monster known as $npcName:22090007$ is behind this. "Summoner" is in her name, after all.

1129204021022614--.name: Your first order of business is defeating $npcName:22090007$. While you're there, defeat any other monsters you encounter.

1129204021022615--.name: Go to $map:02000132$ and defeat $npcName:22090007$ and its minions!

1129204021022616--.name: Well done. I'm officially lifting the red alert from $map:02000132$.

1129204021022617--.name: Okay, but it seemed like $npcName:22090007$ was drawing power from her surroundings, not the other way around.

1129204021022618--.name: If that's true, then we've only seen the beginning of trouble at $map:02000132$... $npcName:11003536$, monitor the region and let me know the moment more monsters appear.

1129204021022620--.name: I have a mission for you. $map:02000180$ is on red alert.

1129204021022621--.name: Our radar systems are picking up a huge concentration of dark magic in the area. It's especially bad around $npcName:22000007$!

1129204021022622--.name: We can't allow the enemy to rally their forces. Go to the $map:02000180$ and defeat $npcName:22000007$, along with any other monsters in the area.

1129204021022623--.name: Go to $map:02000180$ and defeat $npcName:22000007$ and its minions!

1129204021022624--.name: That's one crisis averted, thanks to you. $npcName:11003536$, I want a full report on how this was allowed to happen at the $map:02000180$.

1129204021022625--.name: Yes, Ma'am! I'll start going over the data right away.

1129204021022626--.name: I have a mission for you. $map:02000113$ is on red alert.

1129204021022627--.name: $npcName:22000059$ is on a rampage, so defea—

1129204021022628--.name: Not so fast, Captain. There's more to this than you think.

1129204021022629--.name: $npcName:22000059$ is normally harmless. My sources say that he was the victim of bullying, and that's what's driven him to the brink.

1129204021022630--.name: Who'd dare bully that old snail? Kids these days have no respect! I'll put the fear of the empire, all right!!

1129204021022632--.name: Anyway, $npcName:22000059$ is the victim here. Can't you just... gently bring him back to his senses?

1129204021022633--.name: You never cease to surprise me, $npcName:11003535[gender:1]$. $MyPCName$, please take her request under advisement while you carry out this mission.

1129204021022634--.name: Go to $map:02000113$ and defeat $npcName:22000059$, along with any other monsters in the area.

1129204021022637--.name: And that, ladies and gentlemen, is how it's done! Thanks for helping the old snail out.

1129204021022638--.name: And for showing those rapscallions a thing or two about respecting their elders!!

1129204021022640--.name: The $map:02000112$ is on red alert. $npcName:11003536[gender:1]$, brief $MyPCName$ on the situation.

1129204021022641--.name: Yes, Captain! $npcName:22090107$, king of the slimes at the $map:02000112$, is making moves to expand his kingdom. We've spotted his troops attacking other monsters in several neighboring areas.

1129204021022642--.name: Now, normally we wouldn't care about monsters fighting other monsters, but slime gunk is getting into the local water supplies. If this keeps up, $map:02000023$ could lose its main source of fresh water.

1129204021022643--.name: On behalf of the citizens of $map:02000023$, we need to intervene. Go to the $map:02000112$, defeat $npcName:22090107$, and crush his forces.

1129204021022644--.name: Go to $map:02000112$ and defeat $npcName:22090107$ and its minions!

1129204021022645--.name: It seems like you've put an end to $npcName:22090107$'s little war. The water quality at the $map:02000112$ is already returning to normal. Well done.

1129204021022646--.name: I have a mission for you. $map:02000185$ is on red alert.

1129204021022647--.name: Monsters are flooding the area, seemingly from out of nowhere. As it happens, $npcName:22000001$ has also grown more aggressive lately.

1129204021022648--.name: It's unclear where they came from, but they're carrying some kind of disease that's infecting the other wildlife. We've seen instances like this throughout Maple World, of course.

1129204021022649--.name: This may be our opportunity to learn more about this strange phenomenon. Go to $map:02000185$, defeat $npcName:22000001$, and clear the area of monsters.

1129204021022650--.name: Go to $map:02000185$ and defeat $npcName:22000001$ and its minions!

1129204021022651--.name: I see you've been successful. I've got our analysts going over all of the data you gathered during your mission. With any luck, things will start to turn around.

1129204021022652--.name: Just doing our job, Ma'am! After going through all of these reports, it looks like the monsters came from the abyss—

1129204021022653--.name: That's enough. We don't want to say anything we haven't been able to confirm yet.

1129204021022655--.name: I have a mission for you. The $map:02000173$ is on red alert.

1129204021022656--.name: The $map:02000173$ has always been a dark spot on Victoria Island, but ever since the $map:02000146$ opened up, the darkness has become palpable.

1129204021022657--.name: $npcName:22000322[gender:1]$ is feasting on this darkness. My scouts say her power has more than doubled since then. I need you to go to the $map:02000173$ and defeat both $npcName:22000322[gender:1]$ and any monsters she's won over to her side.

1129204021022658--.name: Go to $map:02000173$ and defeat $npcName:22000322[gender:0]$, along with any other enemies in the area.

1129204021022659--.name: Good job. The $map:02000173$ is pacified for now, but I doubt this peace will last long. You're dismissed.

1129204021022660--.name: I have a mission for you. $map:02000089$ is on red alert.

1129204021022661--.name: As shadow magic floods into Victoria Island, $npcName:22000038$ of $map:02000089$ is acting like an amplifier. Not only is he becoming more powerful, but he's also driving the other monsters near him into a frenzy.

1129204021022662--.name: $npcName:11000285[gender:0]$ is an ancient creature, and we can't afford to let his home become overrun by evil. I need you to head to $map:02000089$ and put an end to $npcName:22000038$'s madness.

1129204021022663--.name: Go to $map:02000089$ and defeat $npcName:22000038$ and its minions!

1129204021022664--.name: $map:02000023$ has returned to normal. Good job. You're dismissed.

1129204021022665--.name: I have a mission for you. The $map:02000087$ is on red alert.

1129204021022666--.name: Some time ago, Andrea Manor vanished without a trace. The empire's top scientists still don't know what happened to it.

1129204021022667--.name: Without the manor, there's been little to stop monsters from moving into the area. Most recently, $npcName:22000002[gender:0]$—a petty gangster from Kerning City—has taken up residence there, too.

1129204021022668--.name: He's terrorizing the farmers there. Digging up crops, stealing chickens, leaving crumpled-up soda cans everywhere. What a pig!

1129204021022669--.name: I have a hunch that he's somehow connected to the missing manor. Go to the $map:02000087$ and drive $npcName:22000002[gender:0]$ out. While you're there, see if you can find any clues about this mystery.

1129204021022670--.name: Go to the $map:02000087$ and defeat $npcName:22000002[gender:0]$, along with any other monsters in the area. While you're there, see if you can find any clues about the missing manor.

1129204021022672--.name: I cleared out $npcName:22000002[gender:0]$ and his goons, but I couldn't find anything about the Andrea Manor case.

1129204021022673--.name: That's too bad... Well, you've made the area safe again, so it wasn't a complete waste. Dismissed.

1129204021022674--.name: I have a mission for you. $map:02000147$ is on red alert. But this report... $npcName:11003536[gender:1]$, please explain.

1129204021022675--.name: Ma'am! This request came from the $map:02000209$ on $map:02000147$. They've asked us to arrest a criminal named $npcName:22090165[gender:1]$.

1129204021022676--.name: $npcName:11003536[gender:0]$, we are a military operation, not mercenaries for hire. You should keep that in mind before you enter frivolous missions like this into our system.

1129204021022677--.name: I-I tried to tell them, Captain, I really did! But this woman, $npcName:11000491[gender:1]$, she wouldn't leave me alone. I had no choice!

1129204021022678--.name: I can't have this $npcName:11000491[gender:1]$ interfering with my crew's job duties. $MyPCName$, take care of the situation on $map:02000147$.

1129204021022679--.name: Go to $map:02000147$ and defeat $npcName:22090165[gender:1]$, along with any other enemies in the area.

1129204021022680--.name: $npcName:11003536[gender:0]$ would like to speak to you.

1129204021022681--.name: Thanks, $MyPCName$. You really saved my hide! That $npcName:11000491[gender:1]$ is cranky and mean and... and... old! And she just wouldn't shut up!

1129204021022682--.name: Well, that's all over now. Anyway, $npcName:22090165[gender:1]$ wasn't even human. She was some kind of cursed doll.

1129204021022683--.name: Noted. Thank you for taking care of it.

1129204021022684--.name: $map:02000041$ is on red alert. $npcName:11003536[gender:1]$, brief $MyPCName$ on the situation.

1129204021022685--.name: Yes, Ma'am! $npcName:22000003[gender:1]$ and $npcName:22000004[gender:1]$ are fighting all over $map:02000041$. It's put all the monsters in the area into a frenzy.

1129204021022686--.name: They're sisters, aren't they? This must be sibling rivalry. They're lucky, in a way...

1129204021022688--.name: Ahem! Go to $map:02000041$ and end the chaos started by $npcName:22000003[gender:1]$ and $npcName:22000004[gender:1]$.

1129204021022689--.name: Go to $map:02000147$, break up the fight between $npcName:22000003[gender:1]$ and $npcName:22000004[gender:1]$, and defeat any other monsters in the area.

1129204021022690--.name: I hear that the fairfolk sisters have calmed down. I'm sure it's only a matter of time before they're at it again... You're dismissed.

1129204021022691--.name: $map:02000083$ is on red alert. $npcName:11003535[gender:1]$, brief $MyPCName$ on the situation.

1129204021022692--.name: You've tangled with the gangs of $map:02000083$ before, right? Back in the day, those chumps worked in the shadows, where they belong.

1129204021022693--.name: We still don't know how they got up the courage to strut around in broad daylight like that. But, whatever it is, it's basically shut down all of $map:02000083$.

1129204021022694--.name: I aim to find out what's gotten into them, and I need your help to do it.

1129204021022695--.name: $npcName:11003535[gender:1]$ will gather intelligence. While she's doing this, your job will be to keep them distracted. That is all.

1129204021022696--.name: Go to $map:02000087$ and defeat $npcName:22300105[gender:0]$, along with any other enemies in the area.

1129204021022697--.name: Good job. It seems that $npcName:11003535[gender:1]$ gathered some useful intel.

1129204021022698--.name: I still need to sift through it all, but I think I've really got something here. Thanks for lending a hand.

1129204021022699--.name: I have a mission for you. $map:02000117$ is on red alert.

1129204021022700--.name: Today I'm deploying you to fight $npcName:22000022$, a bear that is upset because it was stung by a bee. My superiors assure me that the bear poses a serious threat to the civilian population and that this mission is top priority. Make of that what you will.

1129204021022701--.name: Go to $map:02000117$ and defeat $npcName:11000183[gender:0]$, along with any other enemies in the area.

1129204021022702--.name: Well done. Let's hope this $npcName:22000022$ is more careful around bees in the future.

1129204021022703--.name: Silly bear. She's always going after that honey!

1129204021022705--.name: Since this ship was commissioned, we've received more requests for help than we can possibly support.

1129204021022706--.name: My duty is to this ship, but I refuse to stand by and do nothing for the people outside of my jurisdiction.

1129204021022707--.name: $MyPCName$, I hereby grant you leave to pursue this requests under your own volition.

1129204021022708--.name: Walk the world and help those who need it. That will be all.

1129204021022709--.name: Walk the world and help those who need it. That will be all.

1129204021022710--.name: Welcome back. It seems you've accomplished quite a bit during your leave.

1129204021022711--.name: I expect to see more great things from you in the future.

1129204021022712--.name: There are many enemy hotspots that the Sky Fortress cannot approach.

1129204021022713--.name: As formidable as the ship is, our massive size also makes us vulnerable.

1129204021022714--.name: If an anti-aircraft defense system caught us off-guard during a low-altitude approach, there's no guarantee that we would even survive.

1129204021022715--.name: $MyPCName$, I need you to take the fight to the places we can't reach. Go to where your strength can do the most good.

1129204021022716--.name: Use your judgment to find the places that most need your help.

1129204021022717--.name: Welcome back. It seems you've accomplished quite a bit while you were away.

1129204021022718--.name: I expect to see more great things from you in the future.

1129204021022719--.name: I'm sending you out for a field test.

1129204021022720--.name: In the rush to get to the air, we didn't have time to bring our air-to-ground weapons systems fully online. I don't like sending my soldiers out into the field without proper support.

1129204021022721--.name: Engineering tells me that they've got these weapons up and running, but they still need to be calibrated for optimum performance.

1129204021022722--.name: Get down into the field and fire this flare at a target. We'll use it as a marker to aim the 150 mm Alliance Smoothbore.

1129204021022723--.name: Get down into the field and fire this flare at a target. We'll use it as a marker to aim the 150 mm Alliance Smoothbore.

1129204021022724--.name: Our aiming system's margin of error is over 30 points, Ma'am. I don't think that'll cut it in a fight...

1129204021022725--.name: I expected as much. We have a lot more calibrating to do.

1129204021022726--.name: This is the main gun under the hull of the ship. Once we've got it fully operational, you'll be able to use those flares to request air support as needed.

1129204021022727--.name: I'll have another weapon test for you in due time.

1129204021022728--.name: I'm sending you out for a field test.

1129204021022729--.name: In the rush to get to the air, we didn't have time to bring our air-to-ground weapons systems fully online. I don't like sending my soldiers out into the field without proper support.

1129204021022730--.name: Engineering tells me that they've got these weapons up and running, but they still need to be calibrated for optimum performance.

1129204021022731--.name: Get down into the field and fire this flare at a target. We'll use it as a marker to aim the Manastorm Cannon.

1129204021022732--.name: Get down into the field and fire this flare at a target. We'll use it as a marker to aim the Manastorm Cannon.

1129204021022733--.name: The Manastorm Cannon missed by just over two kilometers. Is it because our deflector field is still broken...?

1129204021022734--.name: The very idea of controlling magic with machinery is obscene. In fact, it borders on blasphemy.

1129204021022735--.name: If we try to wield divine powers, are we not inviting divine punishment?

1129204021022738--.name: $npcName:11003536[gender:1]$, forward your data to engineering. I want this cannon up and running ASAP.

1129204021022739--.name: We'll have more testing missions for you very soon, $MyPCName$.

1129204021022740--.name: I'm sending you out for a field test.

1129204021022741--.name: In the rush to get to the air, we didn't have time to bring our air-to-ground weapons systems fully online. I don't like sending my soldiers out into the field without proper support.

1129204021022742--.name: Engineering tells me that they've got these weapons up and running, but they still need to be calibrated for optimum performance.

1129204021022743--.name: Get down into the field and fire this flare at a target. We'll use it as a marker to aim the Shadow Mortar.

1129204021022744--.name: Get down into the field and fire this flare at a target. We'll use it as a marker to aim the Shadow Mortar.

1129204021022745--.name: It failed. Again. I've had it with this blasted mortar!

1129204021022746--.name: Be patient. It's tedious work, but good things come to those who wait.

1129204021022747--.name: You hear that, Nairin? If you're patient, maybe the captain will finally give you the time of day.

1129204021022748--.name: Wh-what are you trying to say?! Sh-she doesn't mean anything by it, really, Ma'am!

1129204021022749--.name: ...If I wait long enough, perhaps I can have some peace and quiet.

1129204021022751--.name: I'm sending you out for a field test.

1129204021022752--.name: In the rush to get to the air, we didn't have time to bring our air-to-ground weapons systems fully online. I don't like sending my soldiers out into the field without proper support.

1129204021022753--.name: Engineering tells me that they've got these weapons up and running, but they still need to be calibrated for optimum performance.

1129204021022754--.name: Get down into the field and fire this flare at a target. We'll use it as a marker to aim the Sanctuary Flare.

1129204021022755--.name: Get down into the field and fire this flare at a target. We'll use it as a marker to aim the Sanctuary Flare.

1129204021022756--.name: I can't make heads or tails of this computer screen. Did we hit our target or not?

1129204021022757--.name: Not exactly, Sir. The shell made it to its destination, but by the time it got there, the healing spell had already failed.

1129204021022758--.name: Then we'll try again. The ability to fire healing artillery at our ground forces could drastically cut down on our casualties.

1129204021022759--.name: If we had this kind of technology at the Siege of Tria...

1129204021022761--.name: Our mages will continue their work, $MyPCName$. I'll let you know when we're ready to test again.

1129204021022762--.name: I'm sending you out for a field test.

1129204021022763--.name: In the rush to get to the air, we didn't have time to bring our air-to-ground weapons systems fully online. I don't like sending my soldiers out into the field without proper support.

1129204021022764--.name: Engineering tells me that they've got these weapons up and running, but they still need to be calibrated for optimum performance.

1129204021022765--.name: Get down into the field and fire this flare at a target. We'll use it as a marker to aim Nature's Call.

1129204021022766--.name: Get down into the field and fire this flare at a target. We'll use it as a marker to aim Nature's Call.

1129204021022767--.name: I'm watching drone replay now. Healing spores are in position above the target area...

1129204021022769--.name: Well? Was the test successful or not?

1129204021022770--.name: The spores have scattered, Ma'am. They never reached the target area. I-I'll get my team right on it.

1129204021022772--.name: Nature's Call is designed to create a safe sanctuary in any battlefield. I'm sure you can see how it would be useful.

1129204021022773--.name: In the heat of battle, such a weapon could keep our soldiers on their feet for much longer.

1129204021022774--.name: But, as you can see, it's not yet ready for deployment. I'll call on you again for the next test.

1129204021022806--.name: $npcNamePlural:21000027$ have been making a mess of Perion ever since the Inakimo attack put their war party out of commission.

1129204021022807--.name: Head to the $map:02000044$ and take care of the $npcNamePlural:21000027$ there. I'll be here, protecting $map:02000001$ from above.

1129204021022808--.name: Head to the $map:02000044$ and take care of the $npcNamePlural:21000027$ there.

1129204021022809--.name: You sure took your time getting back here, cadet.

1129204021022810--.name: At least you got the job done. Keep up the good work.

1129204021022812--.name: When the jawbreakers first showed up, I thought they were just your run-of-the-mill hoodlums. But they've really turned $map:02000093$ into a dump.

1129204021022813--.name: We can't just sit back and let them take over. Defeat $npcNamePlural:21000312$ and show them that the Royal Guard is not to be trifled with!

1129204021022814--.name: Defeat $npcNamePlural:21000312$ to stop their expansion and show them that the Royal Guard is not to be trifled with!

1129204021022816--.name: But it wasn't too bad, I suppose.

1129204021022817--.name: Hey, cadet. Let me ask you something.

1129204021022818--.name: You ever try to train a $npcName:21000066$? It ain't easy. Looks like some of our enemies figured out how, though.

1129204021022819--.name: $npcNamePlural:21000334$ have trained whole packs of them to attack travelers! Obviously, something must be done. Head to $map:02000169$ and give them a piece of my mind.

1129204021022822--.name: You did all right, I guess. Not as good as I used to do, but that's to be expected.

1129204021022824--.name: Tsk! In my day, soldiers were ready at a moment's notice.

1129204021022826--.name: I guess you're all right, then.

1129204021022827--.name: We're heading into a drought, and those no-good, water-slurping $npcNamePlural:21000069$ aren't helping the situation.

1129204021022828--.name: They suck up all the water like spiky spunges. Meanwhile, our people are dying of thirst! Even a hard-head like you sees the problem here, right?

1129204021022829--.name: Of course, Sir. Clear as day.

1129204021022830--.name: Then what are you doing still standing around? Head to the $map:02000049$ and take care of the $npcNamePlural:21000069$! Save our people!

1129204021022831--.name: Head to $map:02000049$ and take care of the $npcNamePlural:21000069$! Save our people!

1129204021022833--.name: You did all right, I guess. Not as good as I used to do, but that's to be expected.

1129204021022834--.name: You up for a mission, cadet?

1129204021022835--.name: We've figured out why the bonebridge in Perion keeps falling apart... $npcNamePlural:21000267$ keep rolling into it when they get itchy!

1129204021022836--.name: That'll make it real tough to finish rebuilding Perion, and we already got our hands full with protecting $map:02000001$. There's only one solution. You need to go to the $map:02000045$ and take care of the $npcNamePlural:21000267$.

1129204021022837--.name: Go to the $map:02000045$ and take care of the $npcNamePlural:21000267$.

1129204021022838--.name: I hope you're not here to disappoint me.

1129204021022839--.name: Nicely done. You're even more efficient than my men!

1129204021022841--.name: Sky Fortress's eggheads tell me that the $map:02000046$ is the perfect place for one of those lava power plants that everyone loves.

1129204021022842--.name: Too bad the place is overrun with $npcNamePlural:21000299$. Can't build a power plant if you keep getting pinched.

1129204021022843--.name: Go take care of it. Head to the $map:02000046$ and drive out the $npcNamePlural:21000299$ so we can build our power plant.

1129204021022844--.name: Head to the $map:02000046$ and drive out the $npcNamePlural:21000299$ so we can build our lava energy production facility.

1129204021022846--.name: Nicely done. You're even more efficient than my men!

1129204021022847--.name: Sky Fortress wasn't cheap to fix up. In fact, we've barely got enough money left over to feed our troops!

1129204021022848--.name: We need a wealthy donor to help top of our coffers. Someone like you. So, what do you say?

1129204021022849--.name: We need a wealthy donor to help top of our coffers. Someone like you. So, what do you say?

1129204021022850--.name: Wow, you just single-handedly funded an entire squad!

1129204021022851--.name: Thank you so much. We'll use this money wisely, I promise!

1129204021022852--.name: Sky Fortress wasn't cheap to fix up. In fact, we've barely got enough money left over to feed our troops!

1129204021022853--.name: We need a wealthy donor to help top of our coffers. Someone like you. So, what do you say?

1129204021022854--.name: We need a wealthy donor to help top of our coffers. Someone like you. So, what do you say?

1129204021022855--.name: Huh? This is enough to fund a whole platoon!

1129204021022856--.name: Thank you so much. We'll use this money wisely, I promise!

1129204021022857--.name: Sky Fortress wasn't cheap to fix up. In fact, we've barely got enough money left over to feed our troops!

1129204021022858--.name: We need a wealthy donor to help top of our coffers. Someone like you. So, what do you say?

1129204021022859--.name: We need a wealthy donor to help top of our coffers. Someone like you. So, what do you say?

1129204021022860--.name: I don't know how you got this much, but this will feed an entire company!

1129204021022861--.name: Thank you so much. We'll use this money wisely, I promise!

1129204021022862--.name: Sky Fortress wasn't cheap to fix up. In fact, we've barely got enough money left over to feed our troops!

1129204021022863--.name: We need a wealthy donor to help top of our coffers. Someone like you. So, what do you say?

1129204021022864--.name: We need a wealthy donor to help top of our coffers. Someone like you. So, what do you say?

1129204021022865--.name: Amazing. We can fund a whole battalion with this!

1129204021022866--.name: Thank you so much. We'll use this money wisely, I promise!

1129204021022867--.name: I need you to collect some $item:30000231$ samples for analysis.

1129204021022868--.name: It's used in energy tonics and tinctures as a gimmick. I want to see if it actually has rejuvenating effects!

1129204021022870--.name: I need you to collect some $item:30000231$ samples for analysis.

1129204021022871--.name: Excellent! I'll send these straight to the lab.

1129204021022872--.name: We're always looking for more samples for our research. I'll be in touch soon!

1129204021022873--.name: I need you to gather $itemPlural:30000232$ for my research.

1129204021022874--.name: For some reason, $itemPlural:30000232$ are extremely popular amongst the young men and women of Maple World. I've tried to figure out why for ages. I even asked Condor, but he wouldn't tell me.

1129204021022875--.name: I know why. If you want, sweet Nainai, I can show you in person...

1129204021022877--.name: While you're at it, pick some up for me. I'm fresh out.

1129204021022878--.name: I need these $itemPlural:30000232$ for research, not for eating... or whatever it is you do with them!

1129204021022880--.name: Not you, too! Ugh! You guys are skeeving me out!

1129204021022881--.name: It's clear I need to run a detailed analysis on this. I'll need a lot of samples, please, $MyPCName$.

1129204021022882--.name: I need you to gather $itemPlural:30000232$ for my research.

1129204021022883--.name: Excellent! I'll send these straight to the lab.

1129204021022884--.name: We're always looking for more samples for our research. I'll be in touch soon!

1129204021022885--.name: I need you to gather $itemPlural:30000232$ for my research.

1129204021022886--.name: For some reason, $itemPlural:30000232$ are extremely popular amongst the young men and women of Maple World. I've tried to figure out why for ages. I even asked Condor, but he wouldn't tell me.

1129204021022887--.name: I know why. If you want, sweet Nainai, I can show you in person...

1129204021022889--.name: While you're at it, pick some up for me. I'm fresh out.

1129204021022890--.name: I need these $itemPlural:30000232$ for research, not for eating... or whatever it is you do with them!

1129204021022892--.name: Not you, too! Ugh! You guys are skeeving me out!

1129204021022893--.name: It's clear I need to run a detailed analysis on this. I'll need a lot of samples, please, $MyPCName$.

1129204021022894--.name: I need you to gather $itemPlural:30000232$ for my research.

1129204021022895--.name: Excellent! I'll send these straight to the lab.

1129204021022896--.name: We're always looking for more samples for our research. I'll be in touch soon!

1129204021022897--.name: I'd like you to gather some $item:30000241$ samples. It's a pretty common cooking ingredient.

1129204021022898--.name: I honestly don't know what to make of it. No matter what dish it's used in, the dish always retains its original flavor. So why is this seasoning so popular? And how can we put it to good use?

1129204021022899--.name: We really need to study it from all angles, so I'm going to need a lot of the stuff.

1129204021022900--.name: I'd like you to gather some $item:30000241$ samples. It's a pretty common cooking ingredient.

1129204021022901--.name: Excellent! I'll send these straight to the lab.

1129204021022902--.name: We're always looking for more samples for our research. I'll be in touch soon!

1129204021022903--.name: I need you to collect some $item:30000233$ samples for analysis.

1129204021022904--.name: $itemPlural:30000233$ grows in dark places, so we wonder if it's tinged with darkness. In small doses, it's safe and effective. However, we'd like to study what the effects are when used in large doses.

1129204021022905--.name: In small doses, $itemPlural:30000233$ is an important ingredient for a wide variety of potions. However, it thrives in dark places, so we're worried it might be dangerous in larger portions.

1129204021022906--.name: I need you to collect some $item:30000233$ samples for analysis.

1129204021022907--.name: Excellent! I'll send these straight to the lab.

1129204021022908--.name: We're always looking for more samples for our research. I'll be in touch soon!

1129204021022909--.name: I'd like you to gather some $item:30000230$ samples.

1129204021022910--.name: At a glance, $item:30000230$ looks like common water. But use it to mix your potions, and you'll see a huge difference in effectiveness.

1129204021022911--.name: I think we've only scratched the surface of what this stuff to do! Of course, I'll need a lot of it for analysis if I'm going to prove my theory.

1129204021022912--.name: I'd like you to gather some $item:30000230$ samples.

1129204021022913--.name: Excellent! I'll send these straight to the lab.

1129204021022914--.name: We're always looking for more samples for our research. I'll be in touch soon!

1129204021022915--.name: We're trying to keep our forces in fighting shape, but we didn't exactly have time to fully stock our armory.

1129204021022916--.name: Our troops barely have enough weapons to share between them. That's why I'm collecting used weapons and gear. Hey, everything helps, right?

1129204021022917--.name: If you have any weapons or gear that you no longer use, consider donating them to the Alliance.

1129204021022918--.name: If you have any weapons or gear that you no longer use, consider donating them to the Alliance.

1129204021022919--.name: Thank you! This gear will help arm the Alliance's soldiers!

1129204021022920--.name: The Alliance grows stronger with your contribution, $MyPCName$!

1129204021022921--.name: The Royal Guard is busy rebuilding Tria, the greatest city in Maple World!

1129204021022922--.name: I'd be there working right alongside them if I could. But I've gotta stay up here, so I'm sending you, instead.

1129204021022923--.name: It's no problem, $npcName:11003534[gender:0]$. I'd be happy to—

1129204021022924--.name: Not talking to you, pretty boy.

1129204021022925--.name: Anyway, as I was saying, the city needs $itemPlural:33000063$! Do your civic duty and get some to help reconstruct Tria!

1129204021022927--.name: Are you yanking my chain, cadet?! Mine the ore and smith the ingots yourself! Honestly, you kids want everything handed to them.

1129204021022928--.name: You're still here? Do your civic duty and collect some $itemPlural:33000063$ to help reconstruct Tria!

1129204021022929--.name: You worked up one heck of a sweat, cadet! Looks like my lessons are finally starting to rub off on you!

1129204021022930--.name: The Royal Guard is busy rebuilding Tria, the greatest city in Maple World!

1129204021022931--.name: I'd be there working right alongside them if I could. But I've gotta stay up here, so I'm sending you, instead.

1129204021022932--.name: It's no problem, $npcName:11003534[gender:0]$. I'd be happy to—

1129204021022933--.name: Not talking to you, pretty boy.

1129204021022934--.name: Anyway, as I was saying, the city needs $itemPlural:33000063$! Do your civic duty and get some to help reconstruct Tria!

1129204021022936--.name: Are you yanking my chain, cadet?! Mine the ore and smith the ingots yourself! Honestly, you kids want everything handed to them.

1129204021022937--.name: You're still here? Do your civic duty and collect some $itemPlural:33000063$ to help reconstruct Tria!

1129204021022938--.name: You worked up one heck of a sweat, cadet! Looks like my lessons are finally starting to rub off on you!

1129204021022939--.name: The invasion may be over, but the fight continues on...

1129204021022940--.name: It's a blasted embarrassment is what it is. We don't have enough medicine to go around.

1129204021022941--.name: Our tonics and potions go to the soldiers who were hurt the most. For everyone else... Well, they'll have to get by with $item:33000132$.

1129204021022942--.name: Use your harvesting and alchemy skills to make $item:33000132$ for the sick and injured.

1129204021022943--.name: Use your harvesting and alchemy skills to make $item:33000132$ for the sick and injured.

1129204021022944--.name: What took you so long? Lives are on the line here!

1129204021022945--.name: Hand over that $item:33000132$. The stuff is basically snake oil, but it's all we can scrounge up. Thanks.

1129204021022946--.name: The invasion may be over, but the fight continues on...

1129204021022947--.name: It's a blasted embarrassment is what it is. We don't have enough medicine to go around.

1129204021022948--.name: Our tonics and potions go to the soldiers who were hurt the most. For everyone else... Well, they'll have to get by with $item:33000132$.

1129204021022949--.name: Use your harvesting and alchemy skills to make $item:33000132$ for the sick and injured.

1129204021022950--.name: Use your harvesting and alchemy skills to make $item:33000132$ for the sick and injured.

1129204021022951--.name: What took you so long? Lives are on the line here!

1129204021022952--.name: Hand over that $item:33000132$. The stuff is basically snake oil, but it's all we can scrounge up. Thanks.

1129204021022954--.name: Tsk! In my day, soldiers were ready at a moment's notice.

1129204021022956--.name: You better be. A pack of combat-trained $npcNamePlural:21000064$ escaped their cages during the attack on Perion. I told them they ought to put locks on those cages...

1129204021022957--.name: Head to $map:02000171$ and take care of those $npcNamePlural:21000064$!

1129204021022958--.name: Head to $map:02000171$ and take care of those $npcNamePlural:21000064$!

1129204021022960--.name: But it wasn't too bad, I suppose.

1129204021022961--.name: Hey, cadet. Let me ask you something.

1129204021022962--.name: You ever get bit by a $npcName:21000301$? Those fangs are sharp as the dickens. The little mongrels have practically taken over $map:02000133$...

1129204021022963--.name: The folks of Perion think that place is holy, so we've got to do something about it.

1129204021022964--.name: I couldn't agree more, Sir. Someone needs to do something!

1129204021022966--.name: Head to $map:02000133$ and get rid of those $npcNamePlural:21000301$!

1129204021022967--.name: Head to $map:02000133$ and get rid of those $npcNamePlural:21000301$</font>!

1129204021022969--.name: You did all right, I guess. Not as good as I used to do, but that's to be expected.

1129204021022970--.name: I've got a job for you, cadet!

1129204021022971--.name: $map:02000061$ supplies Perion with most of its drinking water. However, it seems we've got a little problem in the area...

1129204021022972--.name: If there anything I can do to help, Sir?

1129204021022973--.name: That's the spirit! The $npcNamePlural:21000369$ of the pass are riling up the local wildlife and causing all sorts of trouble. Playful scamps!

1129204021022975--.name: I want you to take care of the $npcNamePlural:21000369$ at $map:02000061$!

1129204021022976--.name: You sure took your time getting back here, cadet.

1129204021022977--.name: At least you got the job done. Keep up the good work.

1129204021022979--.name: Tsk! In my day, soldiers were ready at a moment's notice.

1129204021022981--.name: Really? You ready to dive head-first into a den of master martial artists who have been hypnotized by evil $npcNamePlural:21000334$?

1129204021022982--.name: Just point me in the right direction, Sir.

1129204021022983--.name: Bahaha! You remind me of myself, when I was young and inexperienced. Anyway, you're heading to the $map:02000094$ to complete this task.

1129204021022985--.name: I hope you're not here to disappoint me.

1129204021022986--.name: Nicely done. You're even more efficient than my men!

1224191921022992--.name: In war, a show of great force will always be matched by an equally powerful response, but I didn't expect something like this.

1224191921022994--.name: My spies report that the Resistance has a new toy...

1224191921022995--.name: Seems they call it the "CHKY-002 Fortress Breaker." Oh, I'd just love to find whoever named it and introduce them to my blade...

1224191921022996--.name: They made the mech for exactly one purpose: to take down Sky Fortress.

1224191921022997--.name: Oh my... These reports say that it has a fusion core MK-II propeller... and unobtanium alloy armor...?!

1224191921022998--.name: With that kind of mobility and defense, our anti-aircraft systems won't be able to even scratch it, let alone stop it!

1224191921022999--.name: Correct. That's why we aren't going to use them.

1224191921023000--.name: $npcName:11003536[gender:0]$, change the settings of the airborne early warning system to alert us the moment CHKY-002 appears, then get me an estimate on the earliest possible attack time.

1224191921023002--.name: $MyPCName$, keep an eye on Sky Fortress's status on your World Map. We'll put an alert there when we're under attack.

1224191921023003--.name: All of you, listen closely. We cannot lose this ship. When that mech appears on deck, give it everything you've got. It must be stopped. Dismissed!

1224191921023004--.name: $MyPCName$, perform routine checks on the Sky Fortress through the World Map. The time of the next attack will appear there.

1224191921023005--.name: Nicely done, $MyPCName$. I wasn't thrilled allowing it to land, but I think we've proven that's as far as they'll get.

1224191921023006--.name: But... have you considered that perhaps that was more than far enough?

1224191921023007--.name: Captain! The signals are scrambled... Our communications system has been hacked!

1224191921023008--.name: Was that the best you had, Sky Fortress? Such an easy battle. You didn't even notice I was hacking into your system at the same time.

1224191921023010--.name: So sorry to disappoint you, but CHKY-002 is controlled remotely. While you were busting your butts fighting my mech, I was enjoying a refreshing lemonade from the comfort of my own lair!

1224191921023011--.name: I've gathered some valuable combat data from our little skirmish, to boot. I'll know all your tricks for next time. There really wasn't much to the Sky Fortress, after all.

1224191921023012--.name: I should thank you, really. I'll bring some cotton candy as a reward next time we meet.

1224191921023013--.name: What an amusing little circus bear you are. Perhaps, once we've tracked you down, I'll keep you as a pet. Then again, I doubt you're housebroken.

1224191921023014--.name: Circus bear? Pet?! How dare you! And I know how to **** in a toilet just as good as you, you ****** ****!

1224191921023015--.name: It looks like the curse filter is working properly, Captain! I kind of like it!

1224191921023016--.name: Hold on. I've gotta try this. ****! ***! ****** ****-faced ****ing son of a gun! Haw, this is great!

1224191921023018--.name: This isn't over! CHKY-002 will only grow stronger with the data all of you provided today!

1224191921023019--.name: And you! Four-eyes! I'm watching you. I'll take you down myself! ...Those little twerps. When I get my hands on them, I'll—Wait, is this thing still on?

1224191921023020--.name: Just flick the switch. No, with your hand. Not like that. Never mind, I'll just do—

1224191921023022--.name: You know, it wouldn't surprise me if the CHKY-002's next upgrade was called the "Mason Breaker."

1224191921023023--.name: Well, even it returns, I have faith the our crew can take it down. Nice work, $MyPCName$.

0129165921023039--.name: $npcName:11003536[gender:1]$, have you made any progress on the anomalies our radar has picked up?

0129165921023040--.name: Our sensors can't make sense of them, Sir.

0129165921023041--.name: Someone's going to have to go down there and check it out in person.

0129165921023042--.name: No matter how much technology progresses, sometimes we have to do things the good old way.

0129165921023043--.name: $MyPCName$, our radar systems are a mess of warnings and alerts. I need you to head out and check things out for yourself.

0129165921023044--.name: Use the Sortie system to minimize travel time.

0129165921023045--.name: $MyPCName$, our radar systems are a mess of warnings and alerts. I need you to head out and check things out for yourself.

0129165921023046--.name: Thanks for your hard work. It may not have been a serious threat this time, but you just never know what might try to sneak up on us.

0129165921023047--.name: I expect more great things from you in the future.

0129165921023048--.name: I've got a problem, $male:handsome,female:gorgeous$. I've been so focused on urgent missions and reconnaissance lately that I'm afraid I've been neglecting my other duties.

0129165921023049--.name: Dark Wind patrol routes tend to have higher crime rates than other regions. Things could get bad if I neglect them for too long.

0129165921023050--.name: Hey, I just thought of something! Dark Wind patrol routes are a lot like you, Nainai!

0129165921023052--.name: When you don't pay attention to it, it gets grouchy!

0129165921023054--.name: Anyway, $MyPCName$, you'd better head out. If you encounter any problems, take care of them then and there.

0129165921023055--.name: And don't forget about the Sortie system. It'll cut down on your travel time, so I highly recommend using it.

0129165921023056--.name: Your mission is simple. Move out, and if you encounter any problems, resolve them on the spot.

0129165921023057--.name: That should take care of my patrol routes for a while. Thank you, $MyPCName$.

0129165921023058--.name: Keep an eye open any time you pass through those areas, won't you? I'm so swamped, I wish I could clone myself to help with all my work... and come to think of it, a few other things, too.

0129165921023059--.name: No, actually... if I had a clone, I'd have her stick to Nainai like glue. That way, Nainai would never be lonely or grouchy.

0129165921023060--.name: I'd really appreciate it if you'd stop paying attention to me and start paying more attention to your job!

0129165921023061--.name: What did you say? You want my attention? You got it, darling. Now all my attention is completely on you, Nainai. Happy now? Aw, look, she's blushing.

0129165921023062--.name: I'd like to ask you a favor, $MyPCName$.

0129165921023063--.name: The Lumiknights have long desired to reclaim our lost land. This venture would require a full expedition, complete with knowledge of the terrain and of the enemies who inhabit it.

0129165921023064--.name: That's part of the reason I accepted a position on this fleet. It offers an excellent vantage point to perform reconnaissance from up high.

0129165921023065--.name: Of course, there's a limit to how much one can learn from a distance. In the end, we need someone to travel into the Land of Darkness by foot, to experience what the place is truly like.

0129165921023066--.name: So. Will you be my eyes, $MyPCName$?

0129165921023067--.name: Will you experience all that you can through missions? I will see all that you see, as if I'm right there with you. Which I will be, as I'll be astral projecting my consciousness to your position.

0129165921023069--.name: Thank you, $MyPCName$. I leave it to you.

0129165921023070--.name: In the Land of Darkness, it's safer to move about physically than magically. I suggest you use the Sortie system.

0129165921023071--.name: Will you experience all that you can through missions? I will see all that you see, as if I'm right there with you. You know why I can't go in person.

0129165921023072--.name: I gleaned a few nuggets of information, thanks to you.

0129165921023073--.name: Perhaps someday you'll become the eyes for all my brethren.

0129165921023074--.name: I look forward to that day, $MyPCName$.

0129165921023075--.name: Hey, $MyPCName$! You consider yourself a hero, right?

0129165921023076--.name: While going on epic adventures is all well and good, a real hero knows that day-to-day tasks are important, too! That's one of the core philosophies of the Green Hoods, and it's served us well!

0129165921023077--.name: One of those day-to-day jobs is patrolling the areas we're sworn to protect.

0129165921023078--.name: I know patrol work is, well, boring, but somebody's got to do it, right? Otherwise, how can we know when something bad is going down?

0129165921023079--.name: In fact, the very fact that you can find Green Hoods on patrol is why the people trust us so much!

0130235021023390--.name: That's why I'd like you to go out on patrol today, $MyPCName$!

0130235021023391--.name: I'd like you to go out on patrol today, $MyPCName$!

0130235021023392--.name: Your efforts have kept the people under the Green Hood's protection safe for another day!

0130235021023393--.name: It was nice for me, too, to have a few hours off. But now, it's back to work!

0130235021023394--.name: Hey, cadet. Want to know the best way to keep people safe?

0130235021023395--.name: Get superpowers. Maybe a freak lightning storm makes you magnetic, or the goddess of light blesses you with superhuman strength.

0130235021023396--.name: Wait, there's one other way! You ready for it...? To keep people safe...

0130235021023397--.name: ...Just do exactly what I tell you to do! BAHAHAHAHA!

0130235021023398--.name: Go out and patrol the areas under Royal Guard jurisdiction! If anything happens, deal with it on the spot.

0130235021023400--.name: Go out and patrol the areas under Royal Guard jurisdiction! If anything happens, deal with it on the spot, or ask for help.

0130235021023401--.name: Not too shabby. Not too shabby at all.

0130235021023402--.name: Thanks to you, I was finally able to give the other Royal Guards some leave. They wanted me to tell you how grateful they are. BAHAHAHAHA!

0130235021023403--.name: Keep it up, cadet! Tria is counting on you.

0130235021023404--.name: Hey there, sugar. I've got an important mission for you.

0130235021023406--.name: Aww, are you scared, kitten? Relax. It doesn't involve breaking any fingers. I save the best parts for myself.

0130235021023407--.name: Your part of the job entails the giant frog, $npcName:23000013[gender:0]$. Dark Wind has, let's say, become interested in him lately.

0130235021023408--.name: He's acquired a hefty pile of treasure. There's no way it could've been done legitimately. He's a frog, after all.

0130235021023409--.name: And a frog with a shady past, at that.

0130235021023410--.name: He's always been obsessed with sparkles and gems. He used to steal them in tiny amounts, so he wouldn't get caught. That's how he flew under my radar for so long. But now, he can't control himself. There have even been reports of him hijacking delivery trucks in broad daylight.

0130235021023411--.name: Can't blame a frog for wanting to look beautiful, but literal highway robbery is not the way to make that happen.

0130235021023412--.name: I need you to stop $npcName:23000013[gender:0]$ from committing these crimes, honeycakes.

0130235021023413--.name: You haven't left on your mission yet? Can't bear to leave my side, can you? Well, then, why don't you and I spend some quality time together back in my room?

0130235021023414--.name: Actually, I saw just heading out!

0130235021023415--.name: Aww, you're so cute when you blush. Have fun on your mission, but not too much fun!

0130235021023416--.name: You made it back in one piece, $MyPCName$! To be honest, I'm a little surprised.

0130235021023417--.name: Yeah, the mission wasn't exactly easy.

0130235021023418--.name: But you did it, and that's what matters.

0130235021023419--.name: I could have given you a heads up about the difficulty, sure, but where's the fun in that?

0130235021023420--.name: I'd rather have less fun and stay alive.

0130235021023421--.name: Aww, you're so cute when you pout.

0130235021023422--.name: If you need someone to make you feel better, I know a quiet place we can go... But why don't you shower off first?

0130235021023423--.name: Hey there, $male:handsome,female:beautiful$. Feel like taking on a slightly tougher mission today?

0130235021023425--.name: You're so cute, $MyPCName$. Don't worry, I'm not sending you to your death just yet.

0130235021023426--.name: You're familiar with $npcName:23000054$, right? Big robot? Kind of angry? Likes to hit people?

0130235021023427--.name: We want to know why it's been attacking humans. It doesn't seem logical, so we did some digging.

0130235021023428--.name: Turns out, $npcName:23000054$ wasn't originally developed as a weapon.

0130235021023429--.name: What happened was, when $npcName:23000054$ was originally being manufactured, someone broke into the $map:02000145$ network, which in turn corrupted $npcName:23000054$.

0130235021023430--.name: Who would do such a thing?!

0130235021023431--.name: I don't know, I can think of a couple people. Hacking a robot to do your bidding sounds pretty useful.

0130235021023432--.name: Anyway, Dark Wind believes that's the reason we've seen so much robot belligerence lately.

0130235021023433--.name: Someone is forcing the robots to attack.

0130235021023434--.name: Who's at the top of the suspect list?

0130235021023435--.name: I love how eager you are, but I'm not ready to name names just yet. I need solid proof before we can take any real action against the culprit.

0130235021023436--.name: That's where you come in, honey.

0130235021023437--.name: If you can disable $npcName:23000054$, we can counter-hack its system and get to the bottom of this.

0130235021023439--.name: Thanks, $MyPCName$. Afterwards, I can reward you handsomely in my office, if you get my drift...

0130235021023440--.name: But for now, immobolize that robot!

0130235021023441--.name: You haven't left yet? You weren't thinking of getting your reward before you've even done the job, were you? Tsk.

0130235021023442--.name: Not at all! I'm heading out now!

0130235021023443--.name: All right. I'll see you later, $male:handsome,female:beautiful$.

0130235021023444--.name: Done already? Quick and easy, just the way I like it.

0130235021023445--.name: I'll send a team to retrieve and analyze its software now.

0130235021023446--.name: Thanks, $MyPCName$. We couldn't have done it without you.

0130235021023447--.name: $MyPCName$, I'm so relieved you're here! I have a bit of a situation...

0130235021023451--.name: I know you're being snarky, but I don't have time to deal with that right now. I have bigger problems on my plate!

0130235021023453--.name: According to these readings, it used to be a normal turtle, but it got big and mean from eating a diet of toxic waste, oil slicks, and lost socks. Now it's wandering around and throwing up on everything...

0130235021023454--.name: Worse of all, we haven't been able to find a cure for the sickness yet. The $npcName:23000018$ has started to venture to shore, so something must be done!

0130235021023455--.name: I can't say I love the idea of fighting an enemy who attacks by puking...

0130235021023456--.name: But you're right. This can't be allowed to go on. You can count on me!

0130235021023459--.name: You promised to help! Do I have to explain how important this mission is once more time?

0130235021023460--.name: Please don't. Look, I'm already out the door!

0130235021023462--.name: Thanks to you, we've put a stop to the spread of the toxin. For now, at least.

0130235021023463--.name: <font color="#909090">($npcName:11003536$ heaves a huge, exaggerated sigh.)</font>

0130235021023464--.name: All right. Spill it. What's the matter this time.

0130235021023465--.name: I'm drowning in work. For every item I check off my list, ten more appear!

0130235021023466--.name: Can you believe I missed the last Blake concert?! At this point, I can barely remember what he looks like. It's a tragedy!

0130235021023467--.name: Aww, poor Nainai. I can take your mind off your sorrows, if you want.

0130235021023468--.name: I'll make you forget all about Blake.

0130235021023469--.name: Heresy! I could never forget about Blake!

0130235021023470--.name: I'm just saying, Blake is a distant, unreachable fantasy. But me? I'm right here, Nainai.

0130235021023471--.name: This is where I step in to steer the conversation back on track.

0130235021023473--.name: Way too busy to deal with these field missions!

0130235021023474--.name: I feel like I'm walking right into this, but maybe I can help...

0130235021023477--.name: To be honest, I understand where $npcNamePlural:23000019[gender:0]$ is coming from, but we can't just let him slaughter innocent people.

0130235021023478--.name: $npcName:23000019[gender:0]$ is just a child, though, so a small warning should be enough. Will you take care of it?

0130235021023480--.name: Thank you! That's a huge load off my shoulders!

0130235021023481--.name: You haven't left yet? Tell me I'm seeing things!

0130235021023483--.name: Good. I thought you'd forgotten that you agreed to help.

0130235021023484--.name: Thank you, $MyPCName$! I knew you could do it!

0130235021023485--.name: Now... do you want to know a secret? I've been working on a new combat simulator. It'll really boost the combat power of the fleet's fighters!

0130235021023486--.name: I'm making lots of progress, too! I almost don't even notice the overtime and all the sleepless nights. The end product is going to be great! But shhh, don't tell anyone yet, okay?

0131173821023962--.name: I'll let you try out the simulator yourself when it's ready!

0130235021023487--.name: I knew you would hear my call, $MyPCName$.

0130235021023489--.name: You heard me telepathically summoning you, which is why you're here.

0130235021023490--.name: Few humans can hear me telepathically. It means we share a common destiny.

0130235021023491--.name: Um, you have a mission for me or something?

0130235021023492--.name: You see? We are connected! You knew what I wanted before I spoke it out loud! Yes, yes, I do have a mission for you, $MyPCName$!

0130235021023493--.name: You are no doubt aware of the vile $npcName:23000001[gender:0]$, having seen him in my mind. He is a harbinger of darkness, sowing chaos wherever he goes.

0130235021023494--.name: They must be stopped before their influence spreads too far, and you are the only one I trust to handle the task.

0130235021023495--.name: I would do it myself, but the ley lines in that area are spewing magefire. With so much latent mana about, my spells would grow so powerful that they would shatter Victoria Island...

0130235021023497--.name: I knew you'd understand, $MyPCName$. My thoughts go with you, like a warm cloak or a sturdy pair of boots.

0130235021023498--.name: Ah, are you still contemplating the significance of the task I've placed upon your shoulders?

0130235021023499--.name: Oooh, right! That's what I was supposed to be doing!

0130235021023500--.name: There is no need to rush. I will always know where you are and what you're doing, $MyPCName$.

0130235021023502--.name: I am well aware of the results of your mission. Our connection allows me to see that much, and more. My only regret was that I could not be there at your side, exchanging blows with our common enemy.

0130235021023503--.name: The light burns a little brighter this day, thanks to you.

0130235021023504--.name: I knew you were on your way here, $MyPCName$.

0130235021023505--.name: The invisible thread of destiny binds us together.

0130235021023507--.name:
Ah, but you already know, don't you? Allow me to elaborate.
...
...
...

0130235021023508--.name: Okay, you're gonna have to give me at least some of that out loud.

0130235021023509--.name: As you wish. My telepathic voice does tend to overwhelm. The Cerberus $npcName:23000047$ has been tainted by darkness.

0130235021023510--.name: The balance of light and dark is already in disarray. We cannot stand idly by while it falls further into chaos.

0130235021023511--.name: My superiors do not wish the knights to step in, which leaves you as my only recourse.

0130235021023512--.name: Sure, I'll take care of it.

0130235021023513--.name: Just as I foresaw. Very good, $MyPCName$. Fulfill your destiny.

0130235021023514--.name: The end of the world draws ever closer...!

0130235021023515--.name: Oh, right. You gave me a mission...

0130235021023518--.name: You have drawn the attention of forces far beyond our control...

0130235021023520--.name: You have nothing to fear. Walk in the light and you shall be judged fairly.

0130235021023521--.name: What're you just standing around for, $MyPCName$? If you've got this much free time, help me out!

0130235021023522--.name: You're just... so marvelously good-looking today. I couldn't help but stare in awe.

0130235021023525--.name: Darn straight I'm good-looking today. I'm good looking every day, cadet!

0130235021023526--.name: But we have bigger fish to fry, like your mission. We have our eye on $npcName:23000035$ lately.

0130235021023527--.name: While we're busy trying to rebuild Maple World, $npcName:23000035$ are off attacking humans and spewing poison everywhere. It's really starting to get in the way.

0130235021023528--.name: Which is why I volunteered to have a youngster like you go take care of them.

0130235021023531--.name: Hey! What're you still doing here? Didn't I volunteer you for a mission?

0130235021023532--.name: Well, look at that. You did it. Not bad, cadet.

0130235021023533--.name: I'm gonna sleep well tonight, thanks to you! You know how the saying goes: one reliable cadet is worth a hundred loyal offspring! BAHAHAHAHA!

0130235021023534--.name: Cadet, about time you got here. Can't you see there's something on my mind?

0130235021023535--.name: Yeah, you look awful. Really awful. Oh no! Are you dying?

0130235021023536--.name: Your concern touches my heart, cadet. I know how much I mean to you. But if I'm dying, it's only from stress.

0130235021023537--.name: Thoughts of that blasted $npcName:23000099$ consume my mind, interrupting my sleep. As you can see, it's taken a toll on my complexion.

0130235021023538--.name: See, if it were a reasonable hunk of rock, it'd stay in the ruins and leave me in peace. But does it? No. The $npcName:23000099$ has to rampage around and smash things.

0130235021023539--.name: The worst part is, it also takes over the fortresses of Perion, completely obliterating the good name of the Royal Guard!

0130235021023540--.name: This cannot be allowed to stand!

0130235021023541--.name: Don't worry, Sir. I'll handle it.

0130235021023543--.name: Anything for your beauty sleep, Sir!

0130235021023544--.name: <font color="#909090">(The world is a scary place...)</font>

0130235021023545--.name: Why are you still here, cadet? Did you have snails for breakfast? Why so slow? Get this done!

0130235021023546--.name: You're finally back! How'd things go?

0130235021023547--.name: It went great! You can rest in peace now, Sir, so to speak.

0130235021023548--.name: BAHAHAHAHA! I know how to pick 'em, don't I? You and I make a great team, cadet.

0130235021023549--.name: There you are, $MyPCName$. I've been waiting for you.

0130235021023550--.name: The crew of Sky Fortress looks up to you. I've been keeping an eye on you as well.

0130235021023551--.name: Which I why I want to further test your abilities on a critical mission I've set aside just for you.

0130235021023553--.name: Let's not get carried away. For all I know, this could end up being a huge mistake.

0130235021023556--.name: In any case, I'll be briefing you on this mission myself, as our tactical officer is otherwise occupied. You've heard of $npcName:23000026[gender:1]$, I assume?

0130235021023557--.name: Of the three Baphomets, $npcName:23000026[gender:1]$ has always been the most spiteful. She's the cause of the freezing gusts constantly pestering us from $map:02000260$.

0130235021023558--.name: It's time something was done. You, $MyPCName$, are the one assigned to do it.

0130235021023559--.name: If you have any concerns that this task will be too difficult for you, share them now.

0130235021023560--.name: I told you, Captain. I've got this.

0130235021023561--.name: Very well. I leave it to you.

0130235021023562--.name: You haven't departed? I take that to mean you're making preparations for the critical mission ahead.

0130235021023563--.name: Based on your prior records, I hope I can trust you to perform adequately?

0130235021023564--.name: <font color="#909090">(Yeesh, the Captain sure can be passive aggressive at times.)</font>

0130235021023565--.name: Yup, I was just heading out!

0130235021023566--.name: Excellent. I'll be keeping an eye on your progress.

0130235021023567--.name: You've completed your mission admirably. Well done.

0130235021023568--.name: I don't believe we'll be hearing from the Baphomets again any time soon, thanks to you.

0130235021023569--.name: Go ahead and take a break before your next mission. It won't be long, so make the most of it.

0130235021023572--.name: As "okay" as can be expected, yes. But...

0130235021023573--.name: Since assuming command of Sky Fortress, I haven't had a chance to put my combat skills to practical use.

0130235021023574--.name: Prior to being stationed here, I was most proficient with a sword. The only person in the entire Tria Navy who could match my skills was my fath—was Admiral Martini.

0130235021023575--.name: But even the sharpest blade dulls with neglect. If the admiral saw me now... I shudder to think what measures he would take.

0130235021023576--.name: I will not stand for it!

0130235021023577--.name: This is really getting to you, isn't it?

0130235021023578--.name: I'd be happy to spar with you, if you think it'll help.

0130235021023580--.name: Thank you. This means more to me than you could know.

0130235021023581--.name: It's not something I can ask of my crew. None would dare risk hurting their commanding officer. But for you to simply volunteer... Again, thank you.

0130235021023582--.name: Shall we get right to it?

0130235021023583--.name: $npcName:11003536$, reduce our speed and set a stable course. $MyPCName$ and I are going to take in some fresh air on the top deck.

0130235021023584--.name: Oooh! Captain! You finally found a sparring partner! Congratulations!!

0130235021023586--.name: My lips are sealed! Not another word out of me! $MyPCName$, this will be really good training for you, too!

0131114921023725--.name:
Meet me on the top deck when you're ready. 
<font color="#909090">(You can challenge Captain Veliche via the Fortress Rumbles on the Challenge Map.)</font>

0130235021023587--.name:
Meet me on the top deck when you're ready. 
<font color="#909090">(You can challenge Captain Veliche via the Fortress Rumbles on the Challenge Map.)</font>

0130235021023588--.name: I haven't had such an exciting match for years!

0130235021023589--.name: I thought the admiral was the only one who could stand against my blades, but I was wrong.

0130235021023590--.name: $MyPCName$, would you be willing to spar with me again, from time to time?

0130235021023594--.name: Thank you, $MyPCName$. You have my gratitude.

0130235021023595--.name: Are you prepared for another sparring session with me?

0130235021023596--.name: Let's see how much you've improved since our last match.

0130235021023597--.name:
Meet me on the top deck when you're ready. 
(If you accept this mission, you cannot begin any other weekly [Special] Fortress Rumble missions until the weekly reset.)

0130235021023598--.name:
Meet me on the top deck when you're ready. 
(If you accept this mission, you cannot begin any other weekly [Special] Fortress Rumble missions until the weekly reset.)

0130235021023600--.name: The more you better yourself, the better the Alliance becomes. I look forward to our next match.

0130235021023601--.name: You're pretty busy these days! Not too busy for your old sweetheart $npcName:11003584$, I hope...

0130235021023602--.name: Is Condor hogging you for himself? Or is Nainai keeping you occupied picking weird litter off the street? I swear, if they're trying to keep you from me...

0130235021023603--.name: No need to take it out on them! Honestly, at least their missions are straightforward.

0130235021023604--.name: Aw, you think my missions are tough? That's 'cause you can't just muscle your way through them like a dumb guard.

0130235021023605--.name: I had no idea you were so insecure, $MyPCName$. You should've mentioned it sooner.

0130235021023606--.name: I know exactly what to do. I think it's time I told you about...

0130235021023608--.name: This isn't going to involve torture, is it?

0130235021023610--.name: Is it too late to back out?

0130235021023612--.name: Don't worry. I lived through this training, and so will you. And really, the concept is simple.

0130235021023613--.name: The technique is called... "Kill or be killed."

0130235021023615--.name: Oh, no you aren't. Not unless you want me to slip worms into your ears while you sleep. Trust me, this is the only way to squeeze every last drop of potential out of you.

0130235021023616--.name:
C'mon, let's start the training. Only one of us will leave this alive, so I guess this is goodbye, too.
<font color="#909090">(You can challenge Schatten via the Fortress Rumbles on the Challenge Map.)</font>

0130235021023617--.name:
C'mon, let's start the training. Only one of us will leave this alive, so I guess this is goodbye, too.
<font color="#909090">(You can challenge Schatten via the Fortress Rumbles on the Challenge Map.)</font>

0130235021023618--.name: Ha! You should've seen your face! You didn't really think I was gonna kill you, right? Silly kitten.

0130235021023619--.name: I realized something while we sparred... Perhaps this particular bit of Shadow Walker training is, well, flawed.

0130235021023620--.name: What's the point of getting stronger if you've got the blood of someone you care about on your hands?

0130235021023621--.name: If it weren't for that training, I might've even been able to tell that scrawny instructor how I felt...

0130235021023622--.name: Whoa, I sense a tragic backstory!

0130235021023623--.name: Never mind that. $MyPCName$, do you really want to get stronger? In that case, I'll train you myself!

0130235021023624--.name: Perhaps training you will give me the courage to face my mentor again someday...

0130235021023625--.name: Just let me know whenever you want a rematch!

0130235021023626--.name: You. Me. A cage in a secret underground bunker. What do you say?

0130235021023627--.name:
I can't wait to give you some of my... undivided attention. 
(If you accept this mission, you cannot begin any other weekly [Special] Fortress Rumble missions until the weekly reset.)

0130235021023628--.name:
I can't wait to give you some of my... undivided attention. 
(If you accept this mission, you cannot begin any other weekly [Special] Fortress Rumble missions until the weekly reset.)

0130235021023629--.name: Not bad, hot stuff. I can tell you're improving.

0130235021023630--.name: But don't expect me to make things so easy for you next time.

0130235021023631--.name: $MyPCName$, do you have a moment? There's a place I'd like to show you.

0130235021023633--.name: In accordance with the order's Code of the Seventh Apocrypha, it is my duty to subject you to the holy rite of trial by ordeal.

0130235021023635--.name: To put it simply, to determine whether you are the one the oracle spoke of, you must come with me. This could determine your entire destiny.

0130235021023636--.name: You have tremendous potential. I've seen it myself while observing you in action. Perhaps you really could be the hero chosen to protect the world.

0130235021023637--.name: But anyone can have potential. I need to be sure.

0130235021023638--.name: Which is why I decided to put you to the test.

0130235021023640--.name: To determine whether you are the one the oracle foretold, you must fight in a battle... against me.

0130235021023641--.name: Can't you just, like, touch my forehead and sense my destiny? Or maybe read some tea leaves? Anything?

0130235021023642--.name: A prophecy is a dangerous thing. It defies rhyme or reason. If you can't defeat me, then this fate was not meant for you.

0130235021023643--.name: This is your chance to prove yourself worthy of guarding and protecting the world. Will you come and hear the voice of the oracle with me?

0130235021023645--.name: Very good. Kindly keep in mind that I will not hold back. It is my duty to fight you with all my strength.

0130235021023646--.name:
I'll see you shortly. 
<font color="#909090">(You can challenge Mason via the Fortress Rumbles on the Challenge Map.)</font>

0130235021023647--.name:
I'll see you shortly. 
<font color="#909090">(You can challenge Mason via the Fortress Rumbles on the Challenge Map.)</font>

0130235021023648--.name: Unfortunately, the prophecy did not physically manifest before us. The oracle remained silent. How disappointing.

0130235021023649--.name: And yet... I cannot deny the power and potential that I felt within you as we fought.

0130235021023650--.name: Perhaps... Perhaps that is more important than some ancient promise full of indecipherable riddles.

0130235021023651--.name: If so, then... Hmmm... Yes, I've decided.

0130235021023652--.name: $MyPCName$, we will spar from time to time. Perhaps, if we give the oracle more opportunities to speak, we will learn your true destiny.

0130235021023653--.name: If you remain diligent and hard-working, who knows what your future may bring.

0130235021023655--.name: Very good, $MyPCName$. I will be here whenever you're ready.

0130235021023656--.name: I... I almost can't believe I'm risking so much on something that is yet unproven...

0130235021023657--.name: This could get me removed from the Lumiknights. Yet, if it's for the greater good, perhaps that is my destiny.

0130235021023658--.name: I hear a whispering in my soul. It can only mean one thing...

0130235021023659--.name:
Today is the day the oracle will speak. 
(If you accept this mission, you cannot begin any other weekly [Special] Fortress Rumble missions until the weekly reset.)

0130235021023660--.name:
Today is the day the oracle will speak. 
(If you accept this mission, you cannot begin any other weekly [Special] Fortress Rumble missions until the weekly reset.)

0130235021023663--.name: We will try again in our next battle.

0130235021023665--.name: I have not given up hope...

0130235021023666--.name: ...that you may be the one to punish the gods!

0130235021023670--.name: Geez, Nainai. Is that the best you can do? "Combat Simulator"? How unoriginal.

0130235021023671--.name: Why don't you name it something like...

0130235021023673--.name: Schatten! Be serious! How on earth did you come up with a name like that?

0130235021023674--.name: I don't know. I found a bunch of weird comic books in the tactical office quarters...

0130235021023675--.name: Those aren't mine!! And why are you snooping around in my room?!

0130235021023676--.name: I'm Schatten, baby. I am everywhere and nowhere...

0130235021023677--.name: Give me a break! You're always doing things to make me lose focus.

0130235021023678--.name: Just ignore her, $MyPCName$. She's just making all that stuff about the comic books up!

0130235021023680--.name: Ahem! Anyway, where was I? Oh yes, my Combat Simulator is in its final stages of testing.

0130235021023681--.name: It creates a virtual space that's every bit as detailed as real life! The combat AI is so sophisticated, not a single tester has been able to beat the simulation.

0130235021023682--.name: There's just one problem. I fed it every engagement manual we have on file, but I don't know how it will do against someone with a more... unorthodox style.

0130235021023683--.name: So I was thinking... Would you be willing to try out my simulator, $MyPCName$? I think the AI would be able to learn a lot from you.

0130235021023685--.name:
Thank you! I'll get the simulator running right away! 
<font color="#909090">(You can test out the Combat Simulator via the Fortress Rumbles on the Challenge Map.)</font>

0130235021023686--.name:
Thank you! I'll get the simulator running right away! 
<font color="#909090">(You can test out the Combat Simulator via the Fortress Rumbles on the Challenge Map.)</font>

0130235021023688--.name: I don't understand! Where are all these anomalies coming from?! The simulator was perfect just a moment ago!

0130235021023689--.name: It was a tough fight, I'll tell you that.

0130235021023690--.name: Sure, that's great, but how am I supposed to interpret this data? It doesn't match any model I've ever seen!
