0130235021023691--.name: And according to these reports, you weren't even scratching your combat potential. How can this be...?

0130235021023692--.name: $MyPCName$! You did this, so you have to fix it! I need your help if I'm ever going to get the simulator working properly!

0130235021023693--.name: You'll test it again later, won't you? I'll make sure it gives you an even bigger challenge next time!

0130235021023694--.name: My upgrades are ready! This round of testing won't be like last time!

0130235021023695--.name:
Shall we jump right in? 
(If you accept this mission, you cannot begin any other weekly [Special] Fortress Rumble missions until the weekly reset.)

0130235021023696--.name:
Shall we jump right in? 
(If you accept this mission, you cannot begin any other weekly [Special] Fortress Rumble missions until the weekly reset.)

0130235021023697--.name: ...All this data... So many anomalies... Thousands of errors...

0130235021023698--.name: Why is it giving me different results each time?!

0130235021023699--.name: You must be improving as well, $MyPCName$... I think my simulator is picking up on it...

0130235021023700--.name: I need more data! I'm going to work on a patch. Help me test it out later!

0130235021023701--.name: How's it feel to work for me, cadet? Puts a bit of swagger into your step, doesn't it?

0130235021023702--.name: Absolutely, sir. Swagger positively oozes from my pores by now.

0130235021023703--.name: Stick with me, cadet, and you'll rocket to the top in no time.

0130235021023704--.name: Of course, you better be willing to put in the work.

0130235021023705--.name: Let me bring you in on a Royal Guard tradition. My captain offered it to me, and I'm offering it to you: a friendly spar. Just you and me, what do you say?

0130235021023706--.name: Forget that I tower over you in hierarchy for a moment, and just show me what you've got!

0130235021023707--.name: Gee, sir, wow! I'd be honored! I accept!

0130235021023708--.name: Wipe that grin off your face, cadet. When I fight, I fight for keeps.

0130235021023709--.name:
Well, what're you waiting for? Let's get this match started!
<font color="#909090">(You can spar with Condor via the Fortress Rumbles on the Challenge Map.)</font>

0130235021023710--.name:
Well, what're you waiting for? Let's get this match started!
<font color="#909090">(You can spar with Condor via the Fortress Rumbles on the Challenge Map.)</font>

0130235021023711--.name: You call that a fight? All I gotta say is...

0130235021023713--.name: You don't pull your punches just 'cause you're fighting your captain. I like that!

0130235021023714--.name: Fight me again sometime. With the right training, you'll go far.

0130235021023715--.name: Who knows? Maybe I'll pummel some of my greatness into you! BAHAHAHA!

0130235021023717--.name:
Good! Let's get ready to rumble!
(If you accept this mission, you cannot begin any other weekly [Special] Fortress Rumble missions until the weekly reset.)

0130235021023718--.name:
Good! Let's get ready to rumble!
(If you accept this mission, you cannot begin any other weekly [Special] Fortress Rumble missions until the weekly reset.)

0130235021023719--.name: Get a load of you! You're improving, day by day!

0130235021023721--.name: What a workout! Why don't we sweat it out at the sauna? Just don't mention it to the captain!

0130235021023722--.name: You can visit the sauna all you wish... when you aren't on duty.

0130235021023723--.name: You know I'd never slack off at work, Captain! I was joking!

0131133021023726--.name: You're just in time for a new mission, $MyPCName$.

0131133021023727--.name: We've received a sudden request for aid from $map:02000255$.

0131133021023729--.name: Their report states that robots have swarmed the area, preventing residents from passing through.

0131133021023731--.name: We're not exactly sure where they came from, but sheesh, how long do we have to keep cleaning up other people's messes?

0131133021023732--.name: They keep pestering us because they know the captain won't turn them down, but they oughtta treat us with a little more respect!

0131133021023733--.name: I recognize that the situation is less than ideal, $npcName:11003536[gender:0]$. Still, it's our duty to respond to support requests.

0131133021023734--.name: There's no one else for these people to turn to. We have to lend aid if we expect the situation in $map:02000255$ to stabilize.

0131133021023735--.name: We may be the Shield of the Sky, but we cannot turn our backs on any who face turmoil.

0131133021023736--.name: You're right,  Captain, of course. We'll provide all the support we can.

0131133021023738--.name: Very good. Now, $MyPCName$, head to $map:02000255$ and eliminate the robots who have taken control of the area.

0131133021023739--.name: I gave you your orders. Is there some kind of problem?

0131133021023740--.name: Nah, no problem. Just returned for some supplies.

0131133021023741--.name: Good. I'm trusting you to handle the mission after you've restocked your supplies.

0131133021023742--.name: You're back. Have you completed your mission?

0131133021023743--.name: Let me put it this way... $MyPCName$: 1, robots: 0.

0131133021023744--.name: Hey now, $male:handsome,female:gorgeous$, it's not over yet. We've received reports of additional enemy activity in the area.

0131133021023745--.name: $npcName:11003535[gender:1]$'s right. Scan results confirm that there's an increase of monsters in that area once again.

0131133021023746--.name: I'll bet a thousand mesos that someone's herding the robots around. You know, there's something really suspicious about that alchemist from Taliskar...

0131133021023747--.name: For now, let's just focus on what needs to get done.

0131133021023749--.name: Reconnaissance, naturally. $npcName:11003535[gender:1]$, you're up. Grab your supplies and get ready to head out.

0131133021023750--.name: Considering who may be involved, we'll want to handle this as covertly as possible. Think you can sniff your way to the bottom of this without being discovered?

0131133021023751--.name: Sniffing bottoms is my specialty, Captain. I've got this.

0131133021023752--.name: $MyPCName$, you've done well. It's only a matter a time before the folks below ask for more support, but we'll deal with that when it happens.

0131133021023753--.name: You know how to reach me.

0131133021023754--.name: Get some rest and stand by for the next mission. Dismissed.

0131133021023755--.name: Hi, sweetie. You here to help me out?

0131133021023756--.name: Some hoodlums out at the $map:02000083$ are causing trouble.

0131133021023758--.name: We're not sure exactly. They all wear masks. We do know that they're running around assaulting the residents and stealing their stuff.

0131133021023759--.name: The locals have tried their best to maintain order, but these hoodlums must have political connections because nothing's been done locally to get rid of them.

0131133021023760--.name: The area is technically under my jurisdiction, so I'm stepping in.

0131133021023761--.name: I'd deal with them myself, if I had it my way. But, since the local citizens probably wouldn't appreciate my methods, I'm sending you instead.

0131133021023763--.name: Oh, you know. Some dismembered limbs, some gouged-out organs. Same old, same old. Anyway, head to $map:02000083$ when you have a chance, okay?

0131133021023764--.name: Did you complete your mission already? You didn't get lost, did you?

0131133021023767--.name: I took care of them, and their little dogs, too!

0131133021023768--.name: Wonderful! I knew I could count on you, $male:handsome,female:gorgeous$.

0131133021023769--.name: You probably didn't completely dismantle their organization, but they should stay quiet for a while.

0131133021023771--.name: Then... I'll just have to step in myself.

0131133021023772--.name: You just sent a shiver down my spine.

0131133021023773--.name: I'm sure they're not entirely stupid. It'll be fine. And if not, I'll get to have a good time. Everybody wins. Great work, darling!

0131133021023781--.name: Your sense of humor tickles me, $MyPCName$.

0131133021023785--.name: Very well. As I just told you telepathically, now that the existence of the Lumiknights has been declassified, I feel comfortable taking a more aggressive stance.

0131133021023786--.name: You've been to the $map:02000146$. You've felt firsthand the power of the darkness there. The creatures have all become tainted.

0131133021023787--.name: If nothing is done, they will spread that darkness to other parts of Maple World. That must not be permitted to happen.

0131133021023789--.name: Cull the enemies there. It's a temporary measure, but at this time, a necessary one.

0131133021023790--.name: Slowing the darkness is the best we can do until we can stop its source once and for all.

0131133021023791--.name: Now, did my briefing stick with you the second time around?

0131133021023793--.name: Wonderful. Then there's not time to lose.

0131133021023794--.name: Each moment you delay is a moment the enemy takes advantage of...

0131133021023795--.name: Ah, the darkness has abated somewhat.

0131133021023796--.name: I knew you were the right choice for this mission.

0131133021023797--.name: I got rid of as many monsters as I could, but new ones appeared just as fast...

0131133021023798--.name: Yes... The darkness has a strong foothold there. It troubles me as well.

0131133021023799--.name: My order closely monitors that area. I'll notify you if the balance grows too skewed.

0131133021023801--.name: Don't you know? You'll become very busy, $MyPCName$.

0131133021023803--.name: For now, we've done enough to allow ourselves a moment to breathe. Thank you, $MyPCName$.

0131133021023804--.name: I was just thinking of you, $MyPCName$.

0131133021023805--.name: If you've got a minute, could you do me a favor?

0131133021023807--.name: I got a call from an old friend. She's also a member of the Green Hoods.

0131133021023808--.name: She said that the area around $map:02000038$ has seen a sharp increase in monsters lately.

0131133021023809--.name: It's hard for her team to handle, since they're based in $map:02000076$, which is really far away.

0131133021023810--.name: My heart goes out to all the innocent people suffering... I think you know where I'm going with this, $MyPCName$.

0131133021023811--.name: Say no more. I'm on it.

0131133021023813--.name: Wait just a moment, and I'll get you on your way.

0131133021023814--.name: How is $map:02000038$? Teach those monsters what's good for them!

0131133021023816--.name: The junior members of the Green Hoods saw what you did. They couldn't stop raving about how amazing you were, $MyPCName$!

0131133021023818--.name: It's not nothing! Your help is making a big difference!

0131133021023821--.name: Can you keep helping us, just like this time, now and again?

0131133021023822--.name: I know it's a lot to ask, and that you've already helped us so much, but...

0131133021023825--.name: You have no idea what a huge impact you're making, $MyPCName$! I look forward to working with you!

0131133021023827--.name: Didn't I give you the look 30 minutes ago? What took you so long?

0131133021023828--.name: No, Sir! I must've missed the look, Sir!

0131133021023829--.name: I consider myself a nice guy. I'll forgive you this time.

0131133021023830--.name: Now, I seem to recall you had fairly decent combat skills, is that right?

0131133021023831--.name: I do okay. Nothing compared to you, Sir.

0131133021023832--.name: That's to be expected. It's smart to realize your own limitations. It's what lets you know when people are pandering to you. Now, about the mission...

0131133021023833--.name: Your word is my command, Sir!

0131133021023834--.name: The Royal Guards work day and night to keep $map:02000001$ safe, but enemies from $map:02000088$ have been a huge pain in the rump lately.

0131133021023835--.name: The city could be attacked at any moment. Without proper rest between attacks, do you think the guards will be ready?

0131133021023837--.name: Right! And that's why you need to step in and teach our enemies a lesson!

0131133021023838--.name: You got it! It's not like I'm ever busy or need rest!

0131133021023839--.name: Exactly! Because you're Strike Team Condor!

0131133021023840--.name: You... really do actually have a lot of faith in me, don't you?

0131133021023842--.name: Have you completed your mission? If not, then why are you talking to me?!

0131133021023844--.name: Have things in $map:02000088$ been sorted out?

0131133021023846--.name: Great! That's one burden off my shoulders.

0131133021023847--.name: Sometimes, the newer guards worry me. They act so clueless. At least they seem to gain courage from seeing you in action.

0131133021023849--.name: May I speak with you for a moment, $MyPCName$?

0131133021023851--.name: It's time we ran a drill to make sure you're up to your duties aboard Sky Fortress.

0131133021023854--.name: Absolutely. You've proven your mettle in the past, but even the greatest soldier will begin to backslide if $male:he's,female:she's$ not testing her limits on a regular basis.

0131133021023855--.name: As such, I must require that every crewperson under my command run regular drills.

0131133021023857--.name: Okay. How do we do this?

0131133021023858--.name: It's simple. Complete a mission for me. We'll monitor your progress from here.

0131133021023862--.name: Prove that you're worthy of being a part of this crew by completing a mission. You may begin.

0131133021023863--.name: You haven't started your mission yet? You know there's a time limit, right?

0131133021023864--.name: Ah, so you've completed your mission.

0131133021023865--.name: Then it's time to analyze the results.

0131133021023866--.name: Let's see here. The results say...

0131133021023867--.name: You meet all requirements for active duty service aboard Sky Fortress.

0131133021023869--.name: You've earned your spot on my ship for the time being.

0131133021023870--.name: So I'm done with the drills now, right? Done forever?

0131133021023871--.name: $MyPCName$, you will have to take these routine drills for as long as you stay under my command.

0131133021023875--.name: It's time for drills! You ready?

0131133021023877--.name: Aww, do I have to do this every time?!

0131133021023878--.name: You silly goose, have you forgotten already? It's a test to ensure you're still fit to carry out Dark Wind missions!

0131133021023880--.name: I'm well aware of your... prowess... but rules are rules.

0131133021023882--.name: Great. The test is simple, just do what I say,

0131133021023885--.name: The clock is ticking. If you don't hurry it up, you might not pass.

0131133021023887--.name: Now, let's take a look at your results.

0131133021023889--.name: Don't get so tense, kitten. Of course you passed.

0131133021023890--.name: Well done, but I would've rather spent that time cozying up in my room with you than on a silly test.

0131133021023891--.name: Uh, that'd be a hard pass.

0131133021023892--.name: Are you sure? I have a lot of information stored in this noggin' that I'm sure you're aching to... unlock.

0131133021023893--.name: Pfft, only if $male:he,female:she$ has a death wish.

0131133021023894--.name: Come now, $npcName:11003862$. You spent time with me, and you're alive, aren't you? Are you interested in a second round?

0131133021023895--.name: I'd better get out of here before I say something I regret. I'll catch you cats later.

0131133021023896--.name: And there he goes. There's a lot I can tell you about him when we have some time alone, kitten.

0131133021023898--.name: It's time for you to be tested.

0131133021023901--.name: To see if you're worthy to stay aboard Sky Fortress. To see if you're worthy to talk to me.

0131133021023902--.name: So if I fail, does that mean... Never mind.

0131133021023903--.name: The Lumiknights have a similar test for new knights. It entails...

0131133021023907--.name: What do I need to do?

0131133021023908--.name: Just complete the mission that I ask of you. Simple enough, no?

0131133021023911--.name: I appreciated how you tackled the test.

0131133021023913--.name: I already relayed the results to you telepathically...

0131133021023915--.name: And I'll repeat them again out loud. You passed. It's a relief that I don't need to erase your memories.

0131133021023917--.name: Of course. I can't allow just anyone to recall having seen or talked to me.

0131133021023918--.name: But you and I... We'll get to keep our shared connection for some time yet. Isn't that special?

0131133021023919--.name: Ah, are you here for the drill, $MyPCName$?

0131133021023920--.name: You're early. Very diligent. I approve!

0131133021023923--.name: Are you serious? You don't know what the drill entails?

0131133021023924--.name: But you do realize that if you fail, you'll be forced to leave the fleet and be banned from setting foot on the Sky Fortress for an entire year? You know that part, right?

0131133021023925--.name: Where have you been, $MyPCName$?! Everyone, from the captain to the janitor, needs to take this test!

0131133021023928--.name: Now, are you ready to begin?

0131133021023929--.name: As ready as I'll ever be.

0131133021023931--.name: Just, uh, tell me what to do!

0131133021023932--.name: It's simple. If you can complete a mission I give you, you pass! That's it!

0131133021023933--.name: You do realize I'm tracking the amount of time it takes you to complete the test, don't you?

0131133021023935--.name: You were even better than I expected.

0131133021023936--.name: I'll make sure to increase the difficulty next time!

0131133021023937--.name: Or we could just skip it...

0131133021023938--.name: No way! We have to stick to the established processes. Nobody gets special treatment!

0131133021023939--.name: And that includes me, as well. I have to run drills, just like everyone else.

0131133021023940--.name: You barely made it, cadet! I was about to cut you from the list!

0131133021023941--.name: Why are you still dragging your feet? Hurry it up!

0131133021023943--.name: Just give me one more chance!

0131133021023944--.name: It's time for drills! You do know what drills are, don't you?

0131133021023946--.name: Did you think you had a permanent spot aboard Sky Fortress, cadet?

0131133021023947--.name: No! We have to test you now and again to make sure you're still fit for service!

0131133021023949--.name: What're you waiting for, then? Get to it!

0131133021023950--.name: I'm ready when you are, Sir.

0131133021023952--.name: As thoroughly as I could, considering I just found out about this.

0131133021023953--.name: Good enough. Now... go and complete one of my missions! That's the drill!

0131133021023954--.name: What are you still fooling around here for? Do you want to get kicked out?

0131133021023955--.name: You've still got it, cadet. You had me worried for a minute there.

0131133021023956--.name: I now officially deem you worthy... to continue working under me... until your next drill. Walk proud today, cadet!

0131133021023958--.name: Of course it is! Not many people get to see my face every day!

0131133021023959--.name: But never take that privilege for granted, or I'll kick you off this ship so fast you'll get airsick.

0131133021023960--.name: Your face is never far from my mind, Sir!

0131133021023961--.name: Good, good. Now what're you doing standing around for? Go find another mission to do!

1217195521026092-Kritias_2018_12-.name: As you know, the crew of the Sky Fortress undergoes regular testing to ensure they remain fit for duty. Once again, it is nearly time for everyone to prove themselves.

1217195521026093-Kritias_2018_12-.name: However, it's come to my attention that many among our crew believe these tests are too easy.

0116160121029234-Kritias_2018_12-.name: So, I've decided to increase their difficulty.

1217195521026094-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'd like you to be my test case to ensure the examination is adequately difficult. But remember, this exercise is not about simply passing or failing; it is an evaluation of your ability to carry out missions. Don't be discouraged if you fall short.

1217195521026095-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Your task is simply to carry out a series of missions in Kritias. It is up to you to decide which missions you will undertake. Good luck.

1217195521026096-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Your evaluation was more than satisfactory. You are clearly qualified to take on S-Class missions.

1217195521026097-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thank you for your assistance. I don't see any problems holding the rest of the crew to the same standards.

1217195521026098-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We haven't been in Kritias long, but it's already clear that there are a great number of robots here.

1217195521026099-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Certainly, they may vary in appearance and function, but they all seem to have one commonality.

1217195521026101-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They are all hostile to us. They attack our scouts indiscriminately.

1217195521026102-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If these machines are intelligent, it is time we taught them that their aggression against us will be repaid tenfold. To that end, I would like you to decimate the following targets: $npcNamePlural:25020001$ in $map:02020029$, $npcNamePlural:25020101[gender:0]$ in $map:02020030$, and $npcNamePlural:25020201$ in $map:02020031$.

0116160121029235-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Consider this an opportunity not only to teach them a lesson, but to assess their abilities and vulnerabilities.

1217195521026103-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You haven't left yet? Well, be careful. This is sure to be a dangerous mission.

1217195521026104-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ah, you've returned. What have you learned?

1217195521026105-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well for a start, some of the targets on your list weren't machines at all—they were soldiers in high-tech armor.

1217195521026106-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I see... It seems we have much to learn about our new adversaries.

1217195521026108-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Are you ready for your routine performance evaluation?

1217195521026109-Kritias_2018_12-.name: With all of the stresses of our work, especially in this new continent, it is important to ensure each one of us is prepared for whatever challenges come our way.

0116160121029236-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I expect everyone to take this examination seriously.

0116160121029237-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That includes you, $MyPCName$. Despite your many accomplishments, you cannot afford to grow complacent. Should it be determined you are no longer fit for service, I will have no choice but to restrict you from all missions until you redeem yourself.

1217195521026110-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I expect only the best from each among our crew. Give this assignment your all.

1217195521026111-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Good job, $MyPCName$. I'm sure it was difficult, but you completed everything I asked of you.

1217195521026112-Kritias_2018_12-.name: But don't grow complacent. Before you know it, it will be time for your next examination.

1217195521026113-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, do you remember the dropship you used when you first arrived in Kritias? We've had some problems with a remote launch and recovery. The craft seems to be experiencing a systems malfunction.

1217195521026115-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Before we can recover the dropship, we'll need to repair it. But that could take several days, even without monsters in the area chewing on vital components.

1217195521026116-Kritias_2018_12-.name: A dropship is too great a resource to abandon. Therefore, I'd like you to travel to $map:02020029$ and deal with our vermin problem.

1217195521026117-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please hurry to the dropship before it is damaged beyond repair.

0116160121029239-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I got rid of any monster that even looked in the direction of the dropship. I think the craft should be safe until we can repair it.

1217195521026119-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Excellent work. We will retrieve the ship as soon as repairs are complete.

1217195521026120-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Reports are coming back about the wide variety of lifeforms that call Kritias home.

1217195521026121-Kritias_2018_12-.name: While some pose no real threat at all, a great many appear hostile.

1217195521026122-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I would like you to engage these lifeforms in battle and determine if any are a threat to our operations here.

0116160121029240-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hostile or not, they're nothing the Alliance can't handle!

1217195521026126-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Kritias is a land both of great technological wonders and tremendous natural beauty. It's only natural that our crew should feel a certain sense of peace here.

1217195521026127-Kritias_2018_12-.name: However, the Daemon Army has no respect for nature. It seems the machines in their thrall are cutting down trees in $map:02020029$.

1217195521026128-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our analysis indicates they are collecting lumber to construct a military base.

1217195521026129-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Needless to say, we cannot allow that. Destroy $npcNamePlural:25020001$ in $map:02020029$ to deny them their military base and protect the forest.

1217195521026130-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hurry. We cannot allow them to complete their military base.

0116160121029242-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The mechanical menace has been disrupted.

1217195521026136-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our researchers have been wanting to bring back docile lifeforms for study. With them being more the scholarly type, I need a volunteer animal wrangler to capture specimens for study.

1217195521026137-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The first creature on their list for study is the $item:61000153$ native to $map:02020029$. Please capture two and return here.

1217195521026138-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The first creature on their list for study is the $item:61000153$ native to $map:02020029$. Please capture two and return here.

1217195521026139-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Here it is, some freshly caught $itemPlural:61000153$.

1217195521026141-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hmm. It's not the prettiest creature, is it? Are there no cats native to Kritias?

1217195521026142-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, we have an urgent mission! $npcName:11004395[gender:1]$'s adjutant $npcName:11004396[gender:0]$ just called us to request backup.

1217195521026143-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The Tairen Kingdom's forces are attacking $map:02020030$, and Humanitas's defenses are undermanned.

1217195521026145-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I knew I could count on you. Go to $map:02020030$ and assist our allies by defeating $npcNamePlural:25020101[gender:0]$.

1217195521026146-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Leave at once. Humanitas cannot survive the loss of $map:02020030$!

1217195521026147-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Humanitas called to thank me for your swift response. Excellent work today.

0116160121029244-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Indeed. And Humanitas will never forget that when they were in peril, we did not hesitate to come to their aid.

1217195521026149-Kritias_2018_12-.name: <font color="#909090">(Looks like it's time for another mission!)</font>

1217195521026150-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The Special Projects division of Sky Fortress's R&D team has been hard at work studying the mechanized soldiers of Kritias, however, their research has come to  something of a standstill.

1217195521026151-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The lab needs new machine components to analyze, but their target of choice represents a substantial threat to our average operative.

1217195521026152-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They want to harvest a particular part from the $npcNamePlural:25020201$ in $map:02020031$. That's where you come in.

1217195521026153-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I want you to go to $map:02020031$ and harvest $item:30001218$ from the $npcNamePlural:25020201$.

1217195521026154-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I want you to go to $map:02020031$ and harvest $item:30001218$ from the $npcNamePlural:25020201$.

1217195521026155-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I brought the parts you asked for.

0116160121029245-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The R&D team will be excited to get their hands on these. Good work, $MyPCName$.

1217195521026156-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Their research could be vital in the battle against these mechanical foes.

1217195521026157-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've never seen anything quite like the harmony of nature and technology evidenced in Kritias. It is quite a marvel.

1217195521026159-Kritias_2018_12-.name: On a related note, we've received reports that the Daemon Army has been tearing up $map:02020029$.

1217195521026160-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our analysts have determined they are constructing a military base. Obviously, we cannot allow them to gain such a foothold in the region.

1217195521026161-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You are to travel to $map:02020029$ immediately and destroy the $npcNamePlural:25020002$ before their work goes any further.

1217195521026163-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our sensors report a significant drop in $npcNamePlural:25020002$ in the area.

0116160121029246-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The Daemon Army won't be building a new base there any time soon. Good work, $MyPCName$.

1217195521026165-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $npcName:11004395[gender:1]$'s adjutant, $npcName:11004396[gender:0]$, has contacted us over the fear of the growing number of $npcNamePlural:25020102$ outside $map:02020030$.

1217195521026166-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They to gather intelligence and test the town's defenses, putting all of its citizens at risk.

1217195521026167-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I want you to go and assist our friends in $map:02020030$ by dealing with their $npcName:25020102$ problem. Are you up to the task?

1217195521026168-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hurry. Every moment we waste, the people of $map:02020030$ are in danger.

1217195521026169-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Good work, $MyPCName$. Humanitas and the civilians under their care can rest easy tonight thanks to you.

0116160121029249-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I dare say you'll soon be recognized not just as a $male:hero,female:heroine$ of Maple World, but of Kritias as well.

1217195521026170-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We have built a safehaven for ourselves in Kritias, but resources remain a constant concern. We must expand our efforts to become self-sufficient in this new land.

1217195521026171-Kritias_2018_12-.name: In the meantime, there's a perfectly functional extraction operation sitting abandoned in $map:02020031$. Why not secure it, get it running again, and start trading the resources we extract with Humanitas?

1217195521026172-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our crystal thingies for their food. Sounds like a fair trade to me!

0116160121029250-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That place is abandoned for a reason! It's crawling with hostile forces!

1217195521026173-Kritias_2018_12-.name: So why don't we throw Strike Team Condor at them? $MyPCName$ will have that placed mopped up in no time!

1217195521026175-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Did you come up with this idea all on your own?

1217195521026176-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's been quite some time since he's provided an idea of substance. Quickly, someone mark this down on the calendar.

1217195521026180-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well, it's a step in the right direction. Very well, $MyPCName$. Defeat the $npcNamePlural:25020202$ in $map:02020031$ so we can establish a local mining operation. I'll discuss terms with Marlene.

1217195521026182-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well, it's a step in the right direction. Very well, $MyPCName$. Defeat the $npcNamePlural:25020202$ in $map:02020031$ so we can establish a local mining operation. I'll discuss terms with Marlene.

1217195521026183-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've come to a fair arrangement with Humanitas. In exchange for securing $map:02020031$, they will trade resources with us.

0116160121029251-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hah! I knew it would work.

0116160121029252-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It was a good idea, $npcName:11004313[gender:0]$. We'll need more outside-the-box solutions like that on the road ahead.

1217195521026186-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The $npcName:25020003$ is a violently aggressive monster with larger crystals growing from its spine. It has proven quite a pest to our operations within its native habitats. Anyways, our scientists want to investigate the species' aggression is in some way linked to those crystals.

1217195521026187-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Obviously, they'll need samples to prove their hypothesis.

1217195521026188-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I would like you to travel to $map:02020029$ and defeat $npcNamePlural:25020003$ and collect the $itemPlural:30001219$ growing from their spines.

1217195521026189-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I would like you to travel to $map:02020029$ and defeat $npcNamePlural:25020003$ and collect the $itemPlural:30001219$ growing from their spines.

1217195521026190-Kritias_2018_12-.name: So these are the $itemPlural:30001219$ that were embedded in the creature's spine? $npcName:11004411[gender:0]$, please analyze them.

1217195521026191-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll scan the crystals and send the data to the lab for analysis. It shouldn't take more than a few moments.

1217195521026192-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hm... It seems their hypothesis was wrong. These are just ordinary crystals.

1217195521026193-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Then may I have them? The Lumiknights will put them to use.

0116160121029253-Kritias_2018_12-.name: What are you going to do with some crystals?

1217195521026194-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm afraid that matter is classified.

1217195521026195-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, we have an emergency an our hands. Can you assist us?

1217195521026197-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $map:02020030$ is under siege by the Tairen Kingdom. Humanitas has requested our aid in warding off their assault.

1217195521026198-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I am told the $npcNamePlural:25020103[gender:0]$ pose a special threat. You are to assist Humanitas by defeating them.

1217195521026199-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Humanitas is our only ally in this new land, and $map:02020030$ their home. I don't need to remind you what's at stake should they be allowed to fall.

1217195521026200-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to $map:02020030$ and deal with the $npcNamePlural:25020103[gender:0]$.

0116160121029254-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The Tairen will think twice before their next attack.

1217195521026202-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, do you remember the mechanical soldiers $npcName:11001813[gender:0]$ co-opted in $map:02020031$? Well, they're still in $map:02020031$ running amok.

1217195521026203-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The Daemon Army has wreaked enough havoc here. As they come from our own lands, it falls to us to see them purged from Kritias. To that end, I want you to destroy as many of $npcName:11001813[gender:0]$'s hacked machines as you can manage.

1217195521026204-Kritias_2018_12-.name: How exactly $npcName:11001813[gender:0]$ hacked these machines remains a mystery. I want you to salvage any data stores you can from the machines you destroyed so our technicians can analyze them.

1217195521026205-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Travel to $map:02020031$ as soon as you are able. Destroy the $npcNamePlural:25020203$ and collect their $itemPlural:30001220$.

1217195521026206-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Travel to $map:02020031$ as soon as you are able. Destroy the $npcNamePlural:25020203$ and collect their $itemPlural:30001220$.

1217195521026208-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Good work. I'll have our research team analyze these immediately.

1217195521026209-Kritias_2018_12-.name: In this foreign land, our routine testing is more important than ever. We must be ever ready for the call of duty.

1217195521026210-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Despite your many triumphs, you are not exempt from these tests. If anything, your performance is more important than anyone else's. The crew looks up to you. So, are you ready for your next assessment?

1217195521026212-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Your task is simply to carry out a series of missions in Kritias. It is up to you to decide which missions you will undertake. Good luck.

1217195521026213-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Another successful examination! I expected no less.

1217195521026214-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You passed your assessment with flying colors. Keep it up, $MyPCName$.

1217195521026215-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, your ongoing efforts have significantly bolstered our efforts to explore Kritias. I want to thank you on behalf of the entire crew.

1217195521026216-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I was just doing my duty.

1217195521026217-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We have obtained a wealth of new information through our ever-growing expedition, but the breadth of what we don't yet know makes our work dangerous.

1217195521026218-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Speaking of danger, our scouts have run into some trouble with the $npcNamePlural:25020501$ in $map:02020001$, the $npcNamePlural:25020301$ in $map:02020006$, and the $npcNamePlural:25020401$ in $map:02020004$.

1217195521026219-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I would like you to diminish their numbers to protect our patrols.

1217195521026222-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Good work. Our scouts will be very grateful.

0116160121029257-Kritias_2018_12-.name: And with their jobs made safer, they should be able to gather vital intelligence much more efficiently. Good job, $MyPCName$.

1217195521026223-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, how would you say you've adjusted to operations in Kritias?

1217195521026224-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That's excellent to hear. And I have the perfect opportunity for you to prove it. Your regular performance evaluation!

0116160121029259-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The better prepared we are for Kritias' unique challenges, the greater our ability to avoid unnecessary casualties. Well, let's get started.

0116160121029260-Kritias_2018_12-.name: <font color="#909090">(Even though you know you did an awesome job, as always, you can't help but be nervous...)</font>

0116160121029261-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm glad you are as ready for action as you say. Keep up the good work.

1217195521026229-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've heard the region's serene ambiance makes it an excellent place for meditation—or it would, if it weren't full of hostile forces.

1217195521026230-Kritias_2018_12-.name: In any case, I was thinking, the crew could really use some shore leave to take their minds off their troubles.

1217195521026231-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'd like you to drive out these foes so that our crew can enjoy $map:02020001$.

1217195521026233-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Excellent work. I've informed the crew that $map:02020001$ is now safe enough for shore leave.

0116160121029263-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Of course, our foes will probably return in time. But I trust you'll be ready to drive them out again!

1217195521026236-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Much as it pains me to say, many among our crew have abandoned all sense of discipline. You see they've been charmed by an adorable local creature called the $npcName:25020301$, and they've been feeding the beast their much-needed rations. If this goes on, I worry Sky Fortress's pantries will be laid bare.

1217195521026237-Kritias_2018_12-.name: My warnings have done little to stem the problem. Only one course of action remains.

1217195521026238-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We must recover the rations by force. Go to $map:02020006$, and retrieve the $itemPlural:30001221$—from the beasts' bellies, if need be!

1217195521026239-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to $map:02020006$, and retrieve the $itemPlural:30001221$ from the  $npcNamePlural:25020301$.

0116160121029264-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I recovered what I could, but some of them were too far gone.

0116160121029265-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thank you, $MyPCName$. I am ashamed that such a measure was even necessary.

1217195521026248-Kritias_2018_12-.name: New lands always have much to teach us. One thing I found quite surprising was that some of the machines here wield swords.

1217195521026249-Kritias_2018_12-.name: As much as I would like to test them in battle and learn from their fighting style, my duties as captain keep me here.

1217195521026250-Kritias_2018_12-.name: And it would not be acceptable to use my station to order the capture of one of these machines for my own personal gain...

1217195521026252-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I apologize for rambling. These are not the sort of concerns I can voice to our crew. Thanks for listening.

1217195521026253-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If it's so important to you, why don't I go fight one of these robots and report back?

0116160121029266-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, you would do that for me? Thank you very much.

0116160121029267-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well then, do battle with the $npcNamePlural:25020401$ of $map:02020004$ and take notes about their technique.

1217195521026254-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Do battle with the $npcNamePlural:25020401$ of $map:02020004$ and take notes about their technique.

1217195521026255-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ah, you've returned! Can you demonstrate the fighting technique used by the machine?

0116160121029268-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll try and show you everything I remember.

1217195521026256-Kritias_2018_12-.name: What unusual technique... It may take me a while to master them. I hope you don't mind if I call on your aid again.

1217195521026257-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, could you come here for a moment?

1217195521026258-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our crew can't seem to stop talking about these $item:61000158$ creatures.

1217195521026259-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They are said to be unbelievably cute. The fact they have captivated our crew so swiftly demands an analysis!

1217195521026260-Kritias_2018_12-.name: <font color="#909090">(You can't help but detect a faint twinkle in her eyes.)</font>

1217195521026263-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This is the $item:61000158$? No wonder the members were captivated.

1217195521026264-Kritias_2018_12-.name: So, are you going to keep it?

1217195521026265-Kritias_2018_12-.name: No. It is a wild animal, and that is where it belongs. After our scientists have studied it and verified it to be in good health, I will release it back into the wild.

1217195521026266-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That said... I might go and visit it from time to time. You know, to make sure it's still in peak health.

1217195521026268-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our exploration of $map:02020001$ has been hamstrung by repeated run-ins with the local monsters.

1217195521026269-Kritias_2018_12-.name: These creatures don't seem to be willing to listen to reason. I want you to help make the region safe so our expedition members can continue their work.

1217195521026272-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Good job, $MyPCName$. I'll let the crew know it's safe to resume their exploration efforts.

0116160121029269-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I doubt those creatures will bother us anytime soon.

1217195521026273-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The docile lifeforms of Kritias could prove valuable as livestock, pets, or beasts of burdens. But the only way to find out is to study them!

1217195521026274-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Just as this new region is filled with new varieties of hostile monsters, so too will it contain docile ones. It would be valuable to determine which among them can be domesticated as beast of burdens, livestock or pets.

1217195521026275-Kritias_2018_12-.name: There's only one way to find out of course. I'd like to to capture a $item:61000157$ native to $map:02020006$.

1217195521026276-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Bring it back here and our research team will look into whether domestication is a suitable course of action.

1217195521026277-Kritias_2018_12-.name: <font color="#909090">(Hopefully this creature you're supposed to capture will come quietly...)</font>

1217195521026279-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've got one beastie, ready for the lab.

1217195521026280-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Good work. Let's have a look at it...

1217195521026282-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hmm. I'll have the monster delivered to our research team. Dismissed.

1217195521026283-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The personal flying machines of Kritias... intrigue me.

1217195521026284-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If we outfit our scouts with this kit, we could cut down the tactical advantage that Tairen has over us. $npcName:11004315[gender:1]$ tells me that there should be a part within the machine that controls the whole system.

1217195521026285-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Engage the $npcNamePlural:25020403$ in $map:02020004$ and retrieve these $itemPlural:30001222$.

1217195521026286-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Engage the $npcNamePlural:25020403$ in $map:02020004$ and retrieve these $itemPlural:30001222$.

0116160121029270-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll order its analysis immediately. The sooner we control this technology, the better.

1217195521026288-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We must take action. Our scouts' lives are on the line.

1217195521026289-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our scouts in $map:02020006$ were attacked by $npcNamePlural:25020302$. Their poison makes the wounds particularly difficult to heal.

1217195521026290-Kritias_2018_12-.name: To make matters worse, their poison seeps into the ground, making it dangerous to even explore the area.

1217195521026292-Kritias_2018_12-.name: My commendations, $MyPCName$. $map:02020006$ is safe for our scouts again.

1217195521026294-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our enemies in Kritias are relentless. However, perhaps we were hasty in assuming that they couldn't be reasoned with.

1217195521026295-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I need someone with a strong will to reach out to them. Test the waters for diplomacy.

1217195521026297-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thank you for volunteering. Go to $map:02020001$ and initiate talks with the $npcNamePlural:25020501$. If that fails... you know what to do.

1217195521026298-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to $map:02020001$ and initiate talks with the $npcNamePlural:25020501$. If that fails... you know what to do.

1217195521026302-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We shouldn't give up yet. Maybe another opportunity will come up in the future.

1217195521026303-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $map:02020004$ is a key strategic location for Sky Fortress.

1217195521026304-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You understand, then, that I am not pleased that Tairen continues to hold it.

1217195521026305-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If we can take the area from them, it will increase our operational range on Kritias.

1217195521026309-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our soldiers now have a direct path through the area.

0116160121029274-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thank you for helping secure our position.

1217195521026311-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That would be $npcName:25020303$ poison. My men encountered some in $map:02020006$.

1217195521026312-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The smell is... potent. And persistent. We haven't been able to get the smell out of anything it touches.

1217195521026313-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If we had some $item:30001223$, we might be able to engineer a cleaning agent—but nobody is willing to volunteer for the mission. Which is why I'm volunteering you. Go to $map:02020006$ and get $item:30001223$ from $npcNamePlural:25020303$.

1217195521026315-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We've been holding our breath waiting for your return.

0116160121029275-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I only hope that this $item:30001223$ holds the antidote for this stench.

1217195521026316-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We've fought our fair share of aggressive monsters, but we've met a new beast that gave us pause.

1217195521026318-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Almost every scout I've sent there has been grievously injured. $npcNamePlural:25020503$ are big, strong, and as mean as they come. We must strike them down before they hurt any more of my people.

1217195521026320-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Excellent. We must make the safety of our non-combatant crew a priority.

1217195521026323-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You were more than a match for those creatures.

1217195521026324-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thank you for doing what must be done for the good of Sky Fortress.

1217195521026325-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's time for you to undergo routine testing.

1217195521026326-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I have no concerns about your performance. Your assistance in Kritias has been invaluable so far.

1217195521026327-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I try to do my best.

1217195521026328-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Then let the test begin. Even if you don't complete this test, you'll still have my utmost trust.

1217195521026329-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Then I'd better earn that trust by completing the test!

1217195521026330-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You have your work cut out for you. Return without injury, if you can.

0116160121029276-Kritias_2018_12-.name: With you on our side, it's only a matter of time before we fully understand Kritias.

1217195521026332-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've heard disturbing rumors about a monster at the $map:02020017$. At first, I wanted to brush them off...

1217195521026333-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Some rumors just stick, no matter how hard you try to scrub them off.

0116160121029277-Kritias_2018_12-.name: So, is that what we've got here? One of those... sticky rumors?

1217195521026334-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm ordering an investigation if for no other reason than to quell these rumors. Go to the $map:02020017$ and uncover the truth.

1217195521026335-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to the $map:02020017$ and uncover the truth.

0116160121029278-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Yes, but don't worry. I took care of it.

0116160121029279-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That's good. Perhaps we should keep the truth to ourselves, though.

1217195521026337-Kritias_2018_12-.name: As difficult operations like this one drag on, morale begins to suffer.

1217195521026338-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Many of our troops feel helpless against the enemies arrayed against us.

1217195521026339-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They look up to you, however. If they see that even you still do mundane tasks like routine testing, they'll be emboldened.

1217195521026340-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That's why I ask you to do this. Not for your sake, but for the sake of the mission.

1217195521026341-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You have much work ahead of you. I expect the best from you.

1217195521026342-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I can already feel a change in the morale. You did well.

1217195521026343-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The $map:02020010$, $map:02020034$, and $map:02020032$ all hold positions of strategic significance to $map:02020041$. If enemy forces get too powerful in these areas, then our entire position will be compromised.

1217195521026344-Kritias_2018_12-.name: And if we can't hold this position against the Daemon Army or Tairen, then Sky Fortress itself could be destroyed.

1217195521026345-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I want to drive the enemy forces from those areas, but that may not be possible. At the very least, we should thin out their numbers.

1217195521026347-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I will. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020601$ in the $map:02020010$, $npcNamePlural:25020701$ at the $map:02020032$, $npcNamePlural:25020801$ in the $map:02020034$.

1217195521026349-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020601$ in the $map:02020010$, $npcNamePlural:25020701$ at the $map:02020032$, $npcNamePlural:25020801$ in the $map:02020034$.

1217195521026350-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That was quicker than I expected. It seems you were successful.

0116160121029281-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $map:02020041$ is secure for another day. Thank you.

1217195521026351-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You've done great things for us here in Kritias.

1217195521026352-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That's why you're the only person I can entrust with this mission. Are you up to a challenge?

1217195521026354-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The $npcNamePlural:25020601$ at the $map:02020010$ don't appear remarkable, but their weapon systems are powerful. I want to know why, and the only way to find out is to collect $item:30001224$.

1217195521026358-Kritias_2018_12-.name: These $item:30001224$ will teach us a lot. The research team owes you one.

1217195521026365-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, I have an important assignment for you. The Tairen $npcNamePlural:25020606[gender:0]$ are a bigger problem than we expected.

1217195521026366-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We need to investigate the $map:02020010$, but our scouts can't get past their defensive lines. Worse, they're coming back with life-threatening injuries.

1217195521026367-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That's where you come in. We can't afford to lose any more scouts, so I'm sending you in to deliver swift retribution.

1217195521026368-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Defeat as many $npcNamePlural:25020606[gender:0]$ as you can and make sure they think twice about fighting Sky Fortress in the future.

1217195521026369-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well done, $MyPCName$. Now our scouts can finally get us the information we need.

1217195521026370-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, I'm glad you're here. I could use your help.

1217195521026371-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our research team is collecting information on Tairen $itemPlural:61000160$ to discover their strengths and weaknesses. This study shows a lot of promise. But it means they need specimens.

1217195521026372-Kritias_2018_12-.name: So I'm reassigning you to $map:02020030$ to collect $itemPlural:61000160$ for them. See what you can find.

0116160121029282-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well done! Now keep exploring while I deliver this to our research team. We need all the information we can get.

1217195521026375-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, as you may be aware, Tairen has firm control of the $map:02020034$.

1217195521026376-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If we could infiltrate the plant, we could destroy their aetherine fusion reactor and deprive the Tairen mechs of their most crucial energy source. But so far, that's proved impossible.

1217195521026377-Kritias_2018_12-.name: However our research team informs me that the Tairen have been using $npcNamePlural:25020801$ to regulate their aetherine production. That's our new target.

1217195521026378-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If we figure out what makes those mechs tick, we can bring the whole plant to a screeching halt.

1217195521026379-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Find the $npcNamePlural:25020801$ in the $map:02020034$, destroy them, and collect $itemPlural:30001225$. This mission will deal a crucial blow to Tairen.

1217195521026383-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Find the $npcNamePlural:25020801$ in the $map:02020034$, destroy them, and collect $itemPlural:30001225$. This mission will deal a crucial blow to Tairen.

1217195521026384-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll see that the research team gets these parts immediately.

0116160121029283-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You have my thanks. Now get some rest and be ready for your next mission.

1217195521026385-Kritias_2018_12-.name: There's an intense standoff between Sky Fortress and the Daemon Army at the $map:02020032$ on the outskirts of $map:02020041$.

1217195521026386-Kritias_2018_12-.name: From the moment we took this field, our enemy has battered us relentlessly with increasingly vicious attacks.

1217195521026387-Kritias_2018_12-.name: But we will never surrender $map:02020041$. And I've decided it's high time we take the fight to them.

1217195521026388-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I need you on the $map:02020032$ to lead our soldiers against the $npcNamePlural:25020701$ and show them that we will not be cowed by their brutality.

1217195521026389-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I need you on the $map:02020032$ to lead our soldiers against the $npcNamePlural:25020701$ and show them that we will not be cowed by their brutality.

1217195521026390-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Very well done, $MyPCName$. You've won us time to rest and recover before the next battle.

1217195521026391-Kritias_2018_12-.name: When we learned of $map:02020013$, we had hoped to discover allies as well as a safehaven.

1217195521026392-Kritias_2018_12-.name: But our earliest scouts report that the native creatures are shockingly vicious, which has put a kink in our plans.

1217195521026393-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our research team's prevailing theory is that the local $npcNamePlural:11004548[gender:0]$ are somehow inciting that violent behavior, but they haven't figured out how to prevent it yet.

1217195521026394-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I need you to clear the area of $npcNamePlural:25020901$. Then, hopefully, our scouts can bring back some useful information about $map:02020013$ and its local wildlife.

1217195521026396-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hurry. Our people's lives are once again in your hands.

1217195521026398-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, I have your next assignment. It seems the Tairen $npcNamePlural:25021001$ in $map:02020016$ are surprisingly agile despite their heavy armor.

1217195521026399-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Tech like that could be a major asset, and one of our researchers got the bright idea to do some reverse engineering.

1217195521026400-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Given enough time and proper analysis, our team could provide significant upgrades to Sky Fortress weaponry. That's where you come in.

1217195521026401-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We need you to destroy $npcNamePlural:25021001$ in $map:02020016$ and collect $itemPlural:30001226$. The sooner our people can study this tech, the better.

1217195521026402-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We need you to destroy $npcNamePlural:25021001$ in $map:02020016$ and collect $itemPlural:30001226$. The sooner our people can study this tech, the better.

1217195521026403-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Good job, $MyPCName$. I'll get these to our team immediately.

0116160121029284-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Let's hope this idea pans out.

1217195521026404-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Perfect timing, $MyPCName$. $npcName:11004315[gender:0]$ just received new information about Kharon from Humanitas. $npcName:11004315[gender:0]$, why don't you bring $male:him,female:her$ up to speed?

1217195521026405-Kritias_2018_12-.name: My contact, $npcName:11004395[gender:1]$, tells me Kharon has joined forces with Tairen to kidnap exiles and attack Humanitas.

1217195521026406-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Of all people, you'd think Kharon exiles would be the most empathetic toward other exiles, but they're just vicious.

1217195521026408-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We will not suffer Kharon brutality against the innocent. $MyPCName$, we need you out in $map:02020010$ fighting $npcNamePlural:25020602$ and helping as many people as you can.

1217195521026412-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We will not suffer Kharon brutality against the innocent. $MyPCName$, we need you out in $map:02020010$ fighting $npcNamePlural:25020602$ and helping as many people as you can.

0116160121029285-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The people of Humanitas have expressed their gratitude for your selflessness.

1217195521026414-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ah, $MyPCName$. Good to see you again. I have news about our ally, Humanitas.

1217195521026415-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Humanitas is determined to take the $map:02020034$, Tairen's most valuable power production facility. But so far, they've failed to claim it. Now they're requesting backup.

0116160121029287-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The area is crawling with Tairen mechs, so Sky Fortress is going to lend a hand. For Humanitas to take control of the $map:02020034$, you and our other soldiers must destroy as many $npcNamePlural:25020802$ as you can to weaken their defense.

1217195521026416-Kritias_2018_12-.name: For Humanitas to take control of the $map:02020034$, you and our other soldiers must destroy as many $npcNamePlural:25020802$ as you can to weaken their defense.

1217195521026417-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've heard a lot of talk about you from the Humanitas soldiers, all of it good.

1217195521026418-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's about time you showed up. We're in a standoff with the Daemon Army on the $map:02020032$, and we may have found a way to gain the upper hand.

1217195521026419-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our scouts have discovered the army is drawing power from some kind of $item:30001227$. If this really is the source of their power, then we need to learn more about it.

1217195521026420-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's possible we could reverse engineer it and use the technology to our advantage.

1217195521026421-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I need you to defeat $npcNamePlural:25020702$ at the $map:02020032$ and collect their $itemPlural:30001227$, so our research team can begin studying them immediately.

1217195521026422-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I need you to defeat $npcNamePlural:25020702$ at the $map:02020032$ and collect their $itemPlural:30001227$, so our research team can begin studying them immediately.

1217195521026423-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Perfect timing. Our research team just finished prepping the lab.

0116160121029289-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll get the fragment to them right away. Thank you.

1217195521026424-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I know it's a long shot, but I'm still hoping we can negotiate with some of the Kritias monsters.

1217195521026425-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They would make for some very powerful allies in our fight against Tairen.

0116160121029290-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Big, tough monsters? Of course they'd be great allies.

1217195521026426-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I thought you might agree. The trouble is, my scouts just aren't equipped to handle it if negotiations turn... violent. But that won't be a problem for you.

1217195521026427-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to $map:02020013$ and try talking to the $npcNamePlural:25020902$ there. But be warned. If it doesn't pan out, you may need to employ more aggressive negotiation tactics.

1217195521026428-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to $map:02020013$ and try talking to the $npcNamePlural:25020902$ there. But be warned. If it doesn't pan out, you may need to employ more aggressive negotiation tactics.

1217195521026430-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I successfully defeated a bunch of monsters.

1217195521026431-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I see. Well, perhaps we'll fare better next time. Thanks, $MyPCName$.

1217195521026432-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Exploring Kritias gets increasingly difficult by the day. How are you faring, $MyPCName$?

1217195521026433-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's challenging, but I can handle it.

1217195521026434-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Good. I assumed someone with your experience would fare better than most of our soldiers. That being the case, I'm sure you won't mind running some routine testing exercises to prove you're still fit for active duty.

1217195521026435-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll assign you several basic missions. All you have to do is complete them.

1217195521026436-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Yes. Now, you may be inclined to rush, but I urge you to rest as needed. Save your strength for the real battles.

1217195521026437-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I need to you complete all of the missions I gave you to prove you're fit for active duty, but don't push yourself too hard. Save your strength for the real battles.

1217195521026438-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well, you've set a fine example for our other soldiers.

1217195521026439-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It was tough, but I was tougher.

1217195521026440-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It seems you're even stronger than I thought.

1217195521026441-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well done, $MyPCName$. Now we can get you back out into the field.

1217195521026442-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, thanks to you, we get closer to the heart of Kritias every day. Unfortunately, that also means it's getting more dangerous every day.

1217195521026443-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We need to be more vigilant than ever.

1217195521026444-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Agreed. And now that we've discovered so many new regions, we have another problem. We know nothing about the local wildlife or the threat it might present to us.

0129160221029526-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Sounds like you need me to do some investigating.

0129160221029527-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I do. I want you to find out everything there is to know about $npcNamePlural:25021205$ in the $map:02020017$, $npcNamePlural:25021305[gender:0]$ in $map:02020033$, and $npcNamePlural:25021104$ in the $map:02020051$.

1217195521026445-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Find out everything there is to know about $npcNamePlural:25021205$ in the $map:02020017$, $npcNamePlural:25021305[gender:0]$ in $map:02020033$, and $npcNamePlural:25021104$ in the $map:02020051$. I don't want any unpleasant surprises just because we didn't do our research.

1217195521026446-Kritias_2018_12-.name: What did you learn? Are there any serious threats we need to be concerned about?

0129160221029528-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They seem like run-of-the-mill beasties to me.

0129160221029529-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That's good to hear. Now stay on your toes. I'll speak with you again soon.

1217195521026447-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, you've been setting a shining example for all of our other soldiers.

1217195521026448-Kritias_2018_12-.name: To be honest, this test is probably unnecessary for you considering all the missions you've been running. But you can never be too careful.

1217195521026449-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Oh. For a moment, I thought you'd say I could skip it.

1217195521026451-Kritias_2018_12-.name: And keep in mind this will be on record.

1217195521026452-Kritias_2018_12-.name: All set? Let's take a look at the report.

0129160221029532-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm sure I passed with flying colors.

0129160221029534-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I hope to see similar results from you in the future.

1217195521026453-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, I've been hearing some unsettling rumors that $npcName:23090006[gender:0]$ is still alive.

0129160221029535-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I know it sounds far fetched, but we have to be sure. And I'd like to squash these rumors before they start to affect morale.

0129160221029536-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I need you to investigate the rumors, so we can lay this beast to rest for good this time. Go to $map:02020017$ and keep a wary eye out for anything suspicious.

1217195521026455-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Come back soon. Our troops are uneasy enough as it is.

0129160221029537-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You could have warned me about $npcName:23090006[gender:0]$'s ghost.

0129160221029539-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Sure, I guess. You sort of forgot to give me the details, so...

0129160221029540-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hm, well whatever the threat, we need to make sure it's gone. I won't stand for anything threatening the safety of Sky Fortress while we're here.

1217195521026457-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$! You're not a moment to soon.

1217195521026459-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We've received an urgent request for help from Humanitas.

0129160221029541-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They recently gained control of $map:02020033$, but almost as soon as they did, the Tairen led a vicious attack against them. Now they're trapped without food or equipment.

0129160221029542-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They desperately need your help to fend off the attack. Go to $map:02020033$ right away and help defeat the Tairen soldiers there.

1217195521026460-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to $map:02020033$ right away and help Humanitas defeat the Tairen soldiers there.

1217195521026461-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've received word from Humanitas. They're out of danger thanks to you.

0129160221029543-Kritias_2018_12-.name: For now, yes, but I don't think this is over.

0129160221029544-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Doubtless. Tairen will be bitter about losing such a strategically advantageous location to Humanitas.

0129160221029545-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll check in on them occasionally.

0129160221029546-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That's a good idea. Thank you.

1217195521026467-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Now that we discovered a new region, there's more to study than ever. But after the last few nightmares I sent our research team, they're not exactly in a helpful mood.

1217195521026468-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If you sent me a pack of vicious beasts, I don't think I would be either.

1217195521026469-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Yes... Well... I figured we could give them a break this time by sending a more docile test subject. You know, something four-legged, possibly furry, and impossibly cute?

1217195521026470-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm glad you think so, because I want you to retrieve it. You'll have the best chance of finding what I need in $map:02020008$, so head that way and see what you can do.

1217195521026471-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I want you to retrieve our new, cuddly research subject. You'll have the best chance of finding what I need in $map:02020008$, so head that way and see what you can do.

1217195521026473-Kritias_2018_12-.name: These $itemPlural:61000167$ seemed to fit your description. Take a look.

0129160221029550-Kritias_2018_12-.name: OH! THEY'RE ADORA— Ahem! I mean... Well done, $MyPCName$. If this doesn't win back my research team's favor, nothing will.

1217195521026475-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, I've already got another assignment for you. The $npcNamePlural:25021401$ population in $map:02020014$ has gotten out of control, and they've started acting very strangely.

1217195521026476-Kritias_2018_12-.name: What kind of strange are we talking here?

1217195521026477-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They keep ramming the trees until there's nothing left but stumps.

0129160221029551-Kritias_2018_12-.name: A lot of our people depend on the fruit from those trees for food, so we can't afford to let the $npcNamePlural:25021401$ keep destroying them.

0129160221029552-Kritias_2018_12-.name: So what can I do to help?

0129160221029553-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to $map:02020014$ and thin the $npcName:25021401$ population. Maybe they'll calm down once they feel less cramped.

1217195521026478-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to $map:02020014$ and thin the $npcName:25021401$ population. Maybe they'll calm down once they feel less cramped.

0129160221029554-Kritias_2018_12-.name: A few of the trees were badly damaged, but the rest should be fine now.

0129160221029555-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Then I'm glad we took care of the problem early on. Thank you.

1217195521026481-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Many of our people find peace among the beautiful plants there. Unfortunately, Tairen soldiers have taken notice and seek to deprive us of that respite by invading it.

1217195521026482-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $map:02020014$ is critical for morale. We can't let them have it. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25021406[gender:0]$ and ensure our refuge remains safe from those who would destroy it.

1217195521026483-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $map:02020014$ is critical for morale. We can't let them have it. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25021406[gender:0]$ and ensure our refuge remains safe from those who would destroy it.

1217195521026484-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The Tairen soldiers have withdrawn. This is was an important victory.

0129160221029556-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I only worry that this isn't the last we've seen of them.

0129160221029557-Kritias_2018_12-.name: True. But I'm sure you'll handle it just as well the next time.

0129160221029559-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thank you. Now get some rest. Your next mission is right around the corner.

1217195521026485-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Humanitas has be struggling to recapture the $map:02020003$, but between Kharon, Tairen, and the Daemon Army, they're fighting a losing battle. As their allies, it's time for Sky Fortress to step in.

1217195521026486-Kritias_2018_12-.name: But it's about more than fighting alongside our allies. We stand to gain a lot of ground in Kritias if Humanitas gains control of that region. That means more information and more resources.

1217195521026487-Kritias_2018_12-.name: So where do I come in?

1217195521026488-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm sending you to the $map:02020003$ to help take out $npcNamePlural:25021501$. With them out of the way, Humanitas might just have a shot.

1217195521026489-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to the $map:02020003$ and help take out $npcNamePlural:25021501$. With them out of the way, Humanitas might just have a shot.

1217195521026490-Kritias_2018_12-.name: How did you fare against the Daemon Army?

0129160221029561-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Good. Then I think Humanitas will be all right for a while. I'll update you if things change.

1217195521026491-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's good to see you, $MyPCName$. I was just thinking you'd be the perfect person to help me solve a little problem.

1217195521026492-Kritias_2018_12-.name: One of my scouts reported seeing $npcNamePlural:25021201$ in the $map:02020017$. What's got my interest piqued is their tremendous strength.

1217195521026493-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'd like to figure out how they're capable of such strength and use it to Sky Fortress's advantage. That means I need your boots on the ground out there to collect some spare parts for me.

1217195521026496-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm glad to see you could collect the parts without damaging them.

0129160221029562-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll get these to the research team immediately. Thanks, $MyPCName$.

1217195521026497-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, we've had a big win. Humanitas took control of $map:02020033$ in one, swift, coordinated strike.

1217195521026498-Kritias_2018_12-.name: But Tairen is relentless. They've sent wave after wave of soldiers against Humanitas and managed to cut them off from all resources. It's only a matter of time before our allies fall.

0129160221029563-Kritias_2018_12-.name: What if we drove some of the enemy forces out of the region?

1217195521026499-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm hoping we can do exactly that. Head to $map:02020033$ and defeat as many $npcNamePlural:25021301[gender:0]$ as you can. That ought to give Humanitas a fighting chance.

1217195521026500-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Head to $map:02020033$ and defeat as many $npcNamePlural:25021301[gender:0]$ as you can. That ought to give Humanitas a fighting chance.

1217195521026501-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Did you drive the $npcNamePlural:25021301[gender:0]$ out of $map:02020033$?

0129160221029564-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Every last one of them, yes. They won't be a problem for a while.

0129160221029565-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Excellent. I'll keep an eye on the area and let you know if things change.

1217195521026502-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We've finally penetrated far enough into Kritias to discover the nastiest problem yet.

1217195521026504-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The $map:02020051$. It exists solely as a waste disposal site for all of Tairen's most destructive mechs. Even thinking about the disgusting stench in that place is enough to make me—hrk! Ugh. See what I mean?

0129160221029566-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Anyway, I've asked our research team what we can do to prevent any more of our people from losing their lunch, and they've come up with a solution.

0129160221029567-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If we destroy some of the $npcNamePlural:25021101$ in the area, they won't be able to dump any more... waste, and the—hrk—the smell might dissipate.

0129160221029568-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We have to look out for our people's health. Go to $map:02020051$ and destroy as many $npcNamePlural:25021101$ as you can.

1217195521026505-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to the $map:02020051$ and destroy as many $npcNamePlural:25021101$ as you can.

1217195521026506-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our research team is reporting vastly improved air quality in the $map:02020051$.

0129160221029569-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You made a huge difference. Next time we need help, I'll let you know.

1217195521026507-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, our $npcName:25021402$ woes never seem to end. The $map:02020014$ has been overrun.

1217195521026509-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They're everywhere, and they're crushing every living thing in sight. If this continues much longer, there won't be anything left of our beautiful, lush refuge.

0129160221029570-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please go to $map:02020014$ right away and chase the $npcNamePlural:25021402$ out of there.

1217195521026510-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please go to $map:02020014$ right away and chase the $npcNamePlural:25021402$ out of there.

1217195521026511-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Have you cleared $map:02020014$ of that menace?

0129160221029571-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Those adorable little miscreants won't be bothering you for a while.

0129160221029572-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Good job. Why don't you rest up, so you're ready for your next mission?

1217195521026512-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hm... I've been thinking a lot about Kharon lately.

1217195521026513-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well, for a band of exiles who left with little more than the clothes on their backs, they're surprisingly well organized. I want to know how they're communicating.

1217195521026514-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I doubt they managed to steal Tairen technology, which means they must be using an analog system. It may be as simple as written messages. If we could intercept even one, we might gain more insight into how the organization functions.

0129160221029574-Kritias_2018_12-.name: So here's what I need you to do. Go to the $map:02020003$, defeat $npcNamePlural:25021502$, and get their documents.

1217195521026515-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to the $map:02020003$, defeat $npcNamePlural:25021502$, and get their documents.

1217195521026516-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Did you get the Kharon documents I need?

0129160221029576-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This is exactly what we need. Well done!

1217195521026517-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, we could use your help. Humanitas took control of $map:02020033$, and they've managed to hold it for a while, but they may not have it much longer.

1217195521026518-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our enemies just mobilized newer, much stronger $npcNamePlural:25021302[gender:0]$. If $map:02020033$ falls, we'll lose a crucial foothold in Kritias.

0129160221029577-Kritias_2018_12-.name: No. I refuse to let that happen.

1217195521026519-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I thought so. In that case, go to $map:02020033$ right away and help fight back the $npcNamePlural:25021302[gender:0]$ there.

1217195521026520-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to $map:02020033$ right away and help fight back the $npcNamePlural:25021302[gender:0]$ there.

1217195521026521-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Another victory for Sky Fortress and Humanitas. Well done.

0129160221029578-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The next time they need support, I'll be sure to call on you.

1217195521026523-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Let me guess. It's time for another round of routine fitness tests courtesy of Sky Fortress?

1217195521026524-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I don't know how you knew that, but... Yes!

1217195521026525-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Bring it on! I'm ready to test my limits!

1217195521026526-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You want to test your limits? In that case, why don't we run you through hell mode difficulty?

1217195521026527-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Do your best. I want to know exacly how capable our soldiers are.

1217195521026528-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You're practically inhuman. Are you aware of that?

0129160221029579-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I guess I'll have to prepare something even more challenging for you next time!

1217195521026529-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Despite our best efforts to quell them, I'm still hearing rumors about $npcName:23090006[gender:0]$. He's terrorizing our troops.
