1217195521026530-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll get to the bottom of this if it's the last thing I do!

1217195521026531-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I had a feeling you'd say that. Go to the $map:02020017$ and see if you can beat that ghost back into oblivion where it belongs.

1217195521026532-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to the $map:02020017$ and see if you can beat that ghost back into oblivion where it belongs.

1217195521026533-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You're white as a sheet! I take it you had another run in with $npcName:23090006[gender:0]$'s ghost?

0129160221029581-Kritias_2018_12-.name: At least you took care of it. Just... keep it up, would you? Thanks.

1217195521026534-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ready for your next Sky Fortress fitness test, $MyPCName$?

1217195521026535-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I had a feeling it was time for another test...

1217195521026536-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well, by this point, I'm sure you know the drill, so I'll just leave you to it.

0129160221029582-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I certainly do! In fact, I could probably do this totally on my own.

1217195521026538-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Good. I've got to handle some more pressing matters anyway.

1217195521026539-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well done. You've got this down to a science now.

1217195521026540-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It looks like I've got another assignment for you, this time out at the $map:02020009$.

1217195521026541-Kritias_2018_12-.name: From what Humanitas has told us, Tairen has been using the area to conduct ecological experiments for years. Now that they've handed control over to Kharon, it's ripe for the taking.

1217195521026542-Kritias_2018_12-.name: So they're asking for backup from Sky Fortress?

1217195521026543-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Exactly. I'm sending you out to help them.

1217195521026544-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to the $map:02020009$ and get rid of any enemies you find there.

1217195521026545-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to the $map:02020009$ and get rid of any enemies you find there.

0129160221029585-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I did my best, but we've still got a long way to go.

0129160221029586-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I thought that might be the case. This is definitely going to be a long-term project for us. For now, well done.

1217195521026547-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, thanks to you, we've expanded our territory even further.

1217195521026548-Kritias_2018_12-.name: One of the new regions we discovered, $map:02020018$, has some very interesting geological and atmospheric features.

1217195521026549-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Unfortunately, control of the area is still hotly contested, and our scouts can't safely gather information. So I need you to go out there and get rid of some of the Tairen enemies first.

0129160221029588-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thanks. Focus on removing the soldiers from $map:02020018$ for now, and we can worry about the other territories later.

1217195521026550-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Focus on removing the soldiers from $map:02020018$ for now, and we can worry about the other territories later.

1217195521026551-Kritias_2018_12-.name: How did you fare in $map:02020018$? Is it safe to send in our scouts?

0129160221029589-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's not completely clear, but your scouts should be able to hold their own now.

0129160221029590-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well done. I'll give our scouts the green light.

1217195521026558-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The $map:02020009$ is still largely occupied by Kharon forces and has been for some time. But now one of our scouts reports seeing some new, unusual mechs there.

1217195521026559-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If those mechs are taking orders from Kharon, then we have a bigger problem than I initially thought.

1217195521026560-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You want me to check it out?

1217195521026561-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I do, yes. In addition, whether these new mechs are working for Kharon or not, they're still a threat to our safety. So while you're investigating, destroy as many of them as you can.

1217195521026562-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to the $map:02020009$ and figure out whether the $npcNamePlural:25021606$ are taking orders from Kharon, then destroy as many as you can.

1217195521026563-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to the $map:02020009$ and figure out whether the $npcNamePlural:25021606$ are taking orders from Kharon, then destroy as many as you can.

1217195521026564-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Is it as bad as I thought? Are the $npcNamePlural:25021606$ taking orders from Kharon?

0129160221029591-Kritias_2018_12-.name: No, it doesn't look like it.

0129160221029592-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That's a relief. One less problem to deal with. Thanks for looking into it.

1217195521026565-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Back again, $MyPCName$? I'm not sure I have any assignments for you...

1217195521026566-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You look sad... What's got you down?

1217195521026567-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Do I? Hm, I didn't think it showed. This expedition has been going on for so long that I think I'm just feeling a little homesick for my friends and family.

0129160221029593-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Is there something I can do to cheer you up?

0129160221029594-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'd be happy to bring in a cuddly, new research subject!

1217195521026568-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Oh, would you?! The research team has been asking about studying the $itemPlural:61000169$ in $map:02020037$ for a while now. How about one of those?

1217195521026569-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You'll find a lot of $itemPlural:61000169$ over in $map:02020037$.

1217195521026570-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Here you go! This little guy really looked like he could use a friend!

0129160221029595-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Er... Maybe a simple cat would have been better...?

0129160221029596-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Not at all! I love him already! I'm sure the two of us will get along well! Thanks for looking out for me, $MyPCName$.

1217195521026572-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm glad you're here, $MyPCName$. We've got another problem on our hands.

1217195521026573-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $map:02020036$ truly lives up to its name. It's crawling with Daemon Army soldiers, the worst of which are the $npcNamePlural:25022001$. They don't just attack our people—they steal their equipment and supplies!

1217195521026574-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's bad enough that they stole the emergency rations, but taking our morale-boosting, $item:30001230$ is just spiteful! We need support from someone with your experience. Go to $map:02020036$, defeat $npcNamePlural:25022001$, and take back what's ours!

1217195521026575-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to $map:02020036$, defeat $npcNamePlural:25022001$, and take back what's ours! We need that $item:30001230$.

1217195521026576-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I hope that stolen food turned to ash in their mouths when they saw you coming.

0129160221029597-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I didn't even give them the chance to taste it. I got what you asked for.

0129160221029598-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I expected no less of you, $MyPCName$. We'll make sure these get back into the right hands.

1217195521026577-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$! Finally someone I can trust with this mission! With all the chaos at the $map:02020009$, Kharon fighters are exploiting our weak points and harassing our soldiers to no end.

1217195521026578-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'd be more than happy to provide a little backup.

1217195521026579-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I knew you would be. Like I said, the worst of the skirmishes are happening in and around the $map:02020009$.

1217195521026580-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We need to reduce their numbers, so they can't keep getting the drop on our people. Find the $npcNamePlural:25021601$ and take as many as you can out of the fight... permanently.

1217195521026581-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Find the $npcNamePlural:25021601$ in $map:02020009$ and take as many as you can out of the fight... permanently.

1217195521026582-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our soldiers tell me you've solved our problem.

0129160221029599-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It won't last forever, but our people are grateful for what you've done. I'll let you know the next time they need help.

1217195521026583-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's been a long and costly fight, but we've nearly reached the heart of Kritias.

1217195521026584-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It really has been a long time...

1217195521026585-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Yes. And now that we're so close, Tairen has sent reinforcements to stop us at $map:02020037$. If we want to make it any further, we need to get through there.

1217195521026586-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our scouts are looking for a detour, but it's a long shot. And with so many enemies in the area, it's gotten far too dangerous.

1217195521026587-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to $map:02020037$, defeat $npcNamePlural:25022101$, and find another path our people can use to infiltrate Kritias.

1217195521026588-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to $map:02020037$, defeat $npcNamePlural:25022101$, and find another path our people can use to infiltrate Kritias.

1217195521026589-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Did you find a way to enter mainland Kritias?

0129160221029601-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm sure we'll find a solution soon enough. Well done, $MyPCName$.

1217195521026590-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Perfect timing, $MyPCName$! Our scouts just discovered a major Tairen mech production facility.

1217195521026592-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Yes! The $map:02020035$ is their largest facility, and we finally managed to locate it. Now is our chance to deal a massive blow to their offense. I need you on site right away to help weaken the protections around the building.

1217195521026596-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I knew I could count on you. This fight will be crucial. Go to $map:02020035$ and defeat $npcNamePlural:25021901$ before they realize we've found them.

1217195521026597-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to $map:02020035$ and defeat $npcNamePlural:25021901$ before they realize we've found them.

0129160221029602-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thanks to you, our people have infiltrated the factory. They'll bring it to a grinding halt in no time.

0129160221029603-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well, whether you have or not, I have another animal assignment for you. We've received word of a $npcNamePlural:25021801$. As cute as those Wrigglers are, this particular one is causing some giant-sized headaches for our scouts.

1217195521026600-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I need to send someone with experience handling them, and you're that someone. Go to $map:02020008$ and defeat the $npcName:25021801$. Once you've done that, get $itemPlural:30001231$, so our researchers can figure out how this thing grew so big in the first place.

1217195521026601-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to $map:02020008$ and defeat the $npcName:25021801$. Once you've done that, get $itemPlural:30001231$, so our researchers can figure out how this thing grew so big in the first place.

1217195521026602-Kritias_2018_12-.name: These $itemPlural:30001231$ are pristine! Very well done.

0129160221029604-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll get these to our research team right away.

1217195521026603-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We have analyzed quite a few monsters during our time in Kritias, but it's only a fraction of what's out there.

1217195521026604-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Take $npcNamePlural:25021701$, for example. Their hides are a remarkable shade of blue, but we have no idea what purpose a good paint job serves in $map:02020018$. Is it something Sky Fortress can use to its advantage or is it just a Tyrano fashion trend?

1217195521026605-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I would like you to bring back data for analysis. Go to $map:02020018$, defeat $npcNamePlural:25021701$, and collect $itemPlural:30001232$ for our research team.

1217195521026607-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to $map:02020018$, defeat $npcNamePlural:25021701$, and collect $itemPlural:30001232$ for our research team.

1217195521026608-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You've brought back another pristine specimen for our research team.

0129160221029605-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I never regret trusting you with a mission. Thanks, $MyPCName$.

1217195521026609-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We defeat more of the Kharon forces every day, but somehow they keep finding ways to make 5 enemies feel like 500.

1217195521026610-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Some of the Sky Fortress fighters we recently dispatched to $map:02020009$ have suffered heavy losses. That place is crawling with $npcNamePlural:25021602$.

1217195521026611-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We just can't compete with the range on their grenade launchers. But I'm sure you can handle them easily. Go to $map:02020009$ and take out the $npcNamePlural:25021602$, so our people have a chance to do some damage of their own.

1217195521026612-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to $map:02020009$ and take out the $npcNamePlural:25021602$, so our people have a chance to do some damage of their own.

1217195521026613-Kritias_2018_12-.name: How did you fare against the Kharon forces?

0129160221029606-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They may be robots, but I managed to instill a healthy fear of Sky Fortress in them.

0129160221029607-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I had no doubt you'd succeed. Well done. And get some rest. You've earned it.

1217195521026614-Kritias_2018_12-.name: As long as the Daemon army occupies $map:02020036$, they'll be a permanent thorn in Sky Fortress's side. It's time we did something about it.

1217195521026615-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Just point me in the right direction!

1217195521026616-Kritias_2018_12-.name: First things first. We need to cut down the number of patrols they have roaming the area. Rather than send a unit there and start a full-scale battle, I'd like to send you in to do some quick work in the shadows.

1217195521026618-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to $map:02020036$ and defeat as many $npcNamePlural:25022002$ as you can. That ought to slow them down enough for our soldiers to finish them off for good.

1217195521026619-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to $map:02020036$ and defeat as many $npcNamePlural:25022002$ as you can. That ought to slow them down enough for our soldiers to finish them off for good.

1217195521026620-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm glad you made it back. And none the worse for wear, I see.

0129160221029608-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Good. It won't be long before $map:02020036$ is fully within our control.

1219100121026622-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It is once again time to test the abilities of all Sky Fortress agents.

1219100121026623-Kritias_2018_12-.name: As you are not above this requirement, I thought that Kritias would make an excellent testing ground for you.

1219100121026624-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This mission will push you to your very limits. Do not underestimate this.

1219100121026625-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I do not want to see you relax or attempt shortcuts! I will watch you like a hawk.

1219100121026626-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hm... It seems that I have underestimated your abilities.

0115221521029089-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This was but one test. The next one will be harder.

1219100121026627-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $map:02020030$, $map:02020029$, and $map:02020031$ are under attack by Tairen's mechanical soldiers.

1219100121026628-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Perhaps they tire of this war and seek to end both ourselves and Humanitas in one fell swoop.

1219100121026629-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Defeat Tairen's mechanical monstrosities at these locations.

1219100121026630-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Defeat the mechanical soldiers in $map:02020030$, $map:02020029$, and $map:02020031$.

1219100121026632-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You passed your last test with ease, even though the conditions were unfamiliar to you.

1219100121026633-Kritias_2018_12-.name: But that was merely the beginning. You are aware of this, are you not?

0115221521029090-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This test will put you through the wringer, as they say.

1219100121026635-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Once again, you pass the test as if it were nothing.

0115221521029091-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I expected no less, of course. You've acclimated to this land in record time.

0115221521029092-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I look forward to your next test.

1219100121026636-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $map:02020030$ is under attack from demons, both mechanical and otherwise.

1219100121026637-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Though their reasons no doubt vary, both Tairen and the Daemon Army want $map:02020030$ for their own.

1219100121026638-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If $map:02020030$ falls, so falls Humanitas. Go forth and defeat these monstrosities.

1219100121026639-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If $map:02020030$ falls, so falls Humanitas. Go forth and defeat these monstrosities.

1219100121026640-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I have dreamed of this moment.

0115221521029093-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You faced two great and terrible armies. How did you fare?

0115221521029095-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I have chosen my disciple well.

1219100121026641-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Do you recall the dropship you used to arrive here from Sky Fortress?

1219100121026642-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's still in $map:02020029$. Do you know that?

1219100121026643-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We sent people to retrieve the dropship, but the local monsters won't let them.

0115221521029097-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The $npcNamePlural:25020004$, in particular, are proving to be a hindrance.

0115221521029098-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I ask that you ensure the safe recovery of the dropship.

1219100121026644-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You must make haste or the dropship will be lost forever.

1219100121026645-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I sense that the $npcNamePlural:25020004$' numbers have decreased significantly.

0115221521029099-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We shall retrieve the dropship in short order.

1219100121026646-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The $npcNamePlural:25020104$ of $map:02020030$... It is said that they overflow with fearsomely dark power.

1219100121026647-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Indeed, darkness billows out from their robes. Such concentrated darkness must have a unique source.

1219100121026648-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020104$ in $map:02020030$ and uncover the source of their power.

1219100121026649-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I do not care to wait overlong. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020104$ in $map:02020030$ and uncover the source of their power.

1219100121026650-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Have you discovered the source of their dark power?

0115221521029102-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well done. I shall investigate this for myself...

1219100121026651-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Even I must admit that Tairen's technology is impressive. Their machines are powered by pure aetherine.

1219100121026652-Kritias_2018_12-.name: In fact, I sense that aetherine touches all of the civilizations of Kritias, past and present. Even the mages use aetherine to empower their spells.

1219100121026653-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I would learn more of this aetherine. Gather samples for me in $map:02020029$, $map:02020030$, and $map:02020031$.

1219100121026654-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Unless I've had a lapse in my memory, I've tasked you with gathering aetherine.

1219100121026655-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This meager quantity shall suffice... for now.

0115221521029103-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I shall send you to collect more in due time. Farewell.

1219100121026656-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $map:52100104$ in $map:02020031$ is occupied by the Daemon Army. They did not win this foothold by strength of arms, however. Instead, they somehow turned Tairen's machines to their side.

1219100121026657-Kritias_2018_12-.name: According to Humanitas scouts, the mechanical soldiers joined the Daemon Army as soon as $npcName:11001813[gender:0]$ set his gaze upon them.

1219100121026658-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Dismantle these $npcNamePlural:25020204$ and uncover what caused them to betray their side.

1219100121026659-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Dismantle the $npcNamePlural:25020204$ and uncover what caused them to betray their side.

1219100121026660-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I fought the $npcNamePlural:25020204$, but I have no idea why they switched sides.

1219100121026661-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I see. I shall set my Lumiknights to this task, then. Thank you for your efforts.

1219100121026662-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You heeded my telepathic call! It seems that something about Kritias has strengthened our mental bond.

0115221521029105-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Yeah, sure. What do you need?

1219100121026663-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Have you encountered the $npcNamePlural:25020005$ of $map:02020029$? They are, as my cohorts put it, "adorable." They are unfortunately also quite vicious.

0104185521028654-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Unfortunately, my own templars were deceived by the creatures' appeal and allowed themselves to be injured. Such a thing would never happen to me!

0104185521028656-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The honor of the Lumiknights is besmirched. Travel now to $map:02020029$ and... unsmirch it.

1219100121026666-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Did you get my point across?

0104185521028660-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I doubt the $npcNamePlural:25020005$ will cause any trouble now.

0104185521028661-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Very good. All the same, I shall warn my subordinates to take care with those beasts...

1219100121026667-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $npcNamePlural:25020105$ attacked one of our teams in $map:02020030$.

1219100121026668-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They must be defeated before they strike again.

1219100121026670-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I trust your work went smoothly.

0115221521029110-Kritias_2018_12-.name: As expected. I'll call upon you again soon.

1219100121026671-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It is good that you're here. I have a request for you.

0115221521029112-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The $npcNamePlural:25020205$ in $map:02020031$ have stolen data from our research teams.

1219100121026672-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I understand that it has something to do with the topography of Kritias. Ah, the researchers worked so terribly hard for that data! I shed a tear for them.

1219100121026673-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Defeat them and retrieve the data.

0115221521029116-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Good. Our researchers can finally be at ease.

1219100121026677-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You've noticed the darkness building within me. Well done.

1219100121026678-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We have discovered mechanical soldiers in league with the Daemon Army in $map:02020029$. I must learn what makes them move...

0115221521029119-Kritias_2018_12-.name: As you may have surmised, you will be the instrument of my discovery.

0115221521029120-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020001$ and retrieve their power sources.

1219100121026679-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020001$ and retrieve their power sources.

1219100121026680-Kritias_2018_12-.name: How long I have waited for this!

0115221521029121-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Do you have the source of their power?

0115221521029124-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If the Daemon Army has also mastered aetherine... This bears further investigation.

1219100121026681-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm glad you came by. My telepathy has poor reception today, so to speak.

0115221521029126-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $npcNamePlural:25020201$ in $map:02020031$ are jamming our radio signals. It seems that even my telepathy is affected.

1219100121026682-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Progress will be slow if we have no reliable means of communication. Can I trust you to go to $map:02020031$ and defeat them?

0115221521029128-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Then I leave it to you.

1219100121026684-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm already aware of your performance. My telepathy has returned, you see.

0115221521029129-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our communications should be secure for the foreseeable future, thanks to you.

1219100121026685-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Tairen's machine soldiers are said to run on aetherine.

1219100121026686-Kritias_2018_12-.name: And every civilization of Kritias has used aetherine.

1219100121026687-Kritias_2018_12-.name: And that's why we need to continue our research on aetherine. I ask that you collect some.

1219100121026688-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Have you gathered the aetherine yet?

1219100121026689-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This is not much, but I suppose it will have to suffice for now.

0115221521029133-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thank you. I'll send for you when I have more work.

0115221521029134-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I see a lot of medics today.

0115221521029135-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $npcNamePlural:25020104$ launched an attack against our people in $map:02020030$. The injured have just now arrived.

0115221521029136-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I will avenge our fallen comrades!

1219100121026691-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Yes! Channel your righteous fury! Defeat these fiends before they can cause more harm!

1219100121026693-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've received a report of your success on the battlefield. Well done.

0115221521029137-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I shall call upon you again soon.

1219100121026694-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You passed your last test with ease, even though the conditions were unfamiliar to you.

1219100121026695-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I have no choice but to acknowledge your abilities. That is why this test will be even greater than the last.

1219100121026696-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go, complete your missions! But if you truly wish to impress me, you will do it while wearing a blindfold.

1219100121026698-Kritias_2018_12-.name: In spite of your past success, I am still surprised.

0115221521029139-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I shall devise something truly devious for your next test. You have been warned.

0115221521029140-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Is it just me, or are the monsters extra feisty today?

0115221521029141-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I cannot blame them. They've been driven from their natural habitat by Tairen's tyranny.

1219100121026700-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They only grow more vicious with each passing day. It's a problem for our field researchers.

1219100121026701-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Between the monsters and the mechanical soldiers... I tire of these intrusions on our work!

0115221521029142-Kritias_2018_12-.name: There is only one solution to our problems. $MyPCName$, you will be my blade! Visit my righteous fury on any monster who would meddle with us!

1219100121026702-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Defeat the monsters! Defeat the soldiers! Defeat them all!

1219100121026703-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It seems things have calmed down a bit.

1219100121026704-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It is once again time to test the abilities of all Sky Fortress agents.

1219100121026705-Kritias_2018_12-.name: A mission truly worthy of your skills awaits you.

1219100121026706-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm pitting you against the worst that Kritias has to offer. There is no shame in giving up now if you fear for your life.

0115221521029145-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thank you for once again showing me your skills.

0115221521029146-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $map:02020001$ is a place of great beauty upon which the aurora shine. But this aurora has an affect on the monsters who live there.

0115221521029147-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The $npcNamePlural:25020504$, particularly, are gluttons for this aurora energy. It seems that the energy is condensed within their bodies.

1219100121026710-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This bears further investigation. Go to $map:02020001$ and tear the $itemPlural:30001236$ from their bodies so that I may study it.

1219100121026711-Kritias_2018_12-.name: My patience has its limits, my friend. Go to $map:02020001$ and tear the $itemPlural:30001236$ from their bodies so that I may study it.

0115221521029150-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The light that it gives off... Intriguing. Very intriguing!

1219100121026713-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our people exploring $map:02020006$ were ambushed by monsters and badly hurt. It seems that the Daemon Army has tainted the monsters of the area.

1219100121026714-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Their dark power is no trifling matter. We must keep it contained before it spreads further.

1219100121026723-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our people are under constant threat of attack. Particularly dangerous is a pack of soldiers wielding blades.

1219100121026724-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The must be defeated if we are going to gain a foothold in $map:02020004$.

1219100121026725-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The blade-wielding soldiers must be defeated if we are going to gain a foothold in $map:02020004$.

1219100121026726-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've already heard of your success.

0115221521029151-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It seems you impressed our field agents. Good work.

0115221521029152-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It is said that their necklaces glow with a mysterious light.

0115221521029153-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I wish to examine the gemstones in their necklaces. Could you get them for me?

1219100121026728-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to $map:02020001$, defeat them, and get their $itemPlural:30001237$.

1219100121026729-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Are you done yet? Go to $map:02020001$, defeat them, and get their $itemPlural:30001237$.

0115221521029155-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Oh, that light really is mysterious. Well done.

0115221521029157-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ah... A group of $npcNamePlural:25020405[gender:0]$ attacked some of our scouts in $map:02020004$ and stole their data.

1227151121028246-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That data contained vital intelligence on Kritias...

0115221521029158-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll get it back for you!

1227151121028247-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Very good! Defeat the $npcNamePlural:25020405[gender:0]$ and retrieve the data.

1227151121028248-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Defeat the $npcNamePlural:25020405[gender:0]$ and retrieve the data.

1227151121028249-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm astonished they were able to steal so much... Good job.

0115221521029159-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll ask for your help if something like this happens again.

0115221521029160-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our aetherine research is progressing too slowly. The team has requested more samples...

1219100121026732-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The aetherine in $map:02020004$ is more concentrated. I think that should yield some useful samples.

1219100121026733-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You are shrewd. I'll be waiting.

1219100121026734-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Are you done yet? Get as much aetherine as possible.

1219100121026735-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Such an abundance of aetherine! I feel as though I were rich.

0115221521029162-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I shall call upon you again soon.

0115221521029163-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Have you encountered the $npcNamePlural:25020505$? The growths on their backs look like aetherine.

0115221521029164-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I ordered some of my agents to retrieve samples, but the monsters were uncooperative with our attempts.

1219100121026737-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I would like you to get samples from the $npcNamePlural:25020505$ by force.

0115221521029165-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I will continue to wait for you here.

1219100121026738-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Get samples from the $npcNamePlural:25020505$ by force.

1219100121026739-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It seems you've made things easier for our researchers.

0115221521029166-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well done. I'll call upon you again soon.

0115221521029168-Kritias_2018_12-.name: A patrol drew too close to some cute $npcNamePlural:25020304$. Predictably, they were all grievously injured.

0115221521029169-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I cannot trust my own people to stay away from those adorable menaces. The only recourse is to destroy them all.

0115221521029170-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I sent those little cuties to the afterlife.

0115221521029171-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I am glad you did not waver. Good job.

1219100121026744-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our forces at $map:02020004$ have been halted by $npcNamePlural:25020405[gender:0]$.

1219100121026745-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I fear that our people are helpless against the enemy's powerful swords.

1219100121026748-Kritias_2018_12-.name: As your reward, I shall grant onto you a fraction of my aura.

0115221521029172-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I worry for about the slow progress we're making on our aetherine research. It seems the research team never has enough samples.

1219100121026750-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It seems we've discovered a rich vein in $map:02020001$. Could I ask you to gather some samples?

1219100121026751-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I will continue to wait for you here.

1219100121026752-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I ask that you bring aetherine.

0115221521029174-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It shall suffice for now. Return soon for more tasks.

1219100121026754-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Would you believe that I still have yet to hear of any results of our aetherine research?

0115221521029175-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I want results, but the research team insists that they need aetherine samples from $map:02020006$.

1219100121026756-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It is vital that we learn the true nature of aetherine.

1219100121026758-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You've brought me only one sample. Well, I suppose I should have expected this.

0115221521029176-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well done. I'll call upon you again soon.

0115221521029177-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I saw some poisoned Sky Fortress agents.

0115221521029178-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Indeed. With each passing day, more of our compatriots are poisoned by $npcNamePlural:25020305$.

0115221521029179-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've received reports that even the local ecology is being affected by these monsters. It would be best to go to $map:02020006$ and defeat them.

1219100121026761-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I fear for our compatriots. Go to $map:02020006$ and defeat the monsters who threaten them.

1219100121026762-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Fewer of our people are being poisoned now.

0115221521029180-Kritias_2018_12-.name: On behalf of the Lumiknights, thank you.

0115221521029182-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ah, you've noticed that the dragon within me is stirring from its slumber. Do you fear that I cannot control it?

1219100121026764-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I will require some time alone to calm it. In the meantime, I shall assign you your test.

1219100121026765-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Normally I would complete such a task with my eyes closed. For today, I entrust it to you.

1219100121026766-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Complete your test while I pacify the dragon within me.

1219100121026767-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I heard of your progress while I was centering my balance.

0115221521029183-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Your performance was satisfactory. Good job.

1219100121026768-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I received a report that $npcName:11001813[gender:0]$'s lackey, $npcName:23000301$, is attempting to summon $npcName:23000071$.

1219100121026769-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If $npcName:23000071$ is summoned here in Kritias, I may need to intervene personally.

1219100121026770-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This is tough. If I were forced to use my full power, the whole world would be in danger. $MyPCName$, go to $map:02020200$ in my place, and defeat $npcName:23000301$ before he can succeed in his plot.

1219100121026771-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to $map:02020200$ in my place, and defeat $npcName:23000301$ before he can succeed in his plot.

0116150221029233-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This cannot have been an easy mission. I shall call upon you the next time the world is in danger.

1219100121026773-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Today's test will be less strenuously than usual. I believe you've earned a little rest.

1219100121026774-Kritias_2018_12-.name: However, do not let your guard down! This is still a test by me, $npcName:11004316[gender:0]$!

1219100121026775-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I can feel your skills improve. I look forward to your future accomplishments.

1219100121026776-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll say this again. Don't let your guard down.

1219100121026777-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I see this posed you no challenge, as expected.

0115221521029184-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I hope your future tests go as smoothly as this.

1219100121026778-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Today's mission is of vital importance.

0115221521029185-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $map:02020010$ is a major Tairen base. From there, they're poised to drive Humanitas out of Kidel.

1219100121026779-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It has been decided that we will launch an assault on $map:02020010$. However, the enemy's defenses are formidable.

1219100121026780-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to $map:02020010$ and act as our vanguard. Destroy the enemy's first line of defense.

1219100121026781-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to $map:02020010$ and act as our vanguard. Destroy the enemy's first line of defense.

0115221521029186-Kritias_2018_12-.name: On behalf of the Lumiknights, I thank you for leading the charge.

0115221521029187-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I will ask for your service again.

1219100121026783-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $map:02020034$ is a vital part of Tairen's aetherine infrastructure.

1219100121026784-Kritias_2018_12-.name: From their war machines to their everyday appliances, Tairen is completely reliant on aetherine.

1219100121026785-Kritias_2018_12-.name: As it happens, Tairen makes life hard for both ourselves and Humanitas.

1219100121026786-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Their aetherine plant in Kidel is what keeps their front lines supplied and fresh for the fight.

1219100121026787-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We're in no position to destroy it. But if we can throw their garrison there into disarray, then perhaps someday we'll be ready to launch a final offensive.

1219100121026788-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to $map:02020034$ and defeat their soldiers.

1219100121026789-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to $map:02020034$ and defeat their soldiers.

1219100121026790-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thank you for once again showing me your skills.

1219100121026795-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Among Tairen's machines, the $npcNamePlural:25020807$ have some of the strongest arms.

1219100121026796-Kritias_2018_12-.name: My researchers report that they can't identify the material that their weapons are made from. We've determined that they're heavy... and that the $npcNamePlural:25020807$ can swing them with ease.

1219100121026797-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They need more data to fully understand these weapons.

1228152821028345-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Combat observation should suffice. Fight $npcNamePlural:25020807$ while our researchers watch.

1219100121026799-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thank you for once again showing me your skills.

1219100121026800-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I have another request for aetherine samples from the research team.

1219100121026801-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This time, they need aetherine from $map:02020034$, $map:02020010$, and $map:02020013$.

1219100121026802-Kritias_2018_12-.name: One never knows how different environment might affect the aetherine.

0115221521029188-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I will continue to wait for you here.

1219100121026803-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The research team needs aetherine from $map:02020034$, $map:02020010$, and $map:02020013$.

1219100121026804-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This aetherine is unlike any other that I've encountered.

1219100121026805-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Kharon! The lowest scum among all of Tairen's exiles.

1219100121026806-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Aren't we allied with some of those exiles?

1219100121026807-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Certainly, but not all exiles are created equally. Kharon are vile criminals who use their strength to bully the weak.

1219100121026808-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They capture innocent exiles and put them to work.

1219100121026809-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Exiles turning against exiles? They have no honor!

1219100121026811-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Yes. I cannot let this stand.

1219100121026812-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Let us make an example of them.

0116112121029211-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They should be quiet for a while.

0116112121029212-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You truly are an implement of justice.

1219100121026815-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Have you heard the dire news?

0116112121029213-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Kharon has gained a foothold in $map:02020010$.

1219100121026816-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If left unchecked, they will become a great threat to Sky Fortress.

1219100121026817-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We must to defeat them quickly. Vanquish $npcNamePlural:25020603$.

0116112121029215-Kritias_2018_12-.name: As expected... We will have to redouble our efforts to keep them at bay.

1219100121026820-Kritias_2018_12-.name: No matter how I push them, the research team produces no results. They only produce more requests for aetherine.

1219100121026821-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've lately sensed a strange energy coming from $map:02020034$. I suspect that the aetherine there will finally give us a breakthrough.

1219100121026824-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This is a suitable amount. Good job.

0116112121029216-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The Lumiknights will study it carefully.

0116112121029217-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I saw some of our people get carried off to the infirmary...

0116112121029218-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ah, yes. The team from $map:02020034$. It seems that they were ambushed by bow-wielding $npcNamePlural:25020803$.

1219100121026826-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Defeat them to prevent more of our people from falling to their arrows.

1219100121026829-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our scouts in $map:02020032$ were bitten by $npcNamePlural:25020703$.

1219100121026830-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The bites are unlike any we've seen before. We need to study the hounds' fangs to come up with a treatment.

1219100121026832-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to $map:02020032$ and collect fangs from $npcNamePlural:25020703$.

1219100121026833-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hmm... These fangs are unlike any I've seen on Maple World.

0116112121029221-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Good job, $MyPCName$. We will analyze this very closely.

1219100121026834-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $map:02020013$ is the main route that Humanitas uses to send us supplies.

1219100121026835-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Unfortunately, $npcNamePlural:25020903$ have taken to attacking our caravans.

1219100121026836-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020903$ and secure the supply route.

1219100121026837-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020903$ and secure the supply route.

1219100121026838-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thank you, $MyPCName$. There won't be problems with our supplies now.

1219100121026839-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our research on aetherine progresses ever onward. And yet, we never seem to make any breakthroughs...

1219100121026840-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The aetherine in $map:02020013$ seems to have unique properties. Perhaps we'll have new results with some samples of that.

1219100121026841-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It is vital that we learn the true nature of aetherine.

1219100121026842-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Unless I've had a lapse in my memory, I've tasked you with gathering aetherine.

0116112121029222-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The Lumiknights will study it carefully.

1219100121026844-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Kharon forces are plundering the ruins of $map:02020016$.

1219100121026846-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Any civilized person has a duty to protect history. Even if it isn't his own history...

1219100121026847-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If you agree, move swiftly to defeat the $npcNamePlural:25021003$ who are leading these vile efforts.

0116112121029224-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That's what I'd hoped to hear. Well done.

1219100121026852-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I feel that you are not applying yourself as much as you could. But perhaps I'm imagining things. What do you think?

0128180921029399-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Kritias is a dangerous land. This is no time to rest on your laurels.

0128180921029400-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Your skills must be constantly honed and tested. It won't be easy, of course!

1219100121026853-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Your skills must be constantly honed and tested. It won't be easy, of course!

1219100121026854-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ah, now this is the $MyPCName$ that I know and respect.

0128180921029401-Kritias_2018_12-.name: See to it that you do not become careless again.

1219100121026855-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hey! You, uh, don't look so good.

0128180921029402-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Enemies at every corner, lurking in every shadow... A constant stream of casualties in from the field...

1219100121026856-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We are simply trying to study this land, but we are met with nothing but hostility!

0128180921029403-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll take care of the bad guys for you.

0128180921029405-Kritias_2018_12-.name: My templars have asked me to thank you for your efforts.

0128180921029406-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Good job. I shall call upon you when next my worries grow too great.

1219100121026860-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It seems that you've got a following among the Sky Fortress crew.

1219100121026861-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Many of our people have thrown themselves fully into exploration after seeing your valiant efforts.

1219100121026862-Kritias_2018_12-.name: For that reason, I urge you to take on more missions. Build more of a following!

0128180921029408-Kritias_2018_12-.name: To that end, let us begin today's test.

1219100121026864-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You've lit the fire of enthusiasm in the hearts of the crew!

0128180921029410-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We should do this again soon.

0128180921029411-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Everyone seems more nervous than usual.

0128180921029412-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $npcName:11001813[gender:0]$'s lackey, $npcName:23000301$, has returned. He is once more corrupting the land with his darkness.

0128180921029413-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We thought we had seen the last of him... His return is not good for morale.

1219100121026866-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That is a good idea. Go to $map:02020200$ and defeat $npcName:23000301$.

1219100121026867-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Not done yet? Go to $map:02020200$ and defeat $npcName:23000301$.

1219100121026868-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You have successfully halted the spread of darkness.

0128180921029415-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our agents can take a breath of relief. Well done.

0128180921029416-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I will ask for your service again.

1219100121026869-Kritias_2018_12-.name: At last. You really must be more punctual, $MyPCName$.

0128180921029417-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The $map:02020051$ is quickly becoming a headache. The delicate and unique ecology of that place is being destroyed by a pack of strange monsters.

0128180921029418-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I sent a team out to investigate, but they can't do much with so many monsters about.

0128180921029419-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Things would go more smoothly if someone were to defeat those monsters. Perhaps that someone could be you.

1219100121026872-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The monster problem seems to be under control. You're as reliable as always.

0128180921029421-Kritias_2018_12-.name: However, now the stench of the $map:02020051$ is giving me a headache... We shall have to postpone investigation until a later date.

1219100121026879-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I must speak with you about the $npcNamePlural:25021205$ of the $map:02020017$.

0128180921029424-Kritias_2018_12-.name: These heavily-armored machines use their tremendous power to defend the $map:02020017$.

0128180921029425-Kritias_2018_12-.name: However... their behavior has changed a bit lately. They've taken to attacking our scouts, even when they're well away from any critical areas.

0128180921029426-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The $map:02020017$ is worth investigating. Defeat them so that we may continue our research.

1219100121026881-Kritias_2018_12-.name: My agents have sent me the all clear. You've exceeded my expectations.

0128180921029427-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll ask for your help if this occurs again.

1219100121026882-Kritias_2018_12-.name: At last. You really must be more punctual, $MyPCName$.

1219100121026883-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Are you familiar with the $map:02020003$? There are ruins of ancient civilizations there. We have a duty to excavate the place.

0128180921029428-Kritias_2018_12-.name: For reasons unfathomable, Tairen's soldiers don't seem interested in us studying the history of their land. The $npcNamePlural:25021504$ are particularly bothersome.

1219100121026885-Kritias_2018_12-.name: With your help, we've been able to double our knowledge of the ruins in the $map:02020003$.

0128180921029430-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We are, once again, in your debt.

1219100121026886-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ah, $MyPCName$. I was hoping to speak with you.

1219100121026887-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I saw some agents chatting about something...

1219100121026888-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ah, they are gossiping about the $npcNamePlural:25021304$ at $map:02020033$. Though they are our enemies, they've taken to boasting about their great power.

0128180921029431-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They claim that the power comes from their hats. Absurd! And yet...

0128180921029432-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll go get some for you.

0128180921029433-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Yes. Yes, do that. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25021304$ in $map:02020033$ and take their hats.

1219100121026889-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Defeat $npcNamePlural:25021304$ in $map:02020033$ and take their hats.

1219100121026890-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well? Do you have the hats?

0128180921029436-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They contain aetherine batteries! How unexpected. I'll send this in for research straight away.

1228152821028346-Kritias_2018_12-.name: There's much on my mind. They say that, in times of worry, one should view nature to alleviate one's stress. Such a pedestrian technique would have no effect on me, of course, but I understand it works for much of our crew.

0128180921029437-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The habitats of the $map:02020014$ provide a source of respite, for instance. Unfortunately, $npcNamePlural:25021407[gender:0]$ have made a mess of that place.

0128180921029438-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's had a demoralizing effect on the crew, I'm afraid.

0128180921029439-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Perhaps you can help. Go to the $map:02020014$. Slay the $npcNamePlural:25021407[gender:0]$.

1219100121026893-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Are you done yet? The $map:02020014$ is being destroyed as we speak.

1219100121026894-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thank you, $MyPCName$. I think the crew is feeling a little better.

0128180921029441-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Perhaps I shall go to see these vistas for myself...

0128180921029442-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Good job. I shall call upon you again.

1219100121026895-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You didn't radio ahead of your visit today.

1219100121026896-Kritias_2018_12-.name: My radio was only picking up static.

1219100121026897-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Again...! It's the $npcNamePlural:25021204$. The aetherine that grows on their backs interferes with our signals.

0128180921029443-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Those little twerps! How am I supposed to eavesdrop on my favorite kittens without a functioning radio?!

0128180921029444-Kritias_2018_12-.name: ...Let us pretend we did not hear that.

0128180921029445-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Anyway, the solution is clear. Destroy $npcNamePlural:25021204$ in the $map:02020017$.

1219100121026899-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our radios returned to normal a short while ago. I trust that means you were successful.

0128180921029447-Kritias_2018_12-.name: For better or for worse, she's return to her usual irrepressible self.

1219100121026901-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I believe you are already familiar with the $map:02020051$. It's becoming a rather conspicuous thorn in our side, mainly because of the scrap robots and stench.

1219100121026902-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The stench is... somewhat manageable, but these scrap robots are not, as they've taken to attacking our people.

0128180921029448-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We've tried to monitor the area, but... well, I did mention the stench, didn't I?

0128180921029449-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Simply put, head to $map:02020051$ and defeat any $npcNamePlural:25021104$ you find.

1219100121026903-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Simply put, head to the $map:02020051$ and defeat any $npcNamePlural:25021104$ you find.

0128180921029450-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm already hearing fewer complaints about the $npcNamePlural:25021104$. Now, if only you could beat up stenches...

1219100121026906-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Should Sky Fortress be making that weird sound?

1219100121026907-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ah, you noticed as well. Yes, apparently our frequent voyages between Maple World and Kritias has caused some kind of buckling in the bulkheads. The variance in atmospheric... I can see you glazing over already. Long story short, we need parts to effect repairs.

0128180921029451-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The engineers tell me that $npcNamePlural:25021105$ have the parts we need. You just need to... remove those parts.

0128180921029452-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Defeat $npcNamePlural:25021105$ in $map:02020051$ until you have the parts we need.

1219100121026908-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Defeat $npcNamePlural:25021105$ in the $map:02020051$ until you have the parts we need.

1219100121026909-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Good work, $MyPCName$. We'll get these to the engineers on the double... so that infernal racket will end.

0128180921029453-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Now maybe I can get back to my practice. I'll summon you again soon.

1219100121026910-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Oh, good. I have urgent need of you, $MyPCName$.

1219100121026912-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Several of our people have fallen ill, and I've traced the pathology of the virus back to $npcNamePlural:25021405$. The vector can be found in the $map:02020014$, and needs to be eliminated immediately.

0107111521028662-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Bah! What a waste, coddling our soldiers over a little sniffle! In my day...

0107111521028663-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Your day was before the advent of germ theory. Here in the modern era, we battle diseases. $MyPCName$, if you would, please.

1219100121026913-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Rid us of $npcName:25021405$ in $map:02020014$. And wash your hands on the way back.

1219100121026914-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Has the virus been dealt with?

0107111521028664-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Every trace of the disease has been wiped out.

0107111521028665-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Excellent. Now I don't need to bother myself with making a vaccine...

0128180921029454-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Aetherine is a mysterious and powerful substance widely used throughout Kritias. Studying it is one of our most important missions on the continent!

1219100121026917-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ah... yes. Indeed. So, the particular—

0128180921029455-Kritias_2018_12-.name: In fact, I've already located a deposit at the $map:02020017$, and I came here to inform you about my plans to collect some for study!

0128180921029456-Kritias_2018_12-.name: ...Well than. I leave it to you.

1219100121026918-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please gather aetherine in $map:02020017$. As you said.

1219100121026919-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I should have expected this kind of initiative from you, $MyPCName$.

0128180921029457-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well done. As expected, of course.

1219100121026920-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, do you recall the Tairen soldiers that attacked our forces in $map:02020003$?

1219100121026921-Kritias_2018_12-.name: A class of Tairen soldiers known as $npcNamePlural:25021505$ is tearing through our soldiers. It seems as soon as one falls, another appears in their stead.

0128180921029459-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well, all we can do is keep taking them down. Or rather, you. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25021505$ in $map:02020003$ before they wipe out our people.

1219100121026922-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well, all we can do is keep taking them down. Or rather, you. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25021505$ in $map:02020003$ before they wipe out our people.

1219100121026923-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You're back. The results speak for themselves... injuries among the troops are at an all-time low.

0128180921029460-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Let us enjoy this lull while it lasts, $MyPCName$. Well done.

0128180921029462-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Testing is scheduled for today, but... I have concerns about the mission.

0128180921029463-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I have to wonder if you're up to the task...

1219100121026925-Kritias_2018_12-.name: (His concern is... genuine? Now you're feeling concerned.)

1219100121026926-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This is your chance. Carry out this nigh-impossible mission, and prove yourself as I did, so long ago.

1219100121026927-Kritias_2018_12-.name: For anyone else, this would be impossible. But for you...

1219100121026928-Kritias_2018_12-.name: As expected. Even faced with so great a challenge, you pulled through.

0128180921029465-Kritias_2018_12-.name: With you so close to my level, I see I have little to worry about.

0128180921029467-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Now is not the time. But soon... we shall talk.

1219100121026929-Kritias_2018_12-.name: At last. You really must be more punctual, $MyPCName$.

0128180921029468-Kritias_2018_12-.name: My blade thirsts for destruction, and it's all I can do to keep it in check. It's clearly reacting to the power of darkness.

1219100121026930-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $npcName:11001813[gender:0]$'s lackey $npcName:23000301$ continues to spread evil throughout the area. The effect is so strong that it can be felt even here.

0128180921029470-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That is why he needs to be put down once again. I cannot risk the destruction I would cause the world if I faced him, and so I leave him to you.

1219100121026932-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thank you, $MyPCName$. I can feel my sword returning to its passive state. The threat of annihilation has passed, thanks to you.

0128180921029471-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Now I can meditate in peace.

0128180921029472-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll notify you if this happens again.

1219100121026933-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I... have to wonder if this test is even meaningful.

1219100121026935-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Isn't it obvious? After all the missions you've completed... what's left to prove?

1219100121026936-Kritias_2018_12-.name: However, if there's one force in this world that does not respond to such reason... it's bureaucracy.

1219100121026938-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Good job, $MyPCName$. Perhaps these tests are worth the effort just to see your skills in action.

0128180921029473-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Your performance speaks for itself. As expected.

0128180921029474-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I can't imagine there's anything left for you to fear, $MyPCName$.

1219100121026939-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The attack on $map:02020036$, the heart of the Daemon Army of Kritias, is at last upon us.

1219100121026940-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I expect them to fight for their lives, considering how perilous their position is. And that means great danger for our own forces.

1219100121026941-Kritias_2018_12-.name: (Volunteer to strike at the Daemon Army first, to thin their numbers.)

1219100121026942-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You see the situation as a true tactician does. Excellent.

1219100121026943-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to $map:02020036$, and do what you can.

1219100121026944-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I feel the power of darkness ebbing from our foes. Yes, even from here. Don't question it.

0128180921029475-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The defenses of $map:02020036$ are failing. Our victory is at hand.

1219100121026945-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our allies have reached the gates of the Tairen Kingdom, at $map:02020037$.

1219100121026946-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This is a critical moment in our campaign. To push into the Tairen Kingdom, we must break through $map:02020037$ with the Humanitas forces.

1219100121026947-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Naturally, the Tairen have amassed a sizable force to block us. And they are joined by elements of the Daemon Army.

1219100121026948-Kritias_2018_12-.name: (Volunteer to strike at the Tairen forces and Daemon Army.)

1219100121026949-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You're as motivated as ever. I leave this dreadfully important task in your capable hands.

1219100121026950-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thin the Tairen forces and Daemon Army in $map:02020037$.

0128180921029476-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our scouts tell me the garrison at $map:02020037$ is a much softer target now.

0128180921029477-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Reaching the Tairen Kingdom is only a matter of time now.

1219100121026958-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Very perceptive. Yes, there is a... cloud over my soul today.

0128180921029478-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Despite all our efforts, we are getting nowhere in aetherine research. The requests keep coming for more samples... I suppose they're trying a more intensive study.

0128180921029480-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It needs to be aetherine from a specific region again. The samples they require are found in $map:02020009$, $map:02020008$, and $map:02020018$.

0128180921029481-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We're fortunate to have your help, $MyPCName$. Good hunting.

1219100121026959-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Have you gathered the aetherine yet?

1219100121026960-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Surely this much aetherine will yield results.

0128180921029482-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If not... those researchers will have much to answer for.

1219100121026962-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We have important intel to act on. It's regarding a Tairen soldier called $npcName:25022102$ in $map:02020037$.

1219100121026963-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Apparently they've been logging all their activities in a notebook. This could be the break we need in Kritias.

0128180921029484-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Think of how much we stand to learn about Tairen's military capabilities! The possibilities are thrilling... and so we need that notebook.

1219100121026964-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Face the Tairen Guardsman and get his $item:30001242$.

1219100121026965-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You're back. Did you get the $item:30001242$?

0128180921029486-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thumbing through this... there appears to be plenty of info we Lumiknights can act on. Good job.

1219100121026966-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm certain you've heard of $map:02020035$, yes? It's a facility to produce mechanical soldiers for the Tairen Kingdom here in Kidel.

1219100121026967-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The factory is currently occupied by the Daemon Army. $npcName:11001813[gender:0]$ has bent that entire place, soldiers and all, to their will.

1219100121026968-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Now the machine warriors are being built for the ranks of the Daemon Army.

1219100121026969-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If we are to have any hope of victory over the Daemon Army, the factory must be destroyed. Our first step must be defeating the $npcNamePlural:25021902$ guarding the factory.

1219100121026971-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Security at the factory seems to have fallen apart. I know who to credit for that.

1219100121026974-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Um... Am I supposed to know about that?

0128180921029488-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our people are saying it's one of the most powerful mechanical warriors they've ever seen. Some of our best soldiers barely survived their encounter with it.

0128180921029489-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I considered destroying it myself... but I'd like to see how you handle it.

1219100121026975-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I know the $npcName:25021906$ is intimidating to some... but certainly not for you!

0128180921029492-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hm... perhaps the $npcName:25021906$ was not as formidable as I thought. Ah well, good work nonetheless.

0128180921029493-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Of course not, don't be ridiculous. It's a particularly insidious affliction from $npcName:11004548[gender:0]$'s pollen. That wretched stuff has found its way to $map:02020008$, if you can believe that.

0128180921029494-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Apparently I could be affected just by receiving this report...

0128180921029495-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Worse than that, though, is the monster that's gone wild because of the pollen's effect. $npcName:25021802$'s influence can't be overstated.

0128180921029497-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well, I'm in no condition to unleash my true power. I think you've got to cover this one.

1219100121026979-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Take down $npcName:25021802$ before it does any more harm. Simple, right?

1219100121026980-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our people are already starting to recover. You did well.

0128180921029499-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll be fine, of course. Just need some time to refocus.

1219100121026982-Kritias_2018_12-.name: As you know, the Daemon Army is fairly well holed up in $map:02020018$.

1219100121026983-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Their forces are bolstered by the mechanical soldiers that $npcName:11004430[gender:0]$ reprogrammed. However, one of their units seems to have broken free of that programming.

0128180921029500-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's called $npcName:25021702$, and the secret to shutting down the mechanical hordes might be locked away in its memory.

0128180921029501-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That's why I need you to defeat it and return with its memory chip.

1219100121026984-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Defeat $npcName:25021702$ and bring back its memory chip.

0128180921029503-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hm. This is nothing like the memory units we've found in other machines. Even I don't recognize the design. Very good.

1219100121026986-Kritias_2018_12-.name: At last. You really must be more punctual, $MyPCName$.

1219100121026987-Kritias_2018_12-.name: At last, the aetherine research team is producing results. I didn't need to step in after all.

1219100121026988-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They do need one more set of aetherine to study, this time from $map:02020008$.

0128180921029504-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This may be the last time I ask about this. The end is finally in sight.

1219100121026989-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They do need one more set of aetherine to study, this time from $map:02020008$.

1219100121026990-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I wonder what could be special about this aetherine from $map:02020008$... Ah well, as long as these chores are coming to an end.

0128180921029505-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I shall call upon you again soon.

1219100121026992-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Tell me what you know about $map:02020009$.

1219100121026993-Kritias_2018_12-.name: <font color="#909090">(You describe the area, using the biggest vocabulary words you can think of.)</font>

0128180921029506-Kritias_2018_12-.name: ...Indeed. Of particular note is the quality of the natural environment there. Unfortunately, a particular class of Kharon brigand has been laying waste to the area. They are known as $npcNamePlural:25021603$.

0128180921029507-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We cannot let such beauty be so callously destroyed. The very thought enrages me. Settle this by defeating these heathens.

1219100121026994-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Not done yet? Go to $map:02020009$ and defeat $npcName:25021603$.

1219100121026995-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Good job. We've already recovered a few vegetation samples from $map:02020009$.

0128180921029508-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I expect the ecosystem to fully recover, in time.

0128180921029509-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I will ask for your service again.

1219100121026996-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You're here, and I have news. Good news.

1219100121026997-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've received word that the aetherine research is almost concluded. Only one more sample is needed.

1219100121026998-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Simply bring back the aetherine in $map:02020018$, and that will be the last sample.

0128180921029510-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm eager to see the end of this...

1219100121026999-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Simply bring back the aetherine in $map:02020018$, and that will be the last sample.

1219100121027000-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The final sample. At last, our skills can go towards something greater...

0128180921029511-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll send it straight to the research team. You'll be the first to know when the research is complete.

1219100121027002-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hey, I saw tamers disembarking from the Sky Fortress.

1219100121027003-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Oh, you noticed. It's because of the Daemon Army Guard Dogs in $map:02020036$.

0128180921029513-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Monsters known as $npcNamePlural:25022003$ have been attacking our people using those Guard Dogs. We're trying to counter with our own top tamers from Maple World.

0128180921029514-Kritias_2018_12-.name: What if I took out these $npcNamePlural:25022003$?

0128180921029515-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Exactly what I was thinking. Good hunting.

1219100121027004-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Defeat $npcName:25022003$ and free the Guard Dogs.

1219100121027005-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You've done good work today. You should be proud.

0128180921029516-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The fewer the $npcNamePlural:25022003$, the better. We're fortunate to have you, $MyPCName$.

0128180921029517-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I will ask for your service again.

1220183321027823-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Captain $npcName:11004312[gender:0]$ overheard people whining about how much they hate routine tests... She interpreted it to mean that the tests are too easy.

1220183321027824-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm sorry, $MyPCName$, but I have no choice.

1220183321027825-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm ramping up the difficulty. Captain's orders.

1220183321027826-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Between you and me, I don't think the Captain'll really do anything if you fail, but still...

1220183321027828-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You did it, $MyPCName$, just like I knew you would!

1220183321027829-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hi, $MyPCName$! You know how we've found traces of lapenshards in Kritias?

1220183321027830-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The Green Hoods think it may have something to do with the dark crystal explosion in Maple World a while back...

1220183321027832-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We're trying our hardest to find the connection.

1220183321027833-Kritias_2018_12-.name: But the creatures here aren't exactly helping!

1220183321027834-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Think you can clear some of them out of the way so we can do our work?

1220183321027835-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We need to get to the bottom of everything that's happening!

1220183321027836-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That was quick! Thank you! Everyone'll be so excited to get back to work!

1220183321027837-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Captain $npcName:11004312[gender:0]$ overheard people whining about how much they hate routine tests... She interpreted it to mean that the tests are too easy.

1220183321027838-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Sorry, $MyPCName$, policy is policy! I'm ramping up the difficulty.

1220183321027839-Kritias_2018_12-.name: But don't freak out, I'm sure Captain $npcName:11004312[gender:0]$ won't really do anything to you if you fail...

1220183321027840-Kritias_2018_12-.name: But it might be safer not to fail, so...

1220183321027842-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Wow, $MyPCName$, you never cease to impress me!

1220183321027843-Kritias_2018_12-.name: A large Tairen mine was discovered in $map:02020031$. Aetherine, the material found there, is really special!

1220183321027844-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It has a similar wavelength as that of mana—yes, the very same mana that mages use in Maple World! Imagine what we could do if we could harness aetherine to fuel magic!

1220183321027845-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Unfortunately, the mechanical soldiers in $map:02020031$ are making it hard to find out! It's be great if you could, ah, convince them to get out science's way.

1220183321027846-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Stop the mechanical soldiers in $map:02020031$ from interfering with our research!

1220183321027847-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thanks, $MyPCName$! Today, you've won a victory for science!

1220183321027848-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You've heard that latest research, right, $MyPCName$? Tairen soldiers are powered by aetherine!

1220183321027849-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Not only that, but it turns out that everything in Tairen uses aetherine as an energy source! Isn't that amazing?

1220183321027850-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Here's the real kicker: the aetherine crystals here in Kritias react to the mana of Maple World!

1220183321027851-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The Green Hoods have been trying to study this relationship in aetherine's natural settings, but the creatures here keep getting in the way.

1220183321027852-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Would you mind clearing out some enemies so we can conduct our studies?

1220183321027853-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Would you mind clearing out some enemies so we can conduct our studies?

1220183321027854-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thank you! We're one step closer to finding the connection between aetherine and mana!

1220183321027860-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Argh! Can you believe it?! Creatures have been breaking into our aetherine supplies!

1220183321027861-Kritias_2018_12-.name: And do you know why? To steal aetherine so that they can decorate themselves with it! Sure, maybe they also use the aetherine as body armor, but that's not the point!

1220183321027862-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Don't they know how hard we worked to mine all that aetherine? We've got to put a stop to this! Will you help, $MyPCName$?

1220183321027863-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Stop the creatures from stealing our aetherine!

1220183321027864-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They won't dare touch our precious aetherine now, right? And it's all thanks to you, $MyPCName$!

1220183321027865-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The $map:52100104$ in $map:02020031$ is currently occupied by the Daemon Army. What's strange is, as you'll recall, the Tairen mechanical soldiers defending the area defected to the Daemon Army without a moment's consideration.

1220183321027866-Kritias_2018_12-.name: According to the Humanitas scout stationed there, their allegiance changed with the blink of $npcName:11001813[gender:0]$ 's eye. We still don't understand how he took over the machines.

1220183321027867-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I want you to dismantle $npcNamePlural:25020203$ in that area so we can study their components for clues.

1220183321027868-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Dismantle the $npcNamePlural:25020203$ so we can study their parts for clues as to how they were hacked.

1220183321027869-Kritias_2018_12-.name: <font color="#909090">(With great shame, you report that inspecting the salvaged components from the $npcNamePlural:25020203$ revealed nothing about how they were co-opted by the Daemon Army.)</font>

1220183321027870-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Don't look so sad. It was a longshot to begin with. Besides, I might find something after I comb through the combat data.

0116183821029295-Kritias_2018_12-.name: As always, thank you for your help, $MyPCName$. I'll call you if we find anything!

1220183321027871-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The $itemPlural:30001244$ we've harvested from $map:02020030$ to use in our aetherine research is being stolen by $npcNamePlural:25020102$!

1220183321027873-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ugh, that stuff is way too valuable to be used as... as... batteries! We need to put a stop to this!

0116183821029296-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Defeat the $npcNamePlural:25020102$ and get back those $itemPlural:30001244$!

1220183321027874-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Defeat the $npcNamePlural:25020102$ and get back those $itemPlural:30001244$!

1220183321027875-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Whew, close call. Looks like the crystals are all still intact. Thanks, $MyPCName$!

1220183321027876-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Since arriving in Kritias, we've tried to open the lines of communication with the local flora and fauna. Doesn't hurt to be nice, right? We've had moderate success with the Poings.

1220183321027877-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, I'd like you to try communicating with them, too.

1220183321027878-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Who knows, they might like you better than the rest of us. You are pretty charming!

1220183321027880-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I managed to communicate with it a little, but I'm not sure it liked me...

0114201721029088-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hey, it's a start! I'll take it, $MyPCName$!

1228182021028628-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm glad you're here, $MyPCName$! Humanitas will soon begin the initiative to retake the floating island to the right of $map:02020030$!

1228182021028629-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The Tairen forces patrolling the island have tremendous endurance. They've been giving us a real hard time.

1228182021028630-Kritias_2018_12-.name: But you can take them out, can't you? Help us reclaim the floating island!

1228182021028631-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Take out the Tairen forces in $map:02020030$ to help reclaim the floating island!

1228182021028632-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've been absolutely bombarded with reports of your heroism, $MyPCName$! I wish I could've been there to see it in person!

1220183321027886-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've received so many reports of people hearing a strange melody. It seems to follow a regular pattern, but beyond that... nobody seems to know much about it.

1220183321027887-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If we could identify that melody, it might give us an edge in our exploits in Kritias!

1220183321027888-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, would you mind going out there and seeing what you can find out?

1220183321027889-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Try following the melody... and then see if you can play it yourself.

1220183321027890-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Such a beautiful song. It appears it's not just the science that's advanced here in Kritias, but the music, too!

1220183321027891-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Oh no! We just learned from a Shadow Walker that the Daemon Army that arrived in Kritias before us has already learned how to apply aetherine to amp up their magic!

1220183321027892-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This means that we're behind! Oooh, I just hate not being first. Almost as bad, it appears they've been tainting the aetherine with darkness.

1220183321027893-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They're plotting something, I just know it! But the question is... what? If we could collect some samples of the corrupted crystals, maybe I could find out. Will you go out there and gather some $itemPlural:30001245$ for me?

1220183321027894-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The Daemon Army is plotting something, I just know it! But the question is... what? Will you go out there and gather some $item:30001245$ for me?

1220183321027895-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Wonderful work! I'll send these samples to be analyzed by my team right away!

1220183321027896-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Bad news, $MyPCName$! I've gotten a report that researchers studying aetherine crystals in a $map:02020031$ mine were attacked by mechanical soldiers!

1220183321027897-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They must be taught not to not to interfere with our work! Please, will you go teach them a lesson?

1220183321027898-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They must be taught not to not to interfere with our work! Please, will you go teach them a lesson?

1220183321027899-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thank you, $MyPCName$. The researchers should be able to do their work in peace for a while.
