1220183321027902-Kritias_2018_12-.name: A scout at the $map:02020029$ said a platform appeared out of thin air! And at the very top of that platform, he spied what he thinks was a beautiful flower!

1227222321028276-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We just have to investigate, don't you think? Think of everything we could learn!

1227222321028277-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The scout couldn't make it all the way to the top, but I know you can, $MyPCName$! Will you retrieve that flower for me to study?

1220183321027903-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm still waiting for that flower!

1227222321028278-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Oops. I totally forgot to grab the flower... I was distracted by a strange box.

1227222321028279-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Um, so did you bring the box?

1227222321028281-Kritias_2018_12-.name: So you have nothing for me to study?

1227222321028283-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Sheesh, what's a girl gotta do to get a flower around here? All I wanted to do was dissect and analyze it...

1220183321027905-Kritias_2018_12-.name: What should I do? Those $npcNamePlural:25020005$ are causing such a headache! Oh, $MyPCName$! Perfect timing!

0107112821028666-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm here to save the day!

1220183321027906-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You sure are! The $npcNamePlural:25020005$ at the $map:02020029$ spread their poison everywhere they go, making our researchers faint and weak.

1220183321027907-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That's right! Will you defeat the $npcNamePlural:25020005$ so that our researchers can work without vomiting?

1220183321027909-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Wonderful job! What would I do without you, $MyPCName$?

1220183321027910-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Did you hear? Captain $npcName:11004312[gender:0]$ overheard people whining about how much they hate routine tests... She interpreted it to mean that the tests are too easy.

1220183321027911-Kritias_2018_12-.name: As much as I hate to do it, I have to up the difficulty. Rules are rules!

1220183321027912-Kritias_2018_12-.name: But don't worry about it too much.

1220183321027913-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Between you and me, I don't think the Captain'll really do anything if you fail, but still...

1220183321027916-Kritias_2018_12-.name: <font color="#909090">(Nairin looks up from a report as you appear.)</font>

0116183821029297-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, just in time! I have something you can help me with.

1220183321027917-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We've encountered a few monsters that are more aggressive than the rest... A lot of researchers have gotten hurt.

1220183321027918-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We can't have our people venturing into the unknown and getting bullied by local wildlife, right? Right! I think you know what to do.

1220183321027919-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Destroy the aggressive monsters that are making life difficult for researchers!

1220183321027920-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thanks to you, we've been able to safely transported those who were injured to safety and send out a new batch of researchers.

0116183821029298-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Maybe this time, they can do their work in peace!

1220183321027921-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Captain $npcName:11004312[gender:0]$ overheard more people whining about how much they absolutely loathe routine tests... She interpreted it to mean that the tests are still too easy.

1220183321027922-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I tried to convince her that the tests are fine, but she was adamant.

1220183321027923-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm so sorry, $MyPCName$. I know this puts more of a burden on you.

1220183321027924-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Between you and me, I don't think the Captain'll really do anything if you fail, but still...

1220183321027926-Kritias_2018_12-.name: A perfect score, as usual. What, you didn't know I was grading you?

1220183321027927-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $map:02020004$ is a key location that connects to $map:02020041$, our first settlement in Kritias. But it's constantly being attacked by Tairen forces.

0116183821029299-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our own forces have grown weak, but the enemy keeps coming... They could make a serious push on $map:02020041$ at any time.

1220183321027928-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We barely have enough resources to defend our settlements, let alone explore the continent...

1220183321027930-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Clear out enemies in $map:02020004$ to give our guys a break!

1220183321027931-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Clear out enemies in $map:02020004$ to give our guys a break!

1220183321027932-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The forces of Tairen must realize now that we won't stand idly by when they attack, and it's all thanks to you!

1220183321027933-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Eeeee! We've discovered a new energy signature in $map:02020001$!

1220183321027934-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The Green Hoods are going to construct a research facility there so I can study this to my heart's delight!

1220183321027935-Kritias_2018_12-.name: There's just one problem. The Kharon forces there won't let us!

1220183321027936-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If you could clear them out of the way, we can finally start construction on the new facility!

1220183321027937-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If you could clear the Kharon forces out of the way, we can finally start construction on the new facility facility!

1220183321027938-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Now, construction on the research facility can finally begin! I can't wait!

1220183321027943-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $npcNamePlural:25020301$ are stealing our food supplies! Do you understand, $MyPCName$? People are starving!

1220183321027944-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You have to do something! Please! Head to $map:02020006$ and clear out the $npcNamePlural:25020301$ stealing our food!

1220183321027945-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please! Head to $map:02020006$ and clear out the $npcNamePlural:25020301$ stealing our food!

1220183321027946-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thank you! You've saved a lot of lives today, $MyPCName$!

1220183321027947-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've just received the most amazing report!

1220183321027948-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Strange devices have appeared all over Kritias. When a scout activated one of them, it made blossoms appear! And they're supposed to be really pretty!

0116183821029300-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That sounds like something that could use a lot more investigation, so...

0116183821029301-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You want me to bring you flowers?

1220183321027949-Kritias_2018_12-.name: N-no! I mean, well, yes! But it's for research, not to make my desk pretty!

0116183821029304-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Great! Then, I'll just be here, clearing off a space on my desk...

1220183321027950-Kritias_2018_12-.name: So I have a place to do my research! N-no other reason!

0116183821029307-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm sorry. I couldn't get any of the flowers.

0116183821029308-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Oh... Well, that's okay. Maybe next time...

0116183821029310-Kritias_2018_12-.name: R-really? I'll hold you to that!

1220183321027952-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I just got a call via our emergency line.

0116183821029311-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Some of our scouts were ambushed at $map:02020001$ and had their reports stolen.

0116183821029312-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thankfully, the scouts all made it back okay. But our reports...

0116183821029313-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Don't worry, Nainai! I'll get them back!

1220183321027954-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Really? Thank you! You can find the reports on $npcNamePlural:25020501$, and don't call me 'Nainai'!

1220183321027955-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020501$ and gather up those missing reports!

1220183321027956-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You're retrieved them! Oh, they're damaged. It's okay. I'm sure I can still analyze them for useful information. Thank you!

1220183321027957-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We've got trouble, $MyPCName$. Our $map:02020004$ scout was attacked, and his report was stolen.

0116183821029314-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That report contained detailed studies of enemy weaknesses! I really wanted to analyze that information...

1220183321027958-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You're missing the point, Nainai, darling. The mission details of a Shadow Walker agent was included in that report, making it a confidential document of utmost importance. We can't allow that information to fall into the wrong hands.

0116183821029315-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This is terrible. What should we do?

0116183821029316-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Don't worry. I'll retrieve the report for you.

1220183321027959-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Oh, $MyPCName$. You're always here to save the day.

0116183821029317-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Head to $map:02020004$ and battle $npcNamePlural:25020401$ to find the stolen report!

1220183321027960-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Head to $map:02020004$ and battle $npcNamePlural:25020401$ to find the stolen report!

0116183821029318-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I think I gathered most of it...

0116183821029319-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thank goodness! Even a small portion of the information included in that report will help tremendously.

0116183821029320-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It looks like you retrieved the part about the Shadow Walker agent... I guess I can put knives and clothespins away.

0116183821029321-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I don't even want to think about how you were planning to torture our enemies with clothespins, Schatten... Anyway, I'll try to piece together the rest of this report using the data you retrieved, $MyPCName$.

1220183321027962-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I was so happy earlier when we found a new aetherine mine and started increasing our aetherine stockpiles. I have so many experiments I'm planning to conduct!

0116183821029322-Kritias_2018_12-.name: But then those $npcNamePlural:25020403$ near $map:02020004$ started mining the aetherine, too, leaving less for us to gather!

1220183321027963-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This just can't stand! My experiments can't wait!

0116183821029323-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Of course! I could never refuse you, Nairin.

0116183821029324-Kritias_2018_12-.name: R-really? That's a relief! Then, will you go to $map:02020004$ and clear out the $npcNamePlural:25020403$?

1220183321027966-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I just received a note from the mines. It looks like our aetherine stockpile is growing again, and it's all thanks to you!

1220183321027968-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've already told you how important aetherine is, right?

0116183821029326-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I mean, it has the potential to revolutionize the world.

0116183821029327-Kritias_2018_12-.name: But the aetherine we've been stockpiling keeps getting stolen. This time, we have footage of $npcNamePlural:25020302$ sneaking into camp to eat the aetherine. To eat it! Can you believe that?

0116183821029328-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We've tried fences, boxes, traps, you name it... But they always find their way in. It's so discouraging.

0116183821029329-Kritias_2018_12-.name: All that's left for me to do is to ask you for help.

0116183821029330-Kritias_2018_12-.name: No problem. This'll be a piece of cake.

0116183821029331-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Really? Then, there's still hope. Go to $map:02020006$, clear out the $npcNamePlural:25020302$, and retrieve any $itemPlural:30001245$ you can find.

1220183321027969-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to $map:02020006$, clear out the $npcNamePlural:25020302$, and retrieve any $itemPlural:30001245$ you can find.

1220183321027970-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Now there's a chance I'll get to conduct all my experiments. Thank you so much, $MyPCName$!

1220183321027971-Kritias_2018_12-.name: A strange device was discovered a few days ago at $map:02020001$. It opened a large platform in the sky when it was operated!

0116183821029332-Kritias_2018_12-.name: But before we could investigate what was on the platform... it disappeared! Can you believe that?

0116183821029334-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ah. I've encountered this phenomenon before. Ghosts. Gotta be it.

0116183821029335-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Pffft, nice try, Schatten, but ghosts don't scare me. They're just another set of creatures to study.

0116183821029336-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Y-yeah. Gh-ghosts aren't frightening at all. Especially n-not to someone as strong as me...

0116183821029338-Kritias_2018_12-.name: N-no, of c-course not! What kind of stupid j-joke is that?

0116183821029339-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Condor! Wait! Come back! Where are you going in such a hurry? Oh, he's gone...

0116183821029340-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Anyway, $MyPCName$, would you head to $map:02020001$ and investigate?

1220183321027974-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Investigate the platform that appears at $map:02020001$ and let me know what you find.

1220183321027975-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You're back, $MyPCName$. What did you discover?

0116183821029341-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm not exactly sure, but I didn't see any ghosts.

0116183821029342-Kritias_2018_12-.name: See! I told you there's no such thing as ghosts!

0116183821029343-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I thought you said that you weren't scared of ghosts, not that they weren't real...

0116183821029344-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Wh-what? Same thing! Ahahahaha, shouldn't you be focusing on your mission?

0116183821029345-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Oh, that's right. $MyPCName$, thank you so much for your help!

0116183821029346-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $map:02020001$ is the main source of drinking water to $map:02020041$ and multiple other nearby settlements. The water there also contains aetherine, so it's important for research purposes as well.

0116183821029347-Kritias_2018_12-.name: But the $npcNamePlural:25020504$ in the area keep stealing our equipment, making it difficult for us to progress in our research!

0116183821029348-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Do you think you could go to $map:02020001$ and teach the $npcNamePlural:25020504$ to stop messing with our stuff?

1220183321027978-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to $map:02020001$ and teach the $npcNamePlural:25020504$ to stop messing with our stuff!

1228182021028633-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Argh, the $npcNamePlural:25020507$ at $map:02020001$ are attacking the energy lab there!

1228182021028634-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If this continues, not only will this lead to the destruction of the lab, but it'll interfere with the flow of aetherine... and delay my personal research projects!

1228182021028635-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We can't allow that to happen! Will you head to $map:02020001$ and stop the $npcNamePlural:25020507$?

1228182021028636-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We need to protect our research! Will you head to $map:02020001$ and stop the $npcNamePlural:25020507$?

1228182021028637-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thank you, $MyPCName$! I think you, and my research thanks you!

1220183321027985-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, just in time! I have a mission for you.

1220183321027986-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Some of the supplies we temporarily stashed at $map:02020006$ have gone missing.

0116183821029349-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We checked the surveillance footage and discovered that the $npcNamePlural:25020303$ are to blame.

0116183821029350-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They consider our supplies some sort of status symbol or something.

1220183321027987-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If it were just the missing supplies, it'd be one thing. But they're very aggressive when they take the supplies.

0116183821029351--.name: We need to take action before the problem gets worse. Please, head to $map:02020006$ and clear out the $npcNamePlural:25020303$.

1220183321027988-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please, head to $map:02020006$ and clear out the $npcNamePlural:25020303$.

1220183321027989-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Nice work, $MyPCName$! We can all rest a little easier, thanks to you.

1220183321027990-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Captain $npcName:11004312[gender:0]$ thinks the routine testing is still too easy. Time to up the difficulty again.

1220183321027991-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I know this makes things tougher for you, but... orders are orders!

1220183321027992-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Don't worry too much about it. How well you do on this test won't really affect your status aboard Sky Fortress. Not at this point, hehe.

1220183321027993-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, this test really just measures your devotion to Sky Fortress more than anything else, so do your best and you'll be fine.

1220183321027995-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I knew you could do it, $MyPCName$! Hehe!

1220183321027996-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Exploration is fun and exciting! I love seeing what new and strange things our scouts uncover!

1220183321027997-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Of course, the more we delve into new terrain, the more dangerous it gets, too.

1220183321027998-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If only there were a brave, strong hero who could clear out new areas so our scouts could explore in relative safety...

0116183821029353-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Wait, we do have someone like that! It's you, $MyPCName$!

0116183821029354-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We're currently focusing our explorations on the $map:02020032$, $map:02020034$, and $map:02020013$...

0116183821029355-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Will you head to those areas and clear out the $npcNamePlural:25020701$, $npcNamePlural:25020805$, and $npcNamePlural:25020905$?

0116183821029356-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If you clear out the aggressive creatures in the areas we're currently exploring, it would be such a big help!

1220183321027999-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If you clear out the aggressive creatures in the areas we're currently exploring, it would be such a big help!

1220183321028000-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thank you! Now we can keep exploring what this strange place has to offer!

1220183321028001-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Captain $npcName:11004312[gender:0]$ recently decided that putting effort into attempting to complete routine tests is more important than actually completing them.

1220183321028002-Kritias_2018_12-.name: She said that true desire and earnest effort are what we should be evaluating everyone on.

0116183821029357-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Sounds great, right? It's not. I've had to increase the difficulty level to ensure I get an accurate analysis of your efforts.

1220183321028003-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Just remember, this test isn't meant to gauge if you're still fit for Sky Fortress service, so... just keep doing what you've been doing, okay?

1220183321028004-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Don't worry too much about it, and do your best!

1220183321028006-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I think the Captain was right! Everyone performed their tests with much more zest and gusto this time!

0116183821029358-Kritias_2018_12-.name: But the best amongst them was you, of course, $MyPCName$! Great work!

1220183321028007-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've got a really! Really important mission for you!

0116183821029359-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $map:02020013$ is a key section of the supply route between Humanitas and ourselves.

1220183321028008-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's great, except... well... There are lots of monsters there, and they love to ambush our caravan.

1220183321028009-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I want you to go to $map:02020013$ and take out the monsters there.

1220183321028010-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I want you to go to $map:02020013$ and take out the monsters there.

1220183321028011-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Supplies are moving through $map:02020013$ again. Thanks, $MyPCName$!

1220183321028024-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Tairen has all kinds of advanced technology on their side. It makes things hard for us and Humanitas.

1220183321028025-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The $map:02020010$ and $map:02020034$ are proof of that.

1220183321028026-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well, $npcName:11004314[gender:1]$'s agents say that the soldiers at the $map:02020010$ have blueprints for the $map:02020034$.

1220183321028027-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If we get those $itemPlural:30001249$, we'll learn lots... including a way to take down the $map:02020034$! Can you get the blueprints from the $npcNamePlural:25020604$?

1220183321028028-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Can you get the $itemPlural:30001249$ from the $npcNamePlural:25020604$ in $map:02020010$?

1220183321028029-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Amazing! This even includes operation instructions for a fusion reactor! It'll take some time to figure out, but that's the fun part!

1220183321028030-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$! It's an emergency! $npcNamePlural:25020704$ are attacking the $map:02020032$!

1220183321028031-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If this continues, the enemy will push through our defenses to $map:02020041$ itself!

0116183821029362-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Listen here! My men are doing their blasted best to hold the line. But for every one of those blighted monsters we cut down, three more pop up!

0116183821029363-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I don't have enough people to keep up this fight!

0116183821029364-Kritias_2018_12-.name: He's right. We're all out of soldiers for this fight.

1220183321028032-Kritias_2018_12-.name: But we're not going to lie down and let the bad guys stomp all over us, right? Please defeat $npcNamePlural:25020704$ at the $map:02020032$!

1220183321028035-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Things have calmed down at the $map:02020032$. Thanks!

0116183821029365-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I never expected anything less from my cadet! BAHAHA!

0116183821029367-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our people found a mysterious device in the $map:02020010$ that made a huge ring appear in the sky!

1220183321028042-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They think that flying through the ring would cause another ring to appear. Unfortunately, none of them can fly, so...

1220183321028043-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I can't sleep because I'm so curious about it!

0116183821029368-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please, $MyPCName$, think of your poor, sleep-deprived tactical officer!

0116183821029369-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll get to the bottom of these rings!

1220183321028044-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Remember: after you use the device in the $map:02020010$, fly through the ring that appears in the air!

1220183321028045-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well? Did you find out about the ring?

0116183821029371-Kritias_2018_12-.name: <font color="#909090">(You tell her what you encountered.)</font>

0116183821029372-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well, that's kinda... disappointing, I guess.

0116183821029373-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well, at least now I can sleep in peace!

1220183321028046-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Are you ready to explore Kritias some more?

1220183321028048-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our scouts have discovered a strange melody in $map:02020013$! We couldn't figure out why it was playing, but we're working on getting to the bottom of this.

1220183321028049-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Could you go to $map:02020013$ and check it out?

1227223821028285-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thank you! You can do it!

1220183321028050-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please go to $map:02020013$ and gather data.

1220183321028051-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Did you figure out the melody?

1227223821028286-Kritias_2018_12-.name: <font color="#909090">(You do your best to hum the melody.)</font>

1227223821028289-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I think it's gonna take a while to gather the data. Thanks, though.

1220183321028052-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This is exciting news. We picked up a new energy signal in the ruins at $map:02020016$!

1220183321028053-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Of course, I want to get my hands on whatever's transmitting it.

0116183821029374-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I admit it, Nainai. I'm the source of the signal. So... Where're those hands?

1220183321028054-Kritias_2018_12-.name: St-stop kidding around! This is serious!

0116183821029375-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Oh, I am being serious, Nainai. Now... show me those hands.

0116183821029377-Kritias_2018_12-.name: And miss out on these adorable reactions? I think not.

0116183821029378-Kritias_2018_12-.name: F-fine! Whatever! I'm... I'm going back to my briefing!

1220183321028055-Kritias_2018_12-.name: L-look, having lots of energy is important to our operations here.

0116183821029379-Kritias_2018_12-.name: But $map:02020016$ is a wild place. The $npcNamePlural:25021004[gender:0]$ there won't let our researchers near the signal's source.

0116183821029380-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We can't make any more progress without you, $MyPCName$!

0116183821029382-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm counting on you! Beat the $npcNamePlural:25021004[gender:0]$ in $map:02020016$.

1220183321028057-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Good job, $MyPCName$! I'll start ramping up our research on this project.

1220183321028058-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This is a little worrying. According to this scout report, $npcNamePlural:25020804$ in the $map:02020034$ are equipped with $itemPlural:30001250$.

1220183321028059-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This is a great opportunity to get a bunch of $itemPlural:30001250$! Of course, we need someone who can take on an army of $npcNamePlural:25020804$...

1220183321028060-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hey, you can take on an army of $npcNamePlural:25020804$! Please please please get those $itemPlural:30001250$ for me?

1220183321028061-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please defeat the robots in the $map:02020034$ and take their $itemPlural:30001250$.

1220183321028062-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Wow! You brought a lot! Thank you so much, $MyPCName$!

1220183321028063-Kritias_2018_12-.name: These numbers are bad. In all of our experiments, we spend more energy extracting power from aetherine crystals than we get out of it.

0116183821029383-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Don't ask me why, but I think that $npcNamePlural:25020904$, um, excrete a fluid that can catalyze the process.

0116183821029384-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Of course, no one wants to go around squeezing $npcNamePlural:25020904$ for their fluids...

0116183821029386-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Really?! Wow! You always come through for me!

1220183321028064-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Maybe I should've mentioned this earlier, but $npcNamePlural:25020904$ smell terrible. Really terrible.

1220183321028067-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Yay, you brought it! You—Oh, put that down. Um, over there. I'll have a researcher pick it up. Thanks a ton!

1228182021028638-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You know that the $map:02020034$ produces a ton of refined aetherine, right? I sent some of our crew on an innocent fact-finding mission there, and the $npcNamePlural:25020806$ ambushed them. The nerve!

1228182021028639-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Those guys are big. And strong. And skilled, too.

1228182021028640-Kritias_2018_12-.name: But I think you're even more skilled. I think you can beat the $npcNamePlural:25020806$!

0116183821029387-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please teach the $npcNamePlural:25020806$ in the $map:02020034$ a lesson.

1228182021028641-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please teach the $npcNamePlural:25020806$ in the $map:02020034$ a lesson.

1220183321028073-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You're needed at the $map:02020010$, and quickly! Our soldiers are under attack from $npcNamePlural:25020605$.

1220183321028074-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We need to dismantle those $npcNamePlural:25020605$ if we want to stand any chance of winning.

1220183321028075-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You're our only hope of turning things around. Please defeat $npcNamePlural:25020605$ at the $map:02020010$.

1220183321028077-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Nice going. We've still got a shot at this fight!

1220183321028078-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Don't spread this around, but I heard that not all of our crew members are taking their missions seriously.

1220183321028079-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That's why Captain $npcName:11004312[gender:1]$ is really pushing this whole "routine testing" bit. These tests... Well, they aren't easy.

0130145621029611-Kritias_2018_12-.name: But don't worry! I'm sure you've got nothing to worry about.

1220183321028080-Kritias_2018_12-.name: My advice is to not sweat it. We're not evaluating you as a person, after all. We're just calculating your value as an asset to the mission!

1220183321028081-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Just do what you always do, and you'll be fine!

1220183321028082-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Just do what you always do, and you'll be fine!

1220183321028083-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I knew you could do it. You always do, after all.

0130145621029612-Kritias_2018_12-.name: And I'm pretty sure I saw the captain give an approving nod. You're golden!

1220183321028084-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I know we have a lot of work ahead of us, but I can't help getting giddy when I think about all the stuff we're learning. With your help, of course!

0130145621029613-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We're discovering new energy sources and creatures every day. I'm so lucky to be alive when we're exploring a brand new land!

1220183321028085-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Of course, not everything's going so great. Our research outposts in Kidel are under attack. All of the time.

1220183321028086-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Can you fight off the monsters who keep getting in the way of our research?

0130145621029614-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please defeat $npcNamePlural:25021503$ in the $map:02020003$, $npcNamePlural:25021303[gender:0]$ in $map:02020033$, and $npcNamePlural:25021203$ in the $map:02020017$.

1220183321028087-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please defeat $npcNamePlural:25021503$ in the $map:02020003$, $npcNamePlural:25021303[gender:0]$ in $map:02020033$, and $npcNamePlural:25021203$ in the $map:02020017$.

1220183321028088-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Phew! We can finally research in peace. Thanks a bunch!

1220183321028089-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I don't know if you heard, but Captain $npcName:11004312[gender:1]$ changed our testing criteria to focus on fieldwork.

1220183321028090-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I think she's trying to get a better handle on each crew member's contribution to our work here.

1220183321028091-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I don't think that'll make any difference for you, though. Just keep doing what you always do.

1220183321028092-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You're going to knock it out of the park. Good luck!

1220183321028093-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You're going to knock it out of the park. Good luck!

1220183321028100-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Oh, perfect! I was about to radio you. Have you heard of $map:02020003$?

1220183321028101-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We have several exploration goals for this particular area, focused on studying the magic and structures of ancient Kritias. Unfortunately, interference from the Tairen and Kharon forces has slowed... well, stopped our progress.

0130145621029616-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It seems pretty clear they've allied against us, just as we've allied with Humanitas.

1220183321028102-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If you could drive them out, the expedition team can finally make some headway. Can I count on your help, $MyPCName$?

1220183321028103-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please head to $map:02020003$ and take out as much of the Tairen and Kharon forces as possible.

1220183321028104-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Good job, $MyPCName$! With your help, we've secured our position.

1220183321028110-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Welcome! I've got another job for you. A lot of our people have been getting sick, all because of $npcName:23001006$. That thing spews this nasty poison everywhere, and it gets into everything!

1220183321028111-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We don't have an antidote yet, because it's so hard to find pure samples of the poison. But we need one, and fast.

0130145621029617-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I need your help getting samples of the poison. Or... more like, making it possible to get samples. There're these creatures called $npcNamePlural:25021102$ that eat the poison.

0130145621029618-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I have no idea why any creature would eat poison, but... that's the situation.

0130145621029619-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We need to hurry! Please take out the $npcNamePlural:25021102$ in the $map:02020051$ so we can get those samples.

1220183321028113-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please take out $npcNamePlural:25021102$ in the $map:02020051$ so we can get those samples.

1220183321028114-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Good job! I have to wonder... could this stuff taste good? I mean, I'm not going to try it!

0130145621029620-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Anyway, our research team tells me they're getting all the samples they need. You really did it, $MyPCName$!

0130145621029626-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hahh... Are you familiar with the $map:02020017$?

0130145621029627-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The Green Hoods designated it as a Category One protected area, since it's full of ancient texts and records of Kritias.

0130145621029628-Kritias_2018_12-.name: But the $npcNamePlural:25021202$ are laying waste to any buildings or facilities they find.

1220183321028121-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It looks like they would rather destroy the ancient texts of Kritias than let us find them.

1220183321028122-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We can't let this happen! Who knows what hidden knowledge will be lost if they do this?

0130145621029630-Kritias_2018_12-.name: How can I be calm when important historical records are going to be lost? Please help, $MyPCName$!

0130145621029631-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please go to the $map:02020017$ right now and defeat the $npcNamePlural:25021202$!

0130145621029633-Kritias_2018_12-.name: <font color="#909090">(This is very important to $npcName:11004315[gender:0]$... Don't mess this up!)</font>

1220183321028123-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please go to the $map:02020017$ and defeat the $npcNamePlural:25021202$!

1220183321028124-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Good job, $MyPCName$. Uh... I should apologize for getting so... worked up before.

0130145621029635-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Really? Phew, what a relief! Let's just not mention this to the Captain, okay?

1220183321028125-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, just in time! Do you remember when we were talking about making an antidote for $npcName:23001006$'s poison?

0130145621029636-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Yes, has there been a breakthrough?

1220183321028126-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Yes! Sort of. The research team discovered that fluids from $npcName:25021403$ contain an enzyme that completely neutralize the poison!

0130145621029637-Kritias_2018_12-.name: So now we know exactly what we need for the antidote! And it's all thanks to you, $MyPCName$!

1220183321028127-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our only problem is getting enough of the fluid to create all the doses we'll need.

0130145621029640-Kritias_2018_12-.name: No, not at all. Please continue.

0130145621029641-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Okay! All you need to do is defeat the $npcNamePlural:25021403$ in $map:02020014$ and bring as many $itemPlural:30001252$ as you can!

1220183321028129-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please defeat $npcNamePlural:25021403$ in $map:02020014$ and bring as many $itemPlural:30001252$ as you can!

1220183321028130-Kritias_2018_12-.name: So, this is the $item:30001252$... Well, we definitely didn't get it for the smell, geez. I'll handle it with great care.

0130145621029646-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thank you! You've been a huge help!

0130145621029648-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Oh! You can tell? No... it's okay...

0130145621029649-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hah, it's just that... our expedition members discovered a strange device in $map:02020003$ that plays a... unique melody.

0130145621029650-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They couldn't figure out what it was for... and the melody changed each time it played.

0130145621029651-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's... it's driving me crazy! Why is the device there? What are the melodies? It's keeping me up at night!

0130145621029652-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please... I beg you... solve the mystery of the melody in $map:02020003$ so I can sleep again.

1220183321028134-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please investigate the melody device in $map:02020003$.

1220183321028135-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Did you figure it out? Is it over?

0130145621029655-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That's all I got from it.

0130145621029656-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well... it's not perfect, but... close enough to ease my mind.

0130145621029657-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thank you, $MyPCName$! I'm going to take a quick nap when you leave. Just a day or two, I promise!

1220183321028136-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$! We've got a bit of an emergency.

0130145621029658-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $npcNamePlural:25021503$ in $map:02020003$ have been stealing parts of the Sky Fortress! It's not serious yet, but they need to stop before they pinch something serious!

1220183321028137-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I don't think it's an attack. They seem to be competing to steal the biggest parts. It would almost be cute, if they weren't, y'know, ransacking the ship. And harming our crew!

0130145621029659-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We can always repair the ship, but hurting our comrades is unforgivable!

1220183321028138-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please defeat the $npcNamePlural:25021503$ in $map:02020003$ before the losses mount!

0130145621029660-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I still can't believe we had to deal with that, but at least it's over.

1220183321028141-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, you always know just when we need you!

0130145621029661-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The second Humanitas base, $map:02020033$, is under attack by $npcNamePlural:25021303[gender:0]$. They can be formidable foes, but these have been worn down by the long battle.

1220183321028142-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If $map:02020033$ falls, that'll be a huge setback for Humanitas. We can't let our allies suffer like that!

0130145621029662-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, dire situations like this are exactly what we need you for.

0130145621029663-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please go to $map:02020033$ and stop the $npcNamePlural:25021303[gender:0]$.

1220183321028144-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please go to $map:02020033$ and stop the $npcNamePlural:25021303[gender:0]$.

0130145621029664-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's from the garrison in $map:02020033$, explaining how $MyPCName$ arrived just in time and turned the tables on the enemy single-handedly.

0130145621029665-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They said the only reason they're still there to send this is because of you. Wow.

0130145621029666-Kritias_2018_12-.name: What did you do to earn such praise from $npcName:11004395[gender:1]$, of all people? You really are something!

1220183321028146-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Oh, $MyPCName$... I'm glad you're here. Those darned $npcNamePlural:25021203$ have been harassing our people again.

0130145621029667-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Are you okay? You sound really worried.

0130145621029668-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I can't help it. Every day there's some new crisis, and I've been working day and night to keep up...

0130145621029669-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ahhh! I shouldn't be complaining when people like you are working so much harder!

0130145621029670-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Don't say that. We just work in different ways.

0130145621029671-Kritias_2018_12-.name: R... really? Yeah, I guess that is true! Still, I can't help but worry about how understaffed we are...

0130145621029672-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Case in point, the $npcNamePlural:25021203$ in $map:02020017$ have stolen our $itemPlural:30001253$. Again!

1220183321028147-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Losing the $itemPlural:30001253$ means losing tons of valuable research on Kritias.

0130145621029673-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll get the $itemPlural:30001253$ back. You relax.

1220183321028148-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Oh, thank you so much. I felt so bad about asking... But yes, find the $npcNamePlural:25021203$ in $map:02020017$ and recover the $itemPlural:30001253$!

1220183321028149-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Find the $npcNamePlural:25021203$ in $map:02020017$ and get the $itemPlural:30001253$ back!

1220183321028150-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Finally... the $itemPlural:30001253$! You have no idea what a relief this is. I just want to hug them...

1228182021028643-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$! Disaster! Humanitas has sent an urgent request for backup at $map:02020033$.

0130145621029674-Kritias_2018_12-.name: But we're so shorthanded... I have no idea where I can pull a unit from... But we can't afford to lose the whole $map:02020033$...

1228182021028644-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Really? Even for you... No, I have faith in you. I know you can do this! All right, your targets are the $npcNamePlural:25021307$! Drive them out of $map:02020033$!

1228182021028646-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Find the $npcNamePlural:25021307$ and drive them out of $map:02020033$!

1228182021028647-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You did it! I got a message from $npcName:11004395[gender:1]$, and it's... Wow, they're just gushing about you.

0130145621029676-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I know $npcName:11004395[gender:1]$ can seem cold, but she seems really touched by what you did, $MyPCName$.

1220183321028157-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We keep losing probes in the $map:02020051$ to $npcNamePlural:25021103$ and their surface-to-air missiles.

1220183321028158-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They're too mobile for us to take them out with our own weapons. That means you'll have to go in and take them down one-by-one.

0130145621029678-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I really underestimated them... they may be busted, but those weapon systems still work.

1220183321028159-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, I can count on you for this, right? Please go to the $map:02020051$ and take out those $npcNamePlural:25021103$!

1220183321028160-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, I can count on you for this, right? Please go to the $map:02020051$ and take out those $npcNamePlural:25021103$!

1220183321028161-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thank goodness that's over! I'm so glad I can count on you, $MyPCName$.

1220183321028162-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Captain $npcName:11004312[gender:0]$ thinks the whole evaluation system for Sky Fortress crew needs to be overhauled.

1220183321028163-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's true, there's not much structure to the system, and we've only recently transitioned from reporting to field evaluations...

1220183321028164-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ahh, but this shouldn't concern you! You've been taking on all our toughest missions anyway!

1220183321028165-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Just keep doing what you're doing, $MyPCName$.

1220183321028166-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Just keep doing what you're doing, $MyPCName$.

1220183321028167-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's like I said, $MyPCName$! Just do what you always do. That's all we need!

1220183321028174-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Captain $npcName:11004312[gender:0]$ still isn't happy with our evaluations... she thinks there's too much variance between missions to evaluate people fairly.

1220183321028175-Kritias_2018_12-.name: She was so convinced, we had to stop her from going out into the field herself to try an evaluation mission!

0130145621029684-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I mean, we certainly need the manpower...

0130145621029685-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $npcName:11004315[gender:0]$! If we're still short on people, I will-

0130145621029686-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ahh! Nope! No, we're fine! I was just, ah, speculating!

0130145621029687-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Is that so? Hmm... very well. Then I don't want to hear about missions being pushed back!

1220183321028176-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I need to start watching my back...

0130145621029689-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Listen, the overall difficulty of the evaluation missions has increased, but the purpose isn't to evaluate your qualifications or anything. Try not to stress about it.

1220183321028177-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Just do your best, as you always do!

1220183321028178-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Just do your best, as you always do!

1220183321028179-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I knew you could do it, $MyPCName$! You took that tricky mission and put it to shame!

1220183321028180-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've got a new mission for you, $MyPCName$. Do you know about $map:02020035$? It's a large facility built by the Tairen Kingdom to produce mechanical soldiers.

0130145621029690-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The factory was built centuries ago, and somehow continues to crank out robots.

0130145621029691-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's pretty amazing... and explains part of why this has been such a difficult struggle for us.

1220183321028181-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Now the factory has been occupied by the Daemon Army. The robots being produced are now serving them, under the command of $npcName:11001813[gender:0]$.

1220183321028182-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Perhaps that is why the mechanical soldiers have been much more aggressive towards our forces.

1220183321028183-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The feedback from Cat Sith is that it's impossible to destroy the factory itself at present due to its heavy defenses. But we do have the option to occupy the factory.

0130145621029692-Kritias_2018_12-.name: First, we need to clear out the security force so we can get our teams in to reprogram the place. Defeat as many robot forces as you can in $map:02020035$!

1220183321028184-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Defeat as many robot forces as you can in $map:02020035$!

1220183321028185-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, it looks like you cleared our route into $map:02020035$. Our troops can mop up the rest.

0130145621029693-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Goodness, is there anything you can't do?

1220183321028186-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, did you know large quantities of aetherine were discovered in the vines covering the $map:02020051$?

0130145621029694-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The plants there may have the ability to send their roots deep underground and absorb the aetherine directly.

0130145621029695-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If we can harvest these vines, we can collect aetherine more easily! But...

0130145621029696-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The monsters in the region are too aggressive for our people to work there at the moment.

1220183321028187-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, if you can thin out the monsters in $map:02020008$, we can continue our aetherine research. Will you help us?

0130145621029698-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thank you so much, $MyPCName$! I hope I'm not depending on you too much...

1220183321028188-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, if you can thin out the monsters in $map:02020008$, we can continue our aetherine research.

0130145621029699-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Now we can finally establish our research camp! The expedition members will be thrilled. I'm thrilled, too!

0130145621029700-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Welcome, $MyPCName$! We've been tracking a suspicious $npcName:25021804$ in $map:02020008$.

1220183321028195-Kritias_2018_12-.name: According to our scouts, the $npcName:25021804$ is avoiding all hostiles and fighting back fiercly if cornered. It's odd for this type of foe...

0130145621029701-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Oh, that! I was absolutely taken with that one, so I had my men extend that $npcName:25021804$ a polite invitation to join us.

1220183321028196-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Say, Nainai... you haven't been misplacing things lately, have you? Important things? Important things.

0130145621029702-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well... in all the chaos, I suppose...

0130145621029704-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ah! That's $item:30001254$! $npcName:11004314[gender:1]$, how do you have this?

0130145621029705-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Oh, you know me. I'm very persuasive. That $npcName:25021804$ had it last...

0130145621029706-Kritias_2018_12-.name: What? No! If $item:30001254$ fell into the hands of the Tairen forces...

0130145621029707-Kritias_2018_12-.name: With the $item:30001254$, the Tairen forces will know exactly where to strike us!

0130145621029708-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well, lucky for you they've split it into several pieces for transport. As long as they don't get back together, we're safe. Although, their rendezvous is coming up soon...

0130145621029709-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Why... why didn't you tell us this sooner?!

0130145621029710-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Dear, sweet Nainai... You can't rush a Shadow Walker. We take our time and do it right. certain.

1220183321028197-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Oooh...! $MyPCName$, please hurry to $map:02020008$! Find and take that $npcName:25021804$ down, and bring back that $item:30001254$ ASAP!

0130145621029711-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Wow... I've never see you fired up like this. I like it.

1220183321028198-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please hurry to $map:02020008$! Find and take that $npcName:25021804$ down, and bring back that $item:30001254$ ASAP!

1220183321028199-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Phew! Thank goodness we've got the $item:30001254$ back. I'm going to enter this in the database and then shred this document like six different ways.

0130145621029713-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hey! Nainai! What about me? Don't I get some of your bacon, too?

0130145621029714-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Argh! If you hadn't waited so long... Sigh. It's true... We would have been in deeper trouble if it wasn't for the Shadow Walkers.

0130145621029715-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That's what I like to hear! You can repay me later. I've got a few ideas how.

1220183321028205-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our forces have advanced as far as $map:02020037$, which serves as a sort of gateway into the heart of Tairen's territory.

1220183321028206-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The current plan is to make our push into Tairen by slipping through $map:02020037$ with the Humanitas forces.

1220183321028207-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The problem is, since this area is of significant strategic value to Tairen, their forces are sure to have a heavy presence in the region. The knights of the Royal Guard seem especially strong. If they got involved, they could make progressing through the region difficult.

0130145621029719-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Among them, the  $npcName:25022103[gender:0]$ are the most formidable, and that's not good for us.

1220183321028208-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Just leave them to me. I'll beat a trail right to Tairen's doorstep.

1220183321028209-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I feel kind of guilty, always asking you to do the missions no one else wants to do. This is really important, though, so I hope you come through like always. If you need any backup, though, I'll do my best to help!

1220183321028210-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You need to take out the $npcNamePlural:25022103[gender:0]$in the vicinity of $map:02020037$.

1220183321028211-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We did it! We've finally established a foothold right on Tairen's doorstep. From here, we can practically march right in!

0130145621029720-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Now, we just need to work with Humanitas to decide on a winning strategy to reclaim Tairen.

0130145621029721-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I don't know when that'll happen-you know how these bureaucratic processes go-but when the time comes, I'm looking forward to seeing you in action again!

1220183321028217-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$! I've got some good news for you! That's...less common than I wish it was, so listen up!

0130145621029726-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The Green Hoods' engineering division has concluded that if we're able to conduct a thorough analysis of the robots manufactured in the <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020035$</font>, we might uncover a security vulnerability that would let us turn these metal menaces into allies!

0130145621029727-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Even the possibility sounds amazing, right? Making those cool precision-tuned mechanical soldiers fight FOR us instead of against us!

0130145621029728-Kritias_2018_12-.name: There's one small problem, though... We need to bring in a pile of $npcName:25021903$ memory chips before the engineers can even get started.

1220183321028218-Kritias_2018_12-.name: And who's better qualified to turn robots into rubbish than you? You'll need to defeat <font color="#ffd200">$npcNamePlural:25021903$</font> in the $map:02020035$, then bring back their memory chips for the research team. How about it? Do you think you can pull it off?

1220183321028219-Kritias_2018_12-.name: And who's better qualified to turn robots into rubbish than you? You'll need to defeat <font color="#ffd200">$npcNamePlural:25021903$</font> in the $map:02020035$, then bring back their memory chips for the research team. How about it? Do you think you can pull it off?

1220183321028220-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Goodness... You're back already? Were you able to get those memory chips?

0130145621029729-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You mean these $itemPlural:30001255$? All in a day's work.

0130145621029730-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hm. They're not exactly in pristine condition, which I suppose is to be expected when you have to beat the bolts out of them to get to the chips in the first place, but I think the researchers should still be able to work with these.

0130145621029731-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Anyway, I think we can safely cross this one off the list as 'Mission Accomplished'! I'll let you know when we've got something we need your help with again.

1220183321028221-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Oh! Your timing couldn't be better, $MyPCName$! I just received a report that our field medic stations have been inundated with a wave of sick explorers. Apparently, they lost consciousness and collapsed while scouting in $map:02020008$.

0130145621029732-Kritias_2018_12-.name: At first, we thought it was simply exhaustion from the physical demands of exploration and reconnaissance, but then the nurses caring for them started collapsing, suffering the same symptoms.

0130145621029733-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That's when the research team came in to perform a thorough examination of everyone affected and found poison in their systems! After checking it against the known toxins in Kritias, they discovered it was a fine powder from the wings of the $npcNamePlural:25021803$.

0130145621029734-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Fortunately for us, the recently established pharmaceutical team was able to develop an antidote and are currently treating everyone who was poisoned. But more are being stricken every day, and it's only a matter of time until the number being stricken is greater than the amount of antidote we can produce.

0130145621029735-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The poison powder from the wings of the $npcNamePlural:25021803$ in $map:02020008$ is especially potent. Not only is it easily spread by contact, but it requires larger doses of our antidote to counteract.

1220183321028222-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We need you to exterminate $npcNamePlural:25021803$ in $map:02020008$ to reduce the risk of our explorers and scouts getting poisoned. Swords, flames, and general-purpose explosives are not only approved for this mission, but encouraged!

1220183321028223-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You need to exterminate $npcNamePlural:25021803$ in $map:02020008$ to reduce the risk of our explorers and scouts getting poisoned.

1220183321028224-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Good work out there, $MyPCName$! The production of more antidote is ramping up, and that means we should be able to stay on top of this problem.

1228182021028648-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$! We're in big trouble! The agents who infiltrated $map:02020036$ to assess the strength of the Daemon Army were discovered! They're in full retreat now, but they've sustained injuries.

0130145621029736-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $map:02020036$ is an important stronghold for the Daemon Army. To stay on top of their activity, we have no choice but to risk this kind of intelligence gathering. If we didn't, there'd be no warning if and when they decided to launch a surprise attack.

0130145621029737-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The $npcNamePlural:25022005$ in $map:02020036$ are nimble, despite their size. They have especially keen senses, too. Our scouts are trained pros, but they manage to find them and give chase.

1228182021028649-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If we don't thin their numbers, our efforts to scout the enemy's base will be thwarted. That's why we need you to take out the $npcNamePlural:25022005$ at $map:02020036$. Only then can the scouts gather the vital intel we need!

1228182021028651-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If we don't thin their numbers, our efforts to scout the enemy's base will be thwarted. That's why we need you to slay <font color="#ffd200">$npcNamePlural:25022005$</font> in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020036$</font>. Only then can the scouts gather the vital intel we need!

1228182021028652-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Look! We have reports coming in from our scouts in $map:02020036$ again! And you're the one who made it possible, $MyPCName$!

1220183321028230-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$! It may come as no surprise to you, but we've got another mess on our hands! Do you remember the substance you brought in before that could counteract the $npcName:23001006$'s poison?

0130145621029738-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thanks to you, our pharmaceutical team succeeded in developing an antidote! It's still in the trial phase for now, but once it's been deemed safe, it can go straight into mass production.

0130145621029739-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Or rather, it could have... You see, the $npcNamePlural:25021604$ launched a surprise raid on the research team's facilities, destroyed the research data, and stole the $item:30001256$!

1220183321028231-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Without the research data, the team would have no choice but to re-create the sample again from scratch, and that'd take time we can't afford. If we delay the mass production of the antidote, we'll have a lot of poisoned soldiers on our hands!

1220183321028232-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Who else could we turn to but you? You need to go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020009$</font>, eliminate the <font color="#ffd200">$npcNamePlural:25021604$</font> there, and retrieve the <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001256$</font>.

1220183321028233-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We need you to go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020009$</font>, eliminate the <font color="#ffd200">$npcNamePlural:25021604$</font> there, and retrieve the <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001256$</font>.

1220183321028234-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You really came through in a pinch, $MyPCName$! Now we can get the mass production of this antidote rolling and start treating everyone!

1220183321028235-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Greetings, $MyPCName$. Do you happen to remember me telling you about a large quantity of aetherine we detected in $map:02020018$?

0130145621029740-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Uh... Yeah, how could I possibly forget such a fascinating detail?

0130145621029741-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hm... You say you do, but scratching your head like that makes it seem sort of like you don't... T-that's no problem, though, because I needed to brief you on the mission anyway.

0130145621029742-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The Green Hoods decided to set up a research camp in $map:02020018$ to collect large quantities of aetherine and begin research on it right away.

0130145621029743-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Unfortunately, the researchers have had their hands full dealing with attacks from $npcNamePlural:25021703$ instead. They've completely foiled every attempt the researchers have made to set up a camp.

0130145621029744-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $map:02020018$ is a key region we need to control for aetherine research and collection. But for that to happen, we need to set up a camp, and we can't do that until you send those <font color="#ffd200">$npcNamePlural:25021703$</font> packing!

1220183321028237-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We need to set up a camp, and we can't do that until you send those <font color="#ffd200">$npcNamePlural:25021703$</font> packing!

1220183321028238-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've received a report that the research team has begun setting up their camp! It's been a long time coming, and they couldn't have done it without your expert display of applied force, $MyPCName$!

1220183321028239-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ah, there you are, $MyPCName$. Did you receive the classified document from Humanitas?

0130145621029745-Kritias_2018_12-.name: <font color="#909090">(Oh no... That one I made into a really sweet paper airplane?)</font>

0130145621029746-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Huh? You never got it? Hmm... It must be because you're out in the field so often. Not to worry, though; giving briefings is one of the little joys I cherish.

0130145621029747-Kritias_2018_12-.name: A-ahem! 'Humanitas is planning to launch a full-scale attack on the Daemon Army's key stronghold, $map:02020036$, with the support of the allied forces of Sky Fortress. The goal of this operation is to suppress enemy activity and secure a launching point to reclaim Tairen'

0130145621029748-Kritias_2018_12-.name: 'We formally request the aid of Sky Fortress, due to their exceptional capabilities in reconaissance and intelligence gathering. All data related to this operation must be encrypted and transmitted on the secure channel Badger-Mushroom-Mushroom-Slime.'

0130145621029749-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That's their official communique. In compliance with our allies' request, the Green Hoods sent scouts to $map:02020036$. However...

1220183321028240-Kritias_2018_12-.name: While the scouts were gathering information on $map:02020036$, they were discovered by $npcNamePlural:25022004$ and forced to retreat, giving up ground.

1220183321028241-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's not easy to shake their pursuit, either. Their smell, hearing, and sight are all incredibly acute. But the problem is, we can't coordinate a proper attack on $map:02020036$ without the data those scouts are gathering.

1220183321028242-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please, do this one for the Green Hoods! Help our attack on <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020036$</font> succeed by taking out those <font color="#ffd200">$npcNamePlural:25022004$</font> and letting our scouts do what they do best!

1220183321028243-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Help our attack on <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020036$</font> succeed by taking out those <font color="#ffd200">$npcNamePlural:25022004$</font> and letting our scouts do what they do best!

1220183321028244-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Take a look! We've got brand new, up-to-date topographical data on $map:02020036$! We'll be able to use this to find the most defensible routes to advance on the enemy!

1228142921028290-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $npcName:11004395[gender:1]$'s adjutant, $npcName:11004396[gender:0]$, sent a request for support. Are you available?

1228142921028292-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The monsters in $map:02020029$ and $map:02020030$ are closing in on Humanitas. Unfortunately, Humanitas doesn't have the manpower to hold them off for long.

1228142921028295-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $npcName:11004396[gender:0]$ reports that you were a great help. Humanitas owes you a debt.

1228142921028296-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm sure you're aware that $map:02020004$ and $map:02020006$ are key strategic locations for $map:02020041$.

1228142921028297-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our scout patrols have reported increased monster locations around both of those areas.

1228142921028298-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This is a direct threat to our supply lines. If we don't do something about those monsters, this outpost will fall.

1228142921028301-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our patrols are already reporting that the situation has improved.

1228142921028302-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our supply lines are safe once again. You're dismissed.

1228142921028303-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We set up $map:02020041$ in record time, but there were some critical elements that we neglected.

1228142921028304-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our soldiers are holding the $map:02020032$, but that's all that stands between the civilians here and the Daemon Army.

1228142921028305-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We need a safe haven here on Kritias. If not, all of our operations will fall apart. That's why we must hold the line.

1228142921028308-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Now that we have a secure foothold, we can begin our exploration in earnest.

1228142921028309-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Kritias is fascinating. Nowhere in Maple World can you find so much advanced technology alongside so much lush nature.

1228142921028310-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I wish to protect this uniqueness. The monsters in $map:02020014$ have other ideas.

1228142921028311-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Defeat the monsters in $map:02020014$ before they ruin the beautiful scenery there.

1228142921028312-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Defeat the monsters in $map:02020014$ before they ruin the beautiful scenery there.

1228142921028313-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thank you. $map:02020014$ is one of the few places where our agents can relax peacefully.

0129160221029609-Kritias_2018_12-.name: In fact, I'm thinking of visiting it for myself when the fighting is over. I may ask you to be my guide when that time comes.

1228142921028314-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The further we push into Kritias, the more fierce our opposition becomes. I can't afford to lose anymore scouts to unexpected ambushes.

1228142921028315-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll clear a path for the scouts.

1228142921028316-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That should work. Thank you for volunteering.

1228142921028319-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thanks to you, our scouts have managed to push into a new area.

0129160221029610-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We're lucky to have you. Take a rest before your next mission.

1227151321028272-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our scouts' radios are being jammed by $npcNamePlural:25020102$.

0115221521029190-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Normally, I'd be perfectly happy to use telepathy to communicate over the vast distances required, but our scouts lack the sensitivity that you and I share. Unfortunately they don't, so we must ensure that their wretched radios are in working order.

1227151321028273-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to $map:02020030$ and dispose of the meddlesome machines.

1227151321028274-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to $map:02020030$ and dispose of the $npcNamePlural:25020102$.

1227151321028275-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I was just contacted by a scout via radio, so it seems your efforts were not in vain.

0116112121029225-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thanks to you, I have many, many radio conversations in my future... Sigh.

1227151121028254-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $map:02020004$ is practically next door to $map:02020041$. It is also overrun with Tairen's mechanical abominations.

1227151121028255-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This means that Tairen is always in striking distance of us.

1227151121028257-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Are you not yet done? Go to $map:02020004$ and defeat $npcNamePlural:25020405[gender:0]$.

1227151121028258-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I expected nothing less than complete success.

0116113321029226-Kritias_2018_12-.name: On behalf of the Lumiknights, you have my thanks.

1227151121028259-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ecological research in $map:02020034$ and $map:02020013$ has come to a stop.

0115221521029191-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm assured that this research is of vital importance, but it's impossible to progress when our scientists are under constant threat of monster attack.

1227151121028260-Kritias_2018_12-.name: In order to get things under way once again, defeat $npcNamePlural:25020804$ in $map:02020034$ and $npcNamePlural:25020904$ in $map:02020013$.

1227151121028261-Kritias_2018_12-.name: In order to get things under way once again, defeat $npcNamePlural:25020804$ in $map:02020034$ and $npcNamePlural:25020904$ in $map:02020013$.

1227151121028262-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Research is progressing apace thanks to you.

0116113321029227-Kritias_2018_12-.name: As your reward, I shall grant onto you a fraction of my aura.

1227151121028263-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Have you read the signs, too, $MyPCName$?

1227151121028264-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The signs... that all of our soldiers look busy?

1227151121028265-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's because we are preparing to call our wrath upon the Tairen wretches in $map:02020017$ and $map:02020033$.

0128180921029518-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I would have you participate in this raid. Go to those places and defeat $npcNamePlural:25021205$ and $npcNamePlural:25021305[gender:0]$.

0128180921029519-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The time for words is past. I will leave this mission to you.

1227151121028267-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You may have turned the tide of the battle.

0128180921029520-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Truly, the goddess has sent you to our side.

1227151121028268-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I have waited for you through the minutes and the hours.

1227151121028269-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The monsters of $map:02020035$ and $map:02020037$ are attacking our agents.

0128180921029521-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The $npcNamePlural:25021904$ and $npcNamePlural:25022104$ present a particularly troubling threat. I would have you vanquish them first.

0128180921029522-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I will continue to wait for you here.

1227151121028270-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The $npcNamePlural:25021904$ and $npcNamePlural:25022104$ present a particularly troubling threat. I would have you vanquish them first.

1227151121028271-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Did the monsters seem strange to you?

0128180921029524-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I see. I shall have my templars look into this more thoroughly. Thank you.

1228142921028320-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Guess what? I've got a mission for you!

0116183821029388-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's hard enough getting enough aetherine for our research, and the $npcNamePlural:25020102$ near $map:02020030$ have only made our job harder.

1228142921028321-Kritias_2018_12-.name: These $npcNamePlural:25020102$ gather aetherine crystals and use them like batteries to keep their bodies going.

1228142921028322-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The more of them show up, the less aetherine there is for us. Help us by driving the $npcNamePlural:25020102$ from $map:02020030$!

1228142921028323-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Help us by driving the $npcNamePlural:25020102$ from $map:02020030$!

1228142921028324-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thanks so much! Our aetherine source is secure... for now.

1228142921028325-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've been looking all over for you!

0116183821029389-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The Green Hoods are researching the correlation between aetherine and mana levels. Unfortunately, the heaps and heaps of monsters out there keep getting in our way.

1228142921028326-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The monsters in $map:02020001$ and $map:02020004$ are especially terrible!

0116183821029390-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Can you help us out by defeating the $npcNamePlural:25020505$ in $map:02020001$ and $npcNamePlural:25020402$ in $map:02020004$?

1228142921028327-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Can you help us out by defeating the $npcNamePlural:25020505$ in $map:02020001$ and $npcNamePlural:25020402$ in $map:02020004$?

1228142921028328-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thank you so much! We all owe you a big one!

1228142921028329-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I have news! Our scouts discovered a ruin in $map:02020016$.

1228142921028330-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've got a team ready to excavate the place. Ancient ruins on an unknown world... It's like an adventure novel!

1228142921028331-Kritias_2018_12-.name: But it's not easy sailing. Enemies are coming from all over the place to keep us out of $map:02020016$.

0130151521029758-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I can't send my people into that. But I can't just give up on the research, either!

0130151521029759-Kritias_2018_12-.name: So... Help us? Pretty please? With a cherry on top?

0130151521029760-Kritias_2018_12-.name: How can I say no to that?

1228142921028332-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thanks! I owe you soooo much!

0130151521029761-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please drive the monsters away from $map:02020016$. I'll get my team ready to move out as soon as it's safe.

1228142921028333-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please drive the monsters away from $map:02020016$. I'll get my team ready to move out as soon as it's safe.

1228142921028334-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Good job, $MyPCName$! We can finally start laying out the groundwork for a research camp out there.

1228142921028335-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Have I got an important mission for you!

0130145621029750-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $map:02020017$ is a high priority research site, since it contains an archive of writings on ancient Kritias.

1228142921028336-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The problem is, my scouts tell me that monsters and enemy soldiers are working together by stealing or destroying those writings.

0130145621029751-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Oh, and they're hurting my field agents, too. But think of all the writings we're losing!

1228142921028337-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We can't keep on like this. Please move out to $map:02020017$ and send those monsters packing!

1228142921028338-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please move out to $map:02020017$ and send those monsters packing!

1228142921028339-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They should think twice before they mess with Sky Fortress again, thanks to you.

1228142921028340-Kritias_2018_12-.name: One of my research teams are testing out how aetherine crystals react to mana from Maple World.

0130145621029753-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The strange thing is that they react with each other at all! Could these two types of energy be related somehow?

1228142921028341-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I want to know more, but monsters keep getting in our way!

0130145621029754-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This research is too important to give up now. Besides, our comrades need our help!

0130145621029755-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm always up for helping comrades.

0130145621029756-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I knew I could count on you, Comrade! Heheh.

1228142921028344-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That was amazing! I knew I could count on you.

1121192421026035-FameContents_EP1_01-.name: We've detected an unidentified flying object blipping in and out of radar range. I want to analyze it to figure out what it is, and whether it's a threat to Sky Fortress. That's where you come in!

1121192421026036-FameContents_EP1_01-.name: It's not aliens, is it? I'm not sure how I feel about aliens...

1121192421026037-FameContents_EP1_01-.name: I said "unidentified," didn't I? Our sensors aren't currently able to identify what it is or where it's from. According to our radar logs, the object has approached the ship several times, each time coming a little closer. It's almost like its getting faster.

1121192421026038-FameContents_EP1_01-.name: We won't know any more until we can get a better look at it.

1121192421026039-FameContents_EP1_01-.name: Okay. Well, I'm up for the job, but it's not like I can fly or anything.

1121192421026040-FameContents_EP1_01-.name: No worries there! At this rate, the object will catch up with us on its next approach! All you need to do is stand out on the deck and deal with whatever it is... Just wait for my signal!

1121192421026041-FameContents_EP1_01-.name: All's quite in the skies. I'll contact you by radio when we have radar contact with the object.

1121192421026042-FameContents_EP1_01-.name: Good work defending the ship! I've never seen a machine like that before... Were you able to salvage anything from it?

1121192421026043-FameContents_EP1_01-.name:
This doohickey looked important.
<font color="#909090">(You hand over what's left of the mech's flight recorder.)</font>

1121192421026044-FameContents_EP1_01-.name: Excellent work! I'll take it from here.

1121192421026045-FameContents_EP1_01-.name: What now, do we bring that to the captain?

1121192421026046-FameContents_EP1_01-.name: What are talking about? First I have to analyze it to see what it's recorded on it, and write up a report! I'm not going to bother the captain before we know what we've got.

1121192421026048-FameContents_EP1_01-.name: Hm, it looks like the data is mostly unsalvageable...

1121192421026049-FameContents_EP1_01-.name: Wait, this file from the machine's radio logs is intact! I'm going to play it.

1121192421026050-FameContents_EP1_01-.name: Hmph. Looks like I still have improvements to make to the primary rockets before we can reach the ship. CHKY, return to base.

1121192421026053-FameContents_EP1_01-.name: This could be bad... I've got to warn the captain immediately!

1121192421026055-FameContents_EP1_01-.name: This is an emergency! Out of the way!

1126133221026056-FameChallengeDungeon-.name: Are you prepared for another sparring session with me?

1126133221026057-FameChallengeDungeon-.name: Let's see how much you've improved since our last match.

1126133221026058-FameChallengeDungeon-.name: Meet me on the top deck when you're ready.

1126133221026059-FameChallengeDungeon-.name: Meet me on the top deck when you're ready.

1126133221026061-FameChallengeDungeon-.name: The more you better yourself, the better the Alliance becomes. I look forward to our next match.

1126133221026062-FameChallengeDungeon-.name: You. Me. A cage in a secret underground bunker. What do you say?

1126133221026063-FameChallengeDungeon-.name: I can't wait to give you some of my... undivided attention.

1126133221026064-FameChallengeDungeon-.name: I can't wait to give you some of my... undivided attention.

1126133221026065-FameChallengeDungeon-.name: Not bad, hot stuff. I can tell you're improving.

1126133221026066-FameChallengeDungeon-.name: But don't expect me to make things so easy for you next time.

1126133221026067-FameChallengeDungeon-.name: I hear a whispering in my soul. It can only mean one thing...

1126133221026068-FameChallengeDungeon-.name: Today is the day the oracle will speak.

1126133221026069-FameChallengeDungeon-.name: Today is the day the oracle will speak.

1126133221026072-FameChallengeDungeon-.name: We will try again in our next battle.

1126133221026074-FameChallengeDungeon-.name: I have not given up hope...

1126133221026075-FameChallengeDungeon-.name: ...that you may be the one to punish the gods!

1126133221026076-FameChallengeDungeon-.name: My upgrades are ready! This round of testing won't be like last time!

1126133221026079-FameChallengeDungeon-.name: ...All this data... So many anomalies... Thousands of errors...

1126133221026080-FameChallengeDungeon-.name: Why is it giving me different results each time?!

1126133221026081-FameChallengeDungeon-.name: You must be improving as well, $MyPCName$... I think my simulator is picking up on it...

1126133221026082-FameChallengeDungeon-.name: I need more data! I'm going to work on a patch. Help me test it out later!

1126133221026086-FameChallengeDungeon-.name: Get a load of you! You're improving, day by day!

1126133221026088-FameChallengeDungeon-.name: What a workout! Why don't we sweat it out at the sauna? Just don't mention it to the captain!

1126133221026089-FameChallengeDungeon-.name: You can visit the sauna all you wish... when you aren't on duty.

1126133221026090-FameChallengeDungeon-.name: You know I'd never slack off at work, Captain! I was joking!

1228173721028572-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This isn't good. $npcName:23001006$ is on a rampage in the $map:02020051$.

1228173721028573-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We have to do something about $npcName:23001006$ before our agents get hurt.

1228173721028574-Kritias_2018_12-.name:
Stop that monstrosity before it does even more damage!
<font color=#909090>(Once you accept this mission, you cannot begin any other weekly [Special] Gigantica missions until the weekly reset.)</font>

1228173721028576-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Have you confirmed the destruction of $npcName:23001006$?

0116160121029294-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That's unfortunate, but there was nothing you could do. We'll destroy it once and for all next time.

0116130421029228-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The medics seem really busy today.
