0116130421029229-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ah, that. Our warriors in $map:02020051$ have had another encounter with $npcName:23001006$. Their injuries have been... numerous.

1228173721028578-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our medical facilities are stretched beyond capacity. This is not a tenable situation, to be sure.

0116130421029230-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll see what I can do about it.

1228173721028579-Kritias_2018_12-.name:
Defeating that mechanical abomination would be a good start.
<font color="#909090">(Once you accept this mission, you cannot begin any other weekly [Special] Gigantica missions until the weekly reset.)</font>

1228173721028581-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I have already heard praise for your valiant performance.

0116130421029231-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $npcName:23001006$ was no minor foe, but you dispatched it with efficiency.

0116130421029232-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I will call upon you again soon.

1228173721028582-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We're in trouble! My people in the $map:02020051$ are getting attacked by $npcName:23001006$!

1228173721028583-Kritias_2018_12-.name: How are we supposed to come up with a counter strategy against such a weird enemy? I just don't have enough data!

1228173721028584-Kritias_2018_12-.name:
I beg you, $MyPCName$! Please fight it and collect as much data as you can!
<font color="#909090">(Once you accept this mission, you cannot begin any other weekly [Special] Gigantica missions until the weekly reset.)</font>

1228173721028586-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Wow, this is a huge amount of data. Thank you so much!

0116183821029391-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll put my top data analyst on it straight away!

1228173721028587-Kritias_2018_12-.name: There's no question: $npcName:11001813[gender:0]$ is behind much of the turmoil in Kritias. As long as he keeps us in the dark about his plot, he has us at a disadvantage.

1228173721028588-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We need to get to the bottom of his plans.

1228173721028589-Kritias_2018_12-.name:
Track him. Find out what $npcName:11001813[gender:0]$ and his Daemon Army are scheming.
<font color="#909090">(Once you accept this mission, you cannot begin any other weekly [Special] First Legion missions until the weekly reset.)</font>

1228173721028590-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Find out what $npcName:11001813[gender:0]$ and his Daemon Army are scheming.

1228173721028591-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Did you uncover the Daemon Army's plot?

1228173721028592-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I don't know the details, but I did what I could to stop them.

1228173721028593-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's a start. Whatever they're planning, we must make sure we're ready for them.

1228173721028595-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I sense $npcName:11001813[gender:0]$'s corruption in this land. It is particularly heavy in Kidel.

1228173721028596-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I sense that he will send his forces against us soon...

1228173721028597-Kritias_2018_12-.name:
Meet his Daemon Army in battle and uncover $npcName:11001813[gender:0]$'s plot!
<font color="#909090">(Once you accept this mission, you cannot begin any other weekly [Special] First Legion missions until the weekly reset.)</font>

1228173721028598-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Uncover what $npcName:11001813[gender:0]$ intends to do with his Daemon Army.

1228173721028599-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That Daemon Army was no joke. I think $npcName:11001813[gender:0]$ is trying to take Kritias by force.

1228173721028600-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We stopped them this time, but this isn't over.

1228173721028602-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I shall rally the Lumiknights to action. We will counter the wraith's plot.

1228173721028603-Kritias_2018_12-.name: An urgent report just came in.

1228173721028604-Kritias_2018_12-.name: These Daemon Army guys keep attacking my teams in Kidel. Wherever they go, they leave our researchers scattered and their camps ruined.

0116183821029392-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The Daemon Army could endanger our very foothold in this place!

0116183821029393-Kritias_2018_12-.name: What we need is a battle strategy. Unfortunately, we know next to nothing about these guys.

1228173721028605-Kritias_2018_12-.name:
I beg you, $MyPCName$. Fight them and collect intelligence on how they fight.
<font color="#909090">(Once you accept this mission, you cannot begin any other weekly [Special] First Legion missions until the weekly reset.)</font>

1228173721028606-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please collect data by fighting the Daemon Army.

1228173721028607-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thanks! I'll get on this data right away.

1228173721028608-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The Daemon Army is on the move.

1228173721028609-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm worried they're preparing to make a bid for all of Kritias.

1228173721028610-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Whatever they're planning, we must stop them. Intercept them before they gain too much ground.

1228173721028611-Kritias_2018_12-.name:
Be careful. This won't be an easy battle.
<font color="#909090">(Once you accept this mission, you cannot begin any other weekly [Special] Second Legion missions until the weekly reset.)</font>

1228173721028612-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You haven't left yet? Attack before the Daemon Army can gain any ground!

1228173721028613-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That was a tough battle. Where is $npcName:11001813[gender:0]$ getting his troops from?

1228173721028614-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well, that's not important. The important thing is that we continue to beat them.

1228173721028615-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $npcName:11001813[gender:0]$'s Daemon Army has resumed their grim march forward.

1228173721028618-Kritias_2018_12-.name:
Do what you can to weaken the Daemon Army.
<font color="#909090">(Once you accept this mission, you cannot begin any other weekly [Special] Second Legion missions until the weekly reset.)</font>

1228173721028619-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We've little time to waste. The Daemon Army must be weakened.

1228173721028620-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I stopped them this time, but this isn't over. Not yet.

1228173721028621-Kritias_2018_12-.name: An astute observation, $MyPCName$. I shall take it under consideration.

1228173721028622-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ugh! All of these reports are the same... A specter wearing a ragged cape shows up, says something ominous, and vanishes...

0116183821029394-Kritias_2018_12-.name: After all this time, we still know almost nothing about $npcName:11001813[gender:0]$. How?!

0116183821029395-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well, I intend to change that. $npcName:11001813[gender:0]$ and his forces have been spotted in Kidel.

0116183821029396-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $npcName:11001813[gender:0]$ is a Category 1 threat. We can't leave ourselves in the dark when it comes to him, right?

1228173721028623-Kritias_2018_12-.name: So, if we can't get any information by tracking him...

0116183821029397-Kritias_2018_12-.name: ...I say we go through his minions!

1228173721028624-Kritias_2018_12-.name:
Fight the Daemon Army and learn everything we can. Surely one of them can shed some light on $npcName:11001813[gender:0]$!
<font color="#909090">(If you accept the quest, you cannot being any other weekly legion battle quests until the weekly reset.)</font>

1228173721028625-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Fight the Daemon Army and learn everything we can. Surely one of them can shed some light on $npcName:11001813[gender:0]$!

1228173721028626-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Oh no... None of this data sheds any light on $npcName:11001813[gender:0]$ at all!

1228173721028627-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Oh well. We've just got to keep trying!

1228160921028347-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Scouts in the field report that $npcName:11004430[gender:0]$ continues to turn monsters to his side.

0107133121028669-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I don't know how he's doing it, but that's not important right now.

0107133121028671-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We must destroy his minions, as well as any monsters we think might fall for under his thrall.

0107133121028672-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to defeat $npcNamePlural:25020001$ in $map:02020029$, $npcNamePlural:25020205$ in $map:02020031$, and $npcNamePlural:25020106$ in $map:02020030$.

0107134421028674-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That's good. They will return... but we will be ready.

1228160921028350-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The enemy forces seem to have no end. It's only a matter of time before Sky Fortress is overwhelmed.

0107134421028675-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If we are going to salvage this operation, then we all need to help out.

0107134421028677-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I expected no less. Eliminate $npcNamePlural:25020002$ in $map:02020029$ and $npcNamePlural:25020206$ in $map:02020031$.

1228160921028352-Kritias_2018_12-.name: My scouts have already reported your progress. You deserve a commendation.

0107134421028678-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Take a rest for now. I'll have more missions for you soon.

1228160921028353-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We received an call for help from Humanitas. They're outnumbered and outgunned by the enemy.

0107153121028679-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I don't have any regular forces to send to them. I'll need to call on a specialist...

0107153121028681-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That would be best. You've worked with them before, after all.

0107153121028682-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Help Humanitas by defeating $npcNamePlural:25020306$ in $map:02020006$, $npcNamePlural:25020406$ in $map:02020004$, and $npcNamePlural:25020506$ in $map:02020001$.

1228160921028354-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Help Humanitas by defeating $npcNamePlural:25020306$ in $map:02020006$, $npcNamePlural:25020406$ in $map:02020004$, and $npcNamePlural:25020506$ in $map:02020001$.

1228160921028355-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Humanitas sent us thanks for your work.

0107153121028683-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our alliance survived today thanks to you. Well done.

1228160921028356-Kritias_2018_12-.name: A call for help came from Humanitas. They're struggling to hold off the monsters in $map:02020004$ and $map:02020001$.

0107153121028684-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We can't sit by and watch our ally suffer. Will you go to their aid?

0107153121028686-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I knew you would say that. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020403$ in $map:02020004$ and $npcNamePlural:25020507$ in $map:02020001$.

1228160921028358-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Humanitas sent their thanks for your help.

0107153121028687-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They've asked for you by name in any future missions.

1228160921028359-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, I have a bit of a personal request.

0107153121028689-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You can say anything to me, Captain.

0107153121028690-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The swordsmanship used here in Kritias is strange to me. I'd like to learn about their fighting style for myself.

0107153121028691-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That's why I'd like you to fight them for me. Through you, I can learn their techniques.

0107153121028693-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I wish to know about $npcNamePlural:25020602$ in $map:02020010$, $npcNamePlural:25020802$ in $map:02020034$, and $npcNamePlural:25021004$ in $map:02020016$.

1228160921028360-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I wish to know about $npcNamePlural:25020602$ in $map:02020010$, $npcNamePlural:25020802$ in $map:02020034$, and $npcNamePlural:25021004$ in $map:02020016$.

0107153121028694-Kritias_2018_12-.name: <font color="#909090">(You attempt to demonstrate the sword techniques you encountered.)</font>

0107153121028695-Kritias_2018_12-.name: ...This will take some time. Thank you anyway.

1228160921028362-Kritias_2018_12-.name: While I have no issue facing a gunman with my swords, many of our crewmen are not warriors. We must learn the enemy's gun tactics so that we can teach our crew how to avoid their attacks.

0107160121028696-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I don't trust anyone but you with this task. Will you study the enemy's gun technique?

1228160921028364-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Good work, $MyPCName$. I'll send your data on to our field operatives.

0107160121028699-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Of course, we'll need more data in the future. I'll speak with you then.

1228160921028365-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This is unacceptable. I will court-martial whatever officer was responsible for this!

0107160121028701-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Yes! $map:02020051$, $map:02020017$, and $map:02020003$ are some of the most hotly-contested zones in Kritias.

0107160121028702-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They form fronts on the civil war between this land's factions. Only our veteran agents are cleared for duty there.

0107160121028703-Kritias_2018_12-.name: And yet, somehow, our latest batch of recruits were shipped out there instead. They aren't ready for that level of action.

0107160121028704-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I need you to get there and defeat $npcNamePlural:25021106$ in $map:02020051$, $npcNamePlural:25021202$ in $map:02020017$, and $npcNamePlural:25021502$ in $map:02020003$. If you don't, our recruits won't be coming home.

1228160921028366-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I need you to get there and defeat $npcNamePlural:25021106$ in $map:02020051$, $npcNamePlural:25021202$ in $map:02020017$, and $npcNamePlural:25021502$ in $map:02020003$. If you don't, our recruits won't be coming home.

1228160921028367-Kritias_2018_12-.name: My soldiers are safely in their barracks, thanks to you. And I've taken steps to ensure that this does not happen again.

0107160121028705-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Unfortunately, I haven't been able to determine who sent the order to the wrong squad. If this happens again... I know who to turn to.

1228160921028368-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've received an alarming report from the field.

0107160121028706-Kritias_2018_12-.name: New enemies in heavy armor have appeared. They've openly attacked our forces and are delaying our operations. Are you ready to strike back against them?

0107161521028708-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Take care of $npcNamePlural:25021205$ in $map:02020017$ and $npcNamePlural:25021406$ in $map:02020014$.

1228160921028369-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Take care of $npcNamePlural:25021205$ in $map:02020017$ and $npcNamePlural:25021406$ in $map:02020014$.

1228160921028370-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You returned safely. Are you hurt?

0107161521028710-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm fine, but you should see the other guys!

0107161521028711-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thanks to your quick work, our agents were able to continue their work. Well done.

1228160921028371-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $map:02020018$, $map:02020037$, and $map:02020035$ are major choke points on the main routes through Kritias.

0107161521028712-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It seems that Tairen is well aware of this fact. They've fortified their positions there.

0107161521028713-Kritias_2018_12-.name: An outright battle is inevitable. I want you to make the first strike.

0107161521028715-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Very good. Take care of $npcNamePlural:25021703$ in $map:02020018$, $npcNamePlural:25022105$ in $map:02020037$, and $npcNamePlural:25021905$ in $map:02020035$.

1228160921028372-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Take care of $npcNamePlural:25021703$ in $map:02020018$, $npcNamePlural:25022105$ in $map:02020037$, and $npcNamePlural:25021905$ in $map:02020035$.

1228160921028373-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You've created enough of an opening for our scouts to get through.

0107161521028716-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's only a matter of time before we strike out for the furthest reaches of Kritias.

1228160921028374-Kritias_2018_12-.name: My cartography team tells me that $map:02020018$ and $map:02020037$ are the gateway to the furthest reaches of Kritias.

0107162121028717-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Of course, our enemies have fortified their positions there.

0107162121028718-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Open the way for us by defeating $npcNamePlural:25021702$ in $map:02020018$ and $npcNamePlural:25022102$ in $map:02020037$.

1228160921028375-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Open the way for us by defeating $npcNamePlural:25021702$ in $map:02020018$ and $npcNamePlural:25022102$ in $map:02020037$.

1228160921028376-Kritias_2018_12-.name: My people tell me that the threats in those areas are gone. They will return someday, but we will defeat them again.

0107162121028719-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm counting on your help in extending our reach in Kritias.

1228160921028377-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $npcName:11004315[gender:1]$ tells me that she needs to study pacified monsters in order to understand them.

0107164521028726-Kritias_2018_12-.name: No, no, it's fine. I'll pass this on to the researchers.

1228160921028380-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our research into the creatures of Kritias continues.

0107164521028727-Kritias_2018_12-.name: My tactical officer has a working hypothesis, but she needs more samples for analysis.

1228160921028382-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It does look strange. Perhaps this will prove the researchers' theory.

0107164521028729-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thank you. We'll see to this creature's return to the wild when we're done.

1228160921028383-Kritias_2018_12-.name: My scouts report a monster in $map:02020001$ that almost looks like it could be from Maple World.

0107165421028730-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This could be an important discovery. I trust you'll go there for yourself?

0107165421028734-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It doesn't walk on all fours?

0107165421028736-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Never mind. It seems my scout was mistaken.

0107165421028737-Kritias_2018_12-.name: My researchers will make sure the creature gets home when we're done with it. Take a rest until your next mission.

1228160921028386-Kritias_2018_12-.name: My research team needs another sample. A $item:61000161$, this time.

0107170221028738-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They won't tell me why they need this creature, but I think it won't be hard for you to find one.

0107170221028739-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It'll be a piece of cake.

1228160921028388-Kritias_2018_12-.name: My research team won't be quiet about the creature. Do you have it?

0107170221028742-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I can hear them cheering from here. I'll tell you what results they achieve... just as soon as they tell me what it is they're doing.

1228160921028389-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We've been here for some time. You must have encountered the leshies by now.

0107171321028743-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Unlike the other monsters of Kritias, they don't have any aetherine in their bodies. Instead, they wear aetherine around their neck and draw power from that.

0107171321028744-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I wonder... could my soldiers learn to use $itemPlural:30001303$?

0107171321028747-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Good work. Hopefully our researchers can find a way to use these without hurting themselves too much.

1228160921028392-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The research team asked me to send you their thanks. They've made a lot of progress because of you.

0107173421028749-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Of course, their thanks came with a request for more help. They need $itemPlural:61000164$.

0107173421028750-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I can count on you, can't I? You can capture $itemPlural:61000164$ in $map:02020051$.

1228160921028394-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Is that it? It certainly is... unique.

0107173421028751-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll send them to the researchers. Thank you, $MyPCName$.

1228160921028395-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll keep this brief. Our research team needs another test subject.

0107173421028752-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They've requested a $item:61000165$ from $map:02020033$. In spite of its name, it's apparently less aggressive than the other monsters of Kritias. They want to know why.

1228160921028397-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That was quick. The researchers should be happy.

0107173421028755-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I will send the $item:61000165$ to the team. If they need anything more, I will let you know.

1228160921028398-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You know what the research team needs, don't you?

0107200521028756-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They need me to capture a monster.

0107200521028758-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Correct. They tell me that they're nearing the end of their research.

0107200521028759-Kritias_2018_12-.name: What monster do they need this time?

0107200521028760-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They need monsters. Tamed monsters that they can experiment on.

0107200521028764-Kritias_2018_12-.name: ...Are there no monsters that walk on all fours?

0114142721029073-Kritias_2018_12-.name: There's one like this that walks on all fours.

0114142721029077-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I do not believe the captain likes that monster.

0114142721029078-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Pitiable creature. I shall take it with me.

0114142721029079-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Let's send the $item:61000170$ to the research team, first.

0114142721029080-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll take a look at that insect... that monster later. Good job.

1228160921028401-Kritias_2018_12-.name: My research team tells me that they've learned a great deal about the monsters of Kritias. However...

0107202221028766-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We apparently still know very little about $itemPlural:61000166$. If you capture one from $map:02020018$, the research team would be ecstatic.

0107202221028767-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It'll be a piece of cake.

1228160921028402-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If you capture one from $map:02020018$, the research team would be ecstatic.

1228160921028403-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The research team has been eagerly—and persistently—awaiting your return.

0107202221028769-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll send this creature on to them. When we're done, we'll release it back into the wild.

1228160921028404-Kritias_2018_12-.name: My researchers have been asking when you'd return.

0107205121028770-Kritias_2018_12-.name: What do they want me to catch this time?

0107205121028771-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The team wants to analyze a $item:61000169$ from $map:02020037$.

1228160921028405-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The research team wants to analyze a $item:61000169$ from $map:02020037$.

1228160921028406-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That was quick. Was it difficult?

0107205121028775-Kritias_2018_12-.name: So you say. Take a moment to rest before you go on your next mission.

1228160921028407-Kritias_2018_12-.name: My research team is on edge. Every time I check on the lab, it's a tangle of shouting scientists and spilled beakers.

0107211221028776-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Let me explain the rest, Captain. I could use a little face time with $MyPCName$. You see, one of the researchers was burning the midnight oil and accidentally let a test subject go.

0107211221028777-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've already found the culprit, but the team is short a specimen. While I get to work... disciplining the naughty researcher, I want you to catch a replacement monster for them.

0107211221028778-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They just need one measly $item:61000163$. You can find them in $map:02020009$.

1228160921028408-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You need to capture a $item:61000163$ in $map:02020009$.

1228160921028409-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It appears you've captured the monster.

0107211221028779-Kritias_2018_12-.name: My intelligence officer assures me that this won't be a problem again. Thank you both.

1228160921028410-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our monster research continues. The monster for today is a $item:61000168$ from $map:02020008$.

0107211221028780-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The researchers are especially interested in this specimen, since it's surprisingly gentle for its size.

0114142721029082-Kritias_2018_12-.name: By the skin of my teeth, I did.

1228160921028412-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Are you sure this is it?

0107211221028781-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Did I catch the wrong monster...?

0114142721029084-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This isn't the monster the researchers described...

0107211221028783-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll pass this along to the researchers...

1228160921028413-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You've been to $map:02020029$, haven't you? Our scouts believe that monsters are drawing aetherine from there.

0107212521028784-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They discovered a strange pit in the area. Unfortunately, they couldn't get close enough to investigate further.

0107212521028785-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The monsters shouldn't pose much of a problem for you. I'd like you to look into it.

1228160921028414-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I want to know what's in that pit.

0107212521028786-Kritias_2018_12-.name: There's a cave filled with aetherine ore there.

0107212521028787-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Indeed? I'll send a party out there right away.

1228160921028416-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The $npcName:25020302$ population in $map:02020006$ is on the rise. We can't afford to keep fighting them with conventional tactics.

0107212521028790-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You're going to enter their habitat and do something about it.

0107212521028791-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You're going to destroy their eggs.

0107212521028792-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We have no choice in this. Our scouts are in danger. Enter the $npcName:25020302$ habitat in $map:02020006$ and get rid of the eggs.

1228160921028417-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Enter the $npcName:25020302$ habitat in $map:02020006$ and get rid of the eggs.

1228160921028418-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It was no doubt a difficult mission. Good work.

0107212521028794-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Yes. The safety of the crew is important.

1228160921028419-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We've received an emergency communique from Humanitas in $map:02020033$.

0107213221028795-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They need help from our engineer corps, but I don't have the men to spare. That means that you're going in their place.

0107213221028796-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's they're blasted cannons! The dang things aren't firing. Why don't you head out there and fix 'em up?\

0107213221028797-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's be a piece of cake for my cadet. BAHAHAHA!

0107213221028799-Kritias_2018_12-.name: There's no time to waste. Go to $map:02020033$ and do what you can for their cannons.

1228160921028420-Kritias_2018_12-.name: There's no time to waste. Go to $map:02020033$ and do what you can for their cannons.

1228160921028421-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Humanitas had a lot of great things to say about your work at $map:02020033$.

0107213221028800-Kritias_2018_12-.name: My trust was well placed, as always.

0107214421028802-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's this place. Kritias. A dire aura runs deep through it.

0107214421028803-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The darkness is especially thick in $map:02020029$, $map:02020030$, and $map:02020031$. We must hasten to action.

0107214421028804-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Restore order by slaying $npcNamePlural:25020005$ in $map:02020029$, $npcNamePlural:25020104$ in $map:02020030$, and $npcNamePlural:25020202$ in $map:02020031$.

1228160921028423-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Restore order by slaying $npcNamePlural:25020005$ in $map:02020029$, $npcNamePlural:25020104$ in $map:02020030$, and $npcNamePlural:25020202$ in $map:02020031$.

1228160921028424-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I feel as though a weight has lifted. Sky Fortress is warded against evil for another day.

0107214421028805-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Of course, this peace won't last long. When the time comes, I shall call upon you again.

1228160921028425-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It is good to see you again, my loyal subject.

0107214421028807-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I took counsel with the oracle yesterday. We must defeat the forces of darkness to avert a great disaster in Kritias.

0107214421028809-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Verily! Away, to defeat $npcNamePlural:25020105$ in $map:02020030$ and $npcNamePlural:25020004$ in $map:02020029$... before it's too late!

1228160921028426-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020105$ in $map:02020030$ and $npcNamePlural:25020004$ in $map:02020029$... before it's too late!

1228160921028427-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thanks to your swift action, we may yet live to see another day.

0107214421028810-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I shall contact you when next the oracle speaks to me.

1228160921028428-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Should I despise them? No! It is my pity that they deserve!

0107215221028812-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Do not wave your ignorance brazenly in my face. I speak, of course, of the monsters whose souls have been twisted by corruption. Can you not hear them cry out in pain?

0107215221028814-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We cannot allow this to go on. Lay to rest the $npcNamePlural:25020306$ in $map:02020006$, $npcNamePlural:25020402$ in $map:02020004$, and $npcNamePlural:25020503$ in $map:02020001$!

1228160921028429-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Lay to rest the $npcNamePlural:25020306$ in $map:02020006$, $npcNamePlural:25020402$ in $map:02020004$, and $npcNamePlural:25020503$ in $map:02020001$!

1228160921028430-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The cries of the darned have ceased. A tragedy, and yet a relief!

0107215221028815-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I pray that they rest in peace.

1228160921028431-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You've arrived at just the right time. It seems our psychic connection has been firmly reestablished!

0107215921028816-Kritias_2018_12-.name: My many agents have reported of strange creatures in $map:02020006$. And their descriptions are...

0107215921028818-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I don't like where you're going with this.

0107215921028819-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I must know more. Travel to $map:02020006$ and carefully observe $npcNamePlural:25020307$ and $npcNamePlural:25020305$.

1228160921028432-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Travel to $map:02020006$ and carefully observe $npcNamePlural:25020307$ and $npcNamePlural:25020305$.

0107215921028821-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hm. Your observation is as useless as it is blind to the greater mysteries of the other world.

0107215921028822-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll be more specific next time I ask for your help.

1228160921028434-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's wrong. The strategy is all wrong.

0107220721028823-Kritias_2018_12-.name: What are you going on about?

0107220721028824-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Do you not see? We will never win if we devote all of our efforts to fighting wave after wave of underlings!

0107220721028825-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I believe, however, that if we target the leaders, we have a chance. I'd do it myself, but it would be too great of a risk to unleash my power on the battlefield.

0107220721028826-Kritias_2018_12-.name: But you... Yes, you can be my implement of precisely-honed violence! Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020606$ in $map:02020010$, $npcNamePlural:25020806$ in $map:02020034$, and $npcNamePlural:25021006$ in $map:02020016$.

1228160921028435-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You can be my implement of precisely-honed violence! Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020606$ in $map:02020010$, $npcNamePlural:25020806$ in $map:02020034$, and $npcNamePlural:25021006$ in $map:02020016$.

1228160921028436-Kritias_2018_12-.name: So? Have we begun to make real progress?

0107220721028827-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well, I accomplished something out there.

0107220721028828-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That you did, my friend. That you did.

1228160921028437-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We must discuss many dire things today, $MyPCName$. I hope you are prepared.

0107221421028830-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I have eyes on the forces of Kharon, and I have witnessed attempts to liaise with the Daemon Army. They are exchanging information.

0107221421028832-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We cannot have that, can we? Let us punish them. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25020603$ and $npcNamePlural:25020703$.

0107221421028835-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It is fortunate, then, that we nipped this alliance in the bud.

1228160921028440-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The researchers of Sky Fortress have drawn a connection between an unhealthy blue glow and aetherine in the body.

0107222021028836-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's a curious idea. Don't you want to learn more for yourself?

0107222021028838-Kritias_2018_12-.name: As you should be! Let's begin by performing field autopsies on $npcNamePlural:25021101$ in $map:02020051$, $npcNamePlural:25021204$ in $map:02020017$, and $npcNamePlural:25021501$ in $map:02020003$.

0107222021028839-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You know how to perform a field autopsy, do you not? Strike your subject with vigor and see if aetherine comes out.

1228160921028441-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Perform field autopsies on $npcNamePlural:25021101$ in $map:02020051$, $npcNamePlural:25021204$ in $map:02020017$, and $npcNamePlural:25021501$ in $map:02020003$.

0107222021028841-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Were the researcher mistaken? We'll have to perform more autopsies...

1228160921028443-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Guns... Is there any weapon so inelegant, so detached from the true potency of the soul, as a gun?

0107222821028842-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Nonetheless, I must know every facet of the enemies we face. We must conduct research into the gun-wielders of this land.

0107222821028843-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Let's begin with $npcNamePlural:25021103$ in $map:02020051$ and $npcNamePlural:25021407$ in $map:02020014$.

0107222821028844-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Why do you linger? Your task awaits!

1228160921028445-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Those soulless gunslingers were beneath you, I assume. You can defeat them with your eyes closed, can you not?

0107222821028845-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Sure, but maybe I'll keep my eyes open, anyway.

0107222821028846-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Your lack of conviction is disturbing. We'll have to work on that, won't we?

1228160921028446-Kritias_2018_12-.name: My informants tell me that Kharon and the Daemon Army persist in their foolish alliance.

0107223421028847-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We must be more active in discouraging them.

0107223421028848-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Cut the lines between them by defeating $npcNamePlural:25021904$ in $map:02020035$, $npcNamePlural:25022005$ in $map:02020036$, and $npcNamePlural:25021602$ in $map:02020009$.

1228160921028447-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Cut the lines between them by defeating $npcNamePlural:25021904$ in $map:02020035$, $npcNamePlural:25022005$ in $map:02020036$, and $npcNamePlural:25021602$ in $map:02020009$.

0107223421028849-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This should put their alliance on hold.

0107223421028850-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well done. I knew I could count on you.

1228160921028449-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've had some time to contemplate the challenges that face us in this strange land, and I've reached a conclusion.

0107223921028852-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our greatest hope for surviving this place is the quick and complete destruction of the Daemon Army.

0107223921028853-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Take a step towards this goal by vanquishing $npcNamePlural:25021903$ in $map:02020035$ and $npcNamePlural:25022001$ in $map:02020036$.

1228160921028450-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Take a step towards this goal by vanquishing $npcNamePlural:25021903$ in $map:02020035$ and $npcNamePlural:25022001$ in $map:02020036$.

1228160921028451-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I can sense the Daemon Army's power waning from here.

0107223921028854-Kritias_2018_12-.name: With your skills and my insight, peace will come soon.

1228160921028452-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The Lumiknights take a keen interest in the culture and wildlife of Kritias. By studying how our worlds are different, we can learn more about Maple World.

0108093321028855-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The robotic insects, in particular, stand out to me. It seems they're only to be found in $map:02020029$.

0108093321028856-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to $map:02020029$ and find out who made these mechanical insects, whether they're truly alive, and what their purpose is.

0108093321028857-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Do you want me to bring them back?

0108093321028858-Kritias_2018_12-.name: No. I'll leave the actual seeing and touching to you.

1228160921028453-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to $map:02020029$ and find out who made these mechanical insects, whether they're truly alive, and what their purpose is.

0108093321028859-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I don't know who made them, but they're kind of cute.

0108093321028860-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That's hardly helpful. Thanks anyway, I suppose.

1228160921028455-Kritias_2018_12-.name: But why would they all gather in such a place?

0108094521028862-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $map:02020030$. $npcNamePlural:25020104$ are swarming there, and I don't know why.

0108094521028863-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Could it be the dark crystals that are in that place?

0108094521028864-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I must know more. Go to $map:02020030$ and gather the crystals there.

1228160921028456-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to $map:02020030$ and gather the crystal fragments there.

1228160921028457-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I feel a dark aura coming from you. You must be carrying the crystals.

0108094521028865-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Perhaps these will reveal to me the weakness of the Daemon Army...

1228160921028458-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Humanitas is embroiled in a longstanding battle that I'd rather not get involved in, no matter what you or the captain say.

0108094521028866-Kritias_2018_12-.name: However, what's done is done, and it would be dishonorable to turn our backs on them now.

0108094521028868-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The transmission tower in $map:02020030$ is under attack by monsters. It seems the fence was broken by those monsters and needs to be repaired.

0110191221029050-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please repair the fence. That should keep it safe... For a time, at least.

1228160921028459-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please repair the fence around $map:02020030$'s transmission tower. That should keep it safe... For a time, at least.

1228160921028460-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Humanitas sent us their thanks. I'm still dubious of our alliance, but at least we've done some good here.

0108094521028869-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thank you. I'll send for you when I have more work.

1228160921028461-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This world is full of strange ore. Perhaps too much for our research team to handle. I've noticed they're making more and more mistakes...

0108103521028870-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I would never make such mistakes, of course, but I recognize that not everyone can be me. I would like to do something to help them.

0108103521028871-Kritias_2018_12-.name: To that end, I want you to go to $map:02020031$ and examine the ore there.

0108103521028872-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I thought you were going to help them.

0108103521028873-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Absolutely not! Were I to put myself to this task, I'd complete it so quickly that all of the researchers would die of shame. We cannot have that.

1228160921028462-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Begin by examining the ore in $map:02020031$.

1228160921028463-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Excellent news! The researchers were enheartened by your help.

0108103521028874-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They didn't have the nicest things to say about the quality of the help, but it seems you've inspired them to redouble their efforts. Well done!

1228160921028464-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I didn't expect to find so much diversity in the wildlife here. There's something more to Kritias than meets the eye if such creatures can survive in such an environment.

0108103521028875-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Perhaps it's something in the water. Water is the source of life, you see.

0108103521028877-Kritias_2018_12-.name: While the ship's researchers are looking into various metals and creatures, I've turned my attention to analyzing the water.

0108103521028878-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I placed false plants in $map:02020001$ to gather data. Head there and see if there are any new records worth reviewing.

1228160921028465-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Head to $map:02020001$ and see if there are any new records worth reviewing.

0108103521028880-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That's all...? Sigh. Thank you anyway...

1228160921028467-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Sky Fortress has been anchored in Kritias for some time. It's not meant to be at dock for so long.

0108104321028881-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Why not fly it around, then?

0108104321028882-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If we're in the sky for too long, the enemy starts deploying missiles. We have safe harbor here, but we don't exactly have free rein of the continent.

0108104321028883-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Of course, Sky Fortress must be ready to launch at a moment's notice. That means we can't slack off on regular maintenance.

0108104321028884-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, please inspect Sky Fortress to make sure it's in flying condition.

1228160921028468-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please inspect Sky Fortress to make sure it's in flying condition.

1228160921028469-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Were there any issues with Sky Fortress?

0108104321028885-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's a little dusty, but the engines still work.

0108104321028886-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That's a relief. I'll call upon you again soon.

0108111321028894-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This is about that, erm, that red fruit. You know. The one from Maple World...

0108111321028897-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You're hearing things, Vanguard Captain! You're simply hearing things...

0108111321028898-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hmph. The altitude must be messing with my hearing...

0108111321028899-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Keep your voice down, $MyPCName$. According to my research, they have $itemPlural:30000232$ in Kritias, too. It's the same as the cherries in Maple World in every way. Every way.

0108111321028900-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I need it. For my, er, my research, you see! Quickly... and discreetly... gather some $itemPlural:30000232$ for me.

1228160921028474-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Quickly... and discreetly... gather some $itemPlural:30000232$ for me.

1228160921028475-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'd recognize that smell anywhere. I'll put this to good use!

0108111321028902-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Isn't that what I said? Leave me to my cherries, $male:man,female:woman$.

1228160921028476-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We have no shortage of injured soldiers. That is nothing new. However, it's difficult to ship enough medical supplies from the empire.

0110191221029051-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Do not ask me how he discovered this, but one of my knights learned that a local herb called $item:30001299$ is an effective painkiller. That plant it comes from slumbers in $map:02020032$.

0108123621028903-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $item:30001299$ can only be harvested when the $npcName:25020705$ is sleeping.

0108123621028904-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please examine the $npcName:25020705$ in $map:02020032$ and harvest some $item:30001299$.

1228160921028477-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please examine the $npcName:25020705$ in $map:02020032$ and harvest some $item:30001299$.

1228160921028478-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Yes, this should be enough. For now, at least.

0108123621028905-Kritias_2018_12-.name: At least now I know who I can ask when we need more.

1228160921028470-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Do you recall the robot soldiers that $npcName:11004430[gender:0]$ hacked? Our researchers were inspired by him and started experimenting with the same techniques.

0108111321028887-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It took many sleepless nights, but they managed to finally capture and hack some of those robots for themselves.

0108111321028889-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The hacking isn't precise, unfortunately. The robots require constant adjustment to keep them in line.

0108111321028890-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I think it would be a good idea for you to check in with the lab and see if they have any updates.

1228160921028471-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I think it would be a good idea for you to check in with the lab and see if they have any updates.

0108111321028891-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's not smooth sailing, but they're managing.

0108111321028892-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I see. I'll keep a close watch over the project.

1228160921028479-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The rafflesia of $map:02020013$ poison everything around them. It's made the $npcNamePlural:11004342[gender:0]$ there very angry.

0108124521028906-Kritias_2018_12-.name: As a templar, I can't sit by and watch these creatures suffer. They must be relieved of their anger!

0108124521028907-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to $map:02020013$ and pacify the angry poings.

1228160921028480-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to $map:02020013$ and pacify the angry poings.

0108124521028909-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I shall take your word for it. Thank you, $MyPCName$.

1228160921028482-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Have you ever been to $map:02020014$? I'm told there are magnificent cherry blossom trees there.

0108125321028910-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Cherry blossoms on a backdrop of machines... I would like blossoms from such a tree. Can you retrieve some for me?

0108125321028912-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Do not make me ask again. Please.

0108125321028914-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You have my gratitude. The $itemPlural:30001300$ can be found in $map:02020014$.

0108125321028917-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's for me! I needed something beautiful to go along with my radiant brilliance.

1228160921028485-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $map:02020014$ is a treasure trove of information about Kritias. It provides a microcosm of ecologies for our researchers to pour over.

0108130121028918-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Unfortunately, we've lost contact with our researchers there. I'm worried for their safety.

0108130121028919-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to $map:02020014$ and ensure their safety.

1228160921028486-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to $map:02020014$ and ensure their safety.

0108130121028920-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Let's just say that they're safe and busy with research.

0108130121028922-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I suppose I shall have to get a more thorough report directly from them.

1228160921028488-Kritias_2018_12-.name: One of our scouts has found what appears to be a waspling breeding ground.

0108131821028923-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's in the north of the $map:02020017$. We need to examine these creatures so we can learn how to better fight the wasplings.

0108131821028924-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I want you to secure the location.

1228160921028489-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I want you to secure the location.

1228160921028490-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Were you able to secure the area?

0108131821028925-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well, it's about as secure as I can make it.

0108131821028926-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I see. Perhaps I should send a templar escort with the researchers...

1228160921028491-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Have you ever visited $map:02020018$? It's at a much higher altitude than anywhere else in Kritias.

0108131821028927-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Unlike the rest of this place, it seems almost untouched by technology. Perhaps that's why a unique plant grows only there—the Tiaman Sky Herb.

0108131821028928-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Every morning, $item:30001301$ gathers on this herb. I want you to retrieve some.

0108131821028930-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Interesting. I can sense a unique vibration from this dew... I will let you know if anything interesting comes of it.

1228160921028494-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've received an interesting report. It seems that the plants in $map:02020037$ have an unusually high aetherine content.

0108133521028931-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I need not tell you that aetherine is an extremely valuable power source. I wonder if there's some way we could extract a useful amount from these plants.

0108133521028932-Kritias_2018_12-.name: As you might imagine, I intend to assign this task to you.

0108133521028933-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to $map:02020037$ and pick some flowers.

1228160921028495-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to $map:02020037$ and pick some flowers.

1228160921028496-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hm. At a glance, I sense nothing remarkable about these $itemPlural:30001302$.

0108133521028934-Kritias_2018_12-.name: All the same, this warrants a closer analysis. I'll call upon you again soon.

1228160921028497-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Isn't Kritias great? So, so great. So many things to learn. Some might say too many things, but not me! No, I love pouring over pages and pages and pages and pages of data...

0108160921028935-Kritias_2018_12-.name: For instance, we need to know more about the local monsters. We can't have them eating our scouts, after all.

0108160921028936-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'd like you to look into the monsters that live close to us. Doesn't that sound exciting?

0110191221029054-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please fight the $npcNamePlural:25020003$ in $map:02020029$, $npcNamePlural:25020103[gender:0]$ in $map:02020030$, and $npcNamePlural:25020203$ in $map:02020031$. Come back when you've got enough data!

1228160921028498-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please fight the $npcNamePlural:25020003$ in $map:02020029$, $npcNamePlural:25020103[gender:0]$ in $map:02020030$, and $npcNamePlural:25020203$ in $map:02020031$. Come back when you've got enough data!

1228160921028499-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Good job! This data will make a huge difference to our teams out in the field. Just as soon as I get around to analyzing it...

0108160921028937-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please be careful out there. We're all counting on you, after all!

1228160921028500-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We really don't have much data on the various hostile entities of this land. Some of our scouts say they've run into some really weird bad guys, but I don't have anyone free to check them out.

0108160921028938-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ugh! What if they get away before we can study them?

0108160921028939-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I could help, if you like.

0108160921028940-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Would you really?! The hostiles in question are the $npcNamePlural:25020101[gender:0]$ in $map:02020030$ and $npcNamePlural:25020201$ in $map:02020031$!

0108160921028941-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Keep your eyes peeled for anything that makes these enemies special or unique. I'm so lucky I have you, $MyPCName$!

1228160921028501-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The foes you're investigating are the $npcNamePlural:25020101[gender:0]$ in $map:02020030$ and $npcNamePlural:25020201$ in $map:02020031$.

0108160921028942-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They seemed like regular bad guys to me.

0108160921028943-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Was my scout wrong? Hm. I won't give up yet! Not when there's a chance I could discover a really freaky monster!

1228160921028503-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I was just thinking about you, $MyPCName$. I need your help.

0108160921028945-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It seems like we can't send anyone to $map:02020004$, $map:02020001$, or $map:02020006$ without them getting terribly hurt. Our people there need help, but how can I send them supplies with all those monsters around?

0108160921028946-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please defeat the $npcNamePlural:25020405[gender:0]$ in $map:02020004$, $npcNamePlural:25020502$ in $map:02020001$, and $npcNamePlural:25020303$ in $map:02020006$ so I can get help to the people who need it.

1228160921028504-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please defeat the $npcNamePlural:25020405[gender:0]$ in $map:02020004$, $npcNamePlural:25020502$ in $map:02020001$, and $npcNamePlural:25020303$ in $map:02020006$ so I can get help to the people who need it.

1228160921028505-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thanks to you, our people in the field can breathe a little easier.

0108160921028947-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I don't know when more monsters will crop up, but I know who to turn to when they do.

0108160921028949-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've got a new hypothesis, and I need your help to prove it before $npcName:11004316[gender:0]$ swoops in and steals the credit!

0108160921028950-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I was up all night working on this, too. Okay, tell me what you think: the blue monsters of Kritias all have something in common!

0108160921028951-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's a brilliant hypothesis, I know, but I need your help to prove it. Please investigate $npcNamePlural:25020302$ in $map:02020006$ and $npcNamePlural:25020505$ in $map:02020001$!

0108160921028952-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I didn't really see anything connecting them...

0108160921028953-Kritias_2018_12-.name: No way! All right, time for another all-nighter. I'll stump that stupid templar yet...

1228160921028509-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Maybe you've noticed that we're a little... overwhelmed. I've been having people run all over the continent studying things at random. I think we might have an easier time if we brought some order to this chaos.

0108160921028954-Kritias_2018_12-.name: So I'm setting up categories of monsters for you to investigate. Let's start with the weirdly-shaped robot category!

0108160921028955-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please fight $npcNamePlural:25020605$ in $map:02020010$, $npcNamePlural:25020807$ in $map:02020034$, and $npcNamePlural:25021001$ in $map:02020016$ to find out how they can move with such weird shapes.

1228160921028510-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please fight $npcNamePlural:25020605$ in $map:02020010$, $npcNamePlural:25020807$ in $map:02020034$, and $npcNamePlural:25021001$ in $map:02020016$.

0108160921028956-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They were as weird as you said they would be.

0108160921028957-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Wonderful! Also... that wasn't as useful as I thought it would be! Maybe I need to reconsider my categories...

0108160921028958-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well, I'm not giving up yet!

1228160921028512-Kritias_2018_12-.name: When we first got here, I thought that Kritias was a land of machines. But it turns out there are lots of interesting creatures living here, too!

0108160921028959-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I can't stop thinking about $npcNamePlural:11004342$. I hear there are a few different species living in the area.

0108160921028960-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I want to know more! Go out and study the $npcNamePlural:25020704$ in $map:02020032$ and $npcNamePlural:25020905$ in $map:02020013$, please!

1228160921028513-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go out and study the $npcNamePlural:25020704$ in $map:02020032$ and $npcNamePlural:25020905$ in $map:02020013$, please!

1228160921028514-Kritias_2018_12-.name: So, how did the different species vary from each other?

0108160921028962-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ah-ha! I knew it. We must study this in more depth next time!

1228160921028515-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hey, could you do me a teeny tiny favor?

0108160921028964-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I was going through our data on Kritias monsters, and some of our entries are looking awfully thin. That just won't do!

0108160921028965-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please gather data on $npcNamePlural:25021102$ in $map:02020051$, $npcNamePlural:25021203$ in $map:02020017$, and $npcNamePlural:25021401$ in $map:02020014$.

1228160921028516-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please gather data on $npcNamePlural:25021102$ in $map:02020051$, $npcNamePlural:25021203$ in $map:02020017$, and $npcNamePlural:25021401$ in $map:02020014$.

1228160921028517-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You sure brought a lot of data!

0108160921028966-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thank you. I'll start uploading this new information right away.

0108163521028977-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I was looking at our database of mechanical Kritias monsters and found that some of the entries are empty.

0108163521028978-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We need to fill them with relevant data. $MyPCName$, you'll help me, right?

0108163521028979-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Study them by fighting the $npcNamePlural:25021104$ in $map:02020051$ and $npcNamePlural:25021201$ in $map:02020017$.

0108163521028980-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Study them by fighting the $npcNamePlural:25021104$ in $map:02020051$ and $npcNamePlural:25021201$ in $map:02020017$.

0108163521028981-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That's some mighty fine data! Our understanding of this place grows by the day.

0108163521028982-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's only a matter of time before we have perfect countermeasures for these mechanical monsters. I can't wait!

0108160921028967-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Calm down and tell me everything.

0108160921028968-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If these reports are right, then Kharon and Tairen have a plot to use the local plant monsters to attack us!

0108160921028969-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If those green meanies join the battle, there's no way we'll be able to hold out for long!

0110191221029055-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Oh, would you? You're a life saver!

0108160921028971-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thank you very much! Please defeat the $npcNamePlural:25021801$ in $map:02020008$, $npcNamePlural:25021603$ in $map:02020009$, and $npcNamePlural:25022101$ in $map:02020037$.

1228160921028519-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please defeat the $npcNamePlural:25021801$ in $map:02020008$, $npcNamePlural:25021603$ in $map:02020009$, and $npcNamePlural:25022101$ in $map:02020037$.

0108160921028972-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Those weeds won't be bothering us anytime soon.

0108160921028973-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thanks again! The next time I have some killer gardening problems, I'll turn to you.

1228160921028521-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've been looking over our scout reports, and I've come to an important conclusion. Those Daemon Army guys are bad news!

0108160921028974-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If we take care of them, then Humanitas can focus their efforts on Tairen.

0108160921028975-Kritias_2018_12-.name: So, shall we defeat the Daemon Army? Please defeat $npcNamePlural:25021901$ in $map:02020035$ and $npcNamePlural:25022002$ in $map:02020036$.

1228160921028523-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Good job! Humanitas is probably grateful, too.

0108160921028976-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm sure it's only a matter of time before the Daemon Army is back. I'm glad we have you on our side!

1228160921028524-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Have you heard about the giant $npcName:11004342[gender:0]$ in $map:02020006$? They say that if you move his heart, you'll find a great treasure!

0110191221029057-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I think there's something to this rumor.

0108163521028983-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The best way to find out for sure is to try it out for yourself!

0108163521028984-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please go to $map:02020006$ and find out the truth of the rumor!

1228160921028525-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please go to $map:02020006$ and find out the truth of the rumor!

1228160921028526-Kritias_2018_12-.name: So? Did you move the heart of the giant $npcName:11004342[gender:0]$?!

0108163521028985-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I did, and he gave me treasure as a reward!

0108163521028986-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Really?! I can't believe the rumor was actually true! Wow!

0108163521028988-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I kind of authorized a mission to $map:02020031$ since things had settled down there, but now I've lost contact with the team.

0110191221029058-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That place isn't exactly safe. And the monsters there are wild.

0108163521028989-Kritias_2018_12-.name: What if they're hurt? Can you check on them for me?

1228160921028528-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please make sure our people are okay in $map:02020031$.

0108163521028990-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The robot soldiers were giving them some trouble, but they're fine.

0108163521028991-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm glad to hear it, but then what's with the radio silence? How strange...

1228160921028533-Kritias_2018_12-.name: As our people explore Kritias, they hear all kinds of rumors. Intriguing rumors.

0108165221028992-Kritias_2018_12-.name: For example, there's supposedly a machine in $map:02020034$. If you use the machine, a shiny ring appears in the sky.

0110191221029059-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's a little ridiculous, isn't it? But I can't stop thinking about it! Could you go there and find the machine? And if a ring actually does appear, use a flying mount to go through it.

0108165221028993-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I can't wait to hear your report!

1228160921028534-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please look into the rumor about $map:02020034$!

1228160921028535-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well? Did a shiny ring appear in the sky?

0108165221028995-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Huh. This place keeps surprising me. I can't wait to research this strange phenomenon for myself!

1228160921028536-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Are you ready to hear the latest rumor from my field researchers?

0108165221028996-Kritias_2018_12-.name: My agents in $map:02020016$ say that there's a machine that makes the flowers bloom.

0110191221029060-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ah, $npcName:11004315$—I thought you were a technophile, but heart, you're still a Green Hood. Shall we grow a garden in the outpost for you?

0108165221028997-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm more than a little curious, myself. Please see if there's any truth to these rumors about $map:02020016$!

0110191221029061-Kritias_2018_12-.name: ...I suddenly feel as though I'm being ignored.

1228160921028537-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please look into the rumor about $map:02020016$!

1228160921028538-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Did the machine actually exist? No way, right?

0108165221028998-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Not only was it there, but a treasure chest appeared when I used it.

0108165221028999-Kritias_2018_12-.name: How can that be? Is it science? Or magic...?

1228160921028539-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our soldiers at the $map:02020032$ have passed along a strange rumor. They say that adventurers keep hanging out around the binoculars, then running off at full speed.

0108173221029000-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Is it a new jogging craze? I have no idea.

0108173221029001-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The vanguard captain also wants to know what's going on. Could you go to the $map:02020032$ and find out?

1228160921028540-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please go to $map:02020032$ and find out.

1228160921028541-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Did you find out why the adventurers are running? There must be a reason... right?

0108173221029002-Kritias_2018_12-.name: There sure is, but I'm not telling you!

1228160921028542-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Today's rumor of Kritias is about $map:02020014$.

0108173221029004-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They say there's a device in $map:02020014$ that makes platforms appear in the air.

0110191221029062-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It sounds like something out of a fantasy novel! How can I resist a rumor like that?

1228160921028543-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please go to $map:02020014$ and check out the rumor!

1228160921028544-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Was the rumor true? Did platforms actually appear in the air?

0108173221029007-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Wow! How is that possible? I'll have to look into it for myself.

1228160921028545-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Today's rumor of Kritias is about $map:02020017$.

0108173221029008-Kritias_2018_12-.name: There's another device that summons shiny rings in the sky. I wonder if it's the same kind of device as before.

0108173221029009-Kritias_2018_12-.name: What are these devices for? I want you to find out.

1228160921028546-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please go to $map:02020017$ and check out the rumor!

1228160921028547-Kritias_2018_12-.name: So? Was it the same ring? A different ring?

0108173221029011-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hm... There must be a pattern to this. Time to run a simulation!

1228160921028548-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You know those strange floating platforms from before?

0108173221029013-Kritias_2018_12-.name: There's no time to waste. We have to see this with our own eyes. Er, with your own eyes!

1228160921028549-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please go to $map:02020018$ and check out the rumor!

0111180821029065-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Yes. There was a chest at the top, too.

0108173221029014-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll get to the bottom of this someday. They must serve some special purpose!

1228160921028551-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Do you remember that shiny sky ring we heard a rumor about?

0108193421029015-Kritias_2018_12-.name: One of our scouts spotted one in $map:02020035$.

0108193421029016-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Unfortunately, he wasn't able to go after it. But I bet you could!

1228160921028552-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please go to $map:02020035$ and check out the rumor!

1228160921028553-Kritias_2018_12-.name: So what happened when you went through the ring?

0108193421029017-Kritias_2018_12-.name: There was a chest at the end.

0108193421029018-Kritias_2018_12-.name: My hypothesis wasn't wrong! A little more evidence, and I could have a full-blown theory on my hand!

1228160921028554-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Say, do you remember that giant $npcName:11004342[gender:0]$ from the rumor a while ago?

0108193421029020-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We found another one in $map:02020009$. I don't know what it's guarding, but I feel kind of bad for it. It must be so bored, standing in place all day!

0110191221029063-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ah yes, the Green Hoods: friends and protectors to the bored and lonely.

0110191221029064-Kritias_2018_12-.name: ...Can no one else hear me? Have I become a ghost?

1228160921028555-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please give freedom to the $npcName:11004342[gender:0]$ in $map:02020009$.

0108193421029023-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That's good. I know I'd get depressed if I had to stand in one place all day, every day.

1228160921028557-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Do you remember that weird machine? The one that made the flowers blossom?

0108193421029024-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Another one was spotted in $map:02020008$! I'll figure out how it works this time for sure!

0108193421029025-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please go to $map:02020008$ and uncover the secret of the device!

1228160921028558-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please go to $map:02020008$ and uncover the secret of the device!

1228160921028559-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I feel like I've been waiting all day! What happened when you used the device?

0108193421029026-Kritias_2018_12-.name: A chest appeared. That was cool.

0108193421029027-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That's all? There must be more! Go back there right now!

0111180821029066-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $npcName:11004437[gender:1]$, it won't do to lose your temper. Where's your cool objectivity as a scientist?

0111180821029068-Kritias_2018_12-.name: ...I'll take my leave now. $MyPCName$, I suggest you do the same.

1228160921028560-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Another machine that makes the flowers bloom has been spotted. It's at $map:02020037$ this time.

0108193421029028-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I still haven't figured out how it works. That's where you come in.

0108193421029029-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please go to $map:02020037$ and uncover the secret of the device!

1228160921028561-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please go to $map:02020037$ and uncover the secret of the device!

1228160921028562-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Did you get any results this time? Or is it more of the same?

0108193421029030-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I think the number of blossoms is important.

0108193421029031-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The number of blossoms? I hadn't considered that... Nice observation!

1228160921028563-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Do you remember that weird rumor about adventurers running around? My scouts filled me in on some of the details!

0108193421029032-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Oh, so you know about it. Great...

0108193421029033-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Feeling guilty because you wanted to keep all the treasure for yourself last time? Don't worry. I have a way for you to make it up to me!

0108193421029034-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to $map:02020033$ and find out what's at the end of the run!

1228160921028564-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to $map:02020033$ and find out what's at the end of the run!

1228160921028565-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Did you reach the end? What was there?!

0108193421029036-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Another chest? Just like the others? Hmm... My prediction was wrong. I need to adjust my algorithm.

1228160921028566-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The mysterious running adventurers of Kritias have been spotted in $map:02020036$.

0108193421029037-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I can't let this rumor go. Is there a pattern to these treasure runs? How are the connected to binoculars?

0108193421029038-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please go to $map:02020036$ and run it for yourself.

1228160921028567-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please go to $map:02020036$ and run it for yourself.

0108193421029039-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I ran all the way to the end!

0108193421029040-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Wow! Congratulations. You must be—I mean, tell me about your findings. Jeez.

0108193421029041-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I was supposed to bring back findings? I thought you just wanted me to run.

0108193421029042-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You must bring back findings next time! You must!

0108194921029044-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We've got a researcher named $npcName:11004485[gender:0]$ in $map:02020009$. The only problem is... It's just... I don't know what he's actually researching.

0108194921029045-Kritias_2018_12-.name: He isn't one of your people?

0108194921029046-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well... Nobody knows? We've got him in the books, but nobody's ever actually talked to him!

0108194921029047-Kritias_2018_12-.name: How did we let this happen? Please go to $map:02020009$ and find out what $npcName:11004485[gender:0]$ is doing!

1228160921028570-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Please go to $map:02020009$ and find out what $npcName:11004485[gender:0]$ is doing!

1228160921028571-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Uh-huh. I see. Maybe it's... maybe it's best if we just leave him there...
